9.11: Yie oix caux meih mbuo liepc ngaengc waac, yangh naaiv jiex yie yietc liuz maiv longc mbiungc-suiv-imx yiemx, mietc mienh maanh yietc zungv maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv. Yietc liuz yaac maiv longc mbiungc-suiv-imx yiemx waaic ndau-beih.”
9.16: Jung hinc yiem wuov mbuonx cuotv daaih, yie mangc buatc ziouc jangx zuqc Tin-Hungh caux lungh ndiev nyungc-nyungc maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv yietc liuz liepc jiez nyei ngaengc waac.”

37.21: Lu^mben haiz ninh youz mbuo hnangv naaiv nor gorngv, ninh oix lorz jauv njoux Yosepv cuotv ninh mbuo nyei buoz-ndiev. Ninh ziouc gorngv, “Mbuo maiv dungx daix ninh.”
37.15: Maaih dauh mienh buangh zuqc ninh yiem lomc-huaang jiex naaiv jiex wuov nyei, ziouc naaic gaax ninh, “Meih lorz haaix nyungc?”
37.12: Yosepv nyei gorx mbuo dorh ninh mbuo nyei die nyei ba'gi yungh caux yungh guanh mingh Sekem bungx.
37.17: Wuov dauh mienh gorngv, “Ninh mbuo suiv dorngx mi'aqv. Yie haiz ninh mbuo gorngv oix suiv mingh Ndotaan.” Yosepv ziouc mingh lorz ninh nyei gorx mbuo, lorz buatc yiem Ndotaan.
37.30: Ninh nzuonx ninh nyei youz mbuo wuov gorngv, “Wuov dauh dorn maiv yiem naaiv aqv loh! Yie oix zuqc hnangv haaix nor zoux?”
37.20: Mbuo lomh nzoih mingh zorqv ninh daix guangc aqv. Daix dapv jienv wuom-kuotv-nqaai. Mbuo ziouc gorngv ga'naaiv ngaatc mi'aqv. Mbuo mangc gaax ninh nyei mbeix ndongc haaix lingh?”
37.4: Yosepv nyei gorx mbuo buatc ninh mbuo nyei die hnamv Yosepv gauh camv hnamv ninh mbuo, ninh mbuo ziouc nzorng Yosepv. Caux ninh gorngv waac yaac maiv maaih waac longx aqv.
37.28: Wuov deix zoux saeng-eix nyei Mi^ndien Mienh jiex jauv taux wuov. Yosepv nyei gorx mbuo ziouc cie Yosepv cuotv kuotv daaih maaic bun naaiv deix I^saa^maa^en Mienh,  duqv luoqc lungz nyaanh. Wuov deix saeng-eix mienh ziouc dorh Yosepv mingh I^yipv Deic-Bung aqv.
37.33: Yaakopv zieqv duqv nyei. Ninh gorngv, “Naaiv za'gengh! yie nyei dorn nyei lui. Za'gengh! ga'naaiv ngaatc, ga'naaiv betv mi'aqv lorqc.”
37.35: Ninh nyei dorn ninh nyei sieqv mbuo yietc zungv kuinx ninh, “Maiv dungx nyiemv,” mv baac ninh maiv muangx. Ninh gorngv, “Maiv dungx gorngv aqv. Yie oix zuqc nzauh taux daic mingh caux yie nyei dorn yiem yiemh gen.” Ninh corc nzauh jienv, weic ninh nyei dorn nyiemv.
37.19: Laanh mbuox laanh, “Wuov dauh ga'naaiv-mbeix mbeix daaih aqv loh!
37.34: Yaakopv nzauh haic, betv ninh ganh nyei lui aengx zorqv la'maah ndie-cou sai jienv jaaiv. Ninh nzauh haic, nyiemv ninh nyei dorn ziex laaic lauh.
37.18: Ninh nyei gorx mbuo buatc Yosepv corc yiem go nyei. Daaih maiv gaengh taux, ninh mbuo ziouc lomh nzoih caangh laangh daav za'eix daix.
37.22: Lu^mben aengx mbuox ninh mbuo, “Maiv dungx bun yietc deix nziaamv cuotv. Zorqv ninh dapv naaiv deic-bung-huaang nyei wuom-kuotv-nqaai duqv aqv. Mv baac maiv dungx zoux haaix nyungc hoic ninh.” Lu^mben hnangv naaiv nor gorngv weic oix njoux Yosepv cuotv ninh youz mbuo nyei buoz-ndiev aengx fungx nzuonx bun ninh nyei die.
37.23: Yosepv daaih taux, ninh nyei gorx mbuo ziouc caa jienv zorqv ninh nyei lui ndaauv, dongh maaih lui-mueiz-ndaauv wuov deix lui, ciev guangc mingh,
37.13: I^saa^laa^en ziouc gorngv mbuox Yosepv, “Meih nyei gorx mbuo yiem Sekem bungx yungh. Meih mingh meih nyei gorx wuov oc.” Yosepv dau, “Mingh nyei.”
37.9: Nqa'haav Yosepv aengx mbeix buatc nzunc yaac gorngv bun ninh nyei gorx mbuo muangx. Ninh gorngv, “Yie aengx mbeix buatc. Naaiv nzunc yie buatc mba'hnoi caux hlaax caux ziepc yietv norm hleix yietc zungv baaix yie.”
37.26: Yu^ndaa gorngv mbuox ninh nyei muoz-doic, “Se gorngv mbuo daix guangc mbuo nyei youz aengx lorz jauv bingx yie mbuo zoux nyei sic, mbuo duqv haaix nyungc?
37.5: Maaih nzunc Yosepv mbeix buatc, yaac gorngv ninh nyei mbeix bun ninh nyei gorx mbuo muangx. Ninh mbuo ziouc gauh fatv nzorng ninh aqv.
37.27: Mbuo oix zuqc maaic bun naaiv deix I^saa^maa^en Mienh gauh longx daix guangc. Ninh zoux mbuo nyei youz, caux mbuo juangc nziaamv-fei.” Ninh nyei muoz-doic buatc horpc nyei.
37.14: Ninh nyei die mbuox ninh, “Yie oix meih mingh mangc gaax meih nyei gorx mbuo longx nyei fai? Yungh longx nyei fai? Mangc liuz nzuonx daaih mbuox die oc.” Ninh nyei die ziouc mbuox ninh mingh, ninh ziouc yiem He^mbo^lon Horngc cuotv jauv mingh Sekem. Yosepv mingh taux Sekem,
37.3: I^saa^laa^en hnamv Yosepv gauh camv jiex ninh nyei yietc zungv dorn, weic zuqc ninh gox aqv, cingx duqv Yosepv daaih. Ninh lunh deix lui-ndaauv, lui-mueiz yaac ndaauv, bun Yosepv.
37.7: Yie mbeix buatc mbuo yiem ndeic sai mbiauh zeiv. Yie nyei mbiauh zeiv ganh jiez sin daaih don jienv. Gorx mbuo nyei mbiauh zeiv yaac jiez daaih weih gormx yie nyei mbiauh zeiv baaix.”
37.36: Dongh wuov zanc yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung wuov deix zoux saeng-eix nyei Mi^ndien Mienh aengx maaic Yosepv bun hungh diex nyei yietc dauh jien, se goux hungh dinc nyei domh baeng-bieiv, Bo^ti^faa, mi'aqv.
37.10: Ninh aengx gorngv naaiv norm mbeix bun ninh nyei die, ninh nyei gorx mbuo muangx. Ninh nyei die gorngv-hemx ninh, “Naaiv haaix nyungc mbeix laeh? Meih hnamv daaih meih nyei maa caux yie caux meih nyei gorx mbuo yietc zungv oix zuqc puoqv njiec taux ndau baaix meih?”
37.2: Yiem naaiv mingh gorngv Yaakopv nyei dorn-jueiv nyei jauv-louc. Yosepv benx mienh lunx mienh, duqv ziepc cietv hnyangx wuov zanc, ninh caux ninh nyei gorx, se ninh nyei die nyei auv, Mbin^haa caux Sinx^baa, nyei dorn mbuo bungx ba'gi yungh caux yungh. Yosepv dorh ninh nyei gorx mbuo zoux maiv benx nyei jauv mingh gorngv mbuox ninh nyei die.
37.1: Yaakopv corc yiem jienv zinh ndaangc ninh nyei die yiem wuov norm deic-bung, se Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung.
37.31: Ninh mbuo ziouc daix dauh yungh gouv aengx zorqv Yosepv nyei lui-ndaauv, dongh maaih lui-mueiz-ndaauv wuov deix, ziemx yungh nyei nziaamv,
37.6: Yosepv gorngv, “Gorx mbuo muangx yie gorngv yie nyei mbeix oc.
37.8: Ninh nyei gorx mbuo naaic gaax ninh, “Meih gengh oix zoux yie mbuo nyei hungh? Oix gunv yie mbuo?” Laaix Yosepv mbeix nyei mbeix caux ninh gorngv nyei waac, ninh nyei gorx mbuo gauh fatv nzorng ninh aqv.
37.24: aengx zorqv ninh fongv ndortv wuom-kuotv. Wuov norm kuotv maiv maaih wuom.
37.25: Yosepv nyei gorx mbuo zueiz jienv nyanc hnaangx wuov zanc, ninh mbuo cau hmien mangc buatc guanh I^saa^maa^en Mienh yiem Gi^le^aatc daaih oix mingh I^yipv Deic-Bung. Ninh mbuo nyei lorh torh tor jienv ndiangx-zung ndaang caux ndie-ndaang caux mu^yorc.
37.29: Lu^mben daaih taux wuov norm kuotv, yaac maiv buatc Yosepv mi'aqv. Ninh nzauh haic ziouc betv ganh nyei lui.
37.11: Yosepv nyei gorx mbuo gengh mueic jieqv ninh, mv baac ninh nyei die haaix zanc yaac jangx jienv naaiv deix jauv-louc.
37.32: aengx dorh nzuonx bun ninh nyei die mangc. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Yie mbuo lorz buatc naaiv deix lui. Die mangc gaax, meih nyei dorn nyei lui saah?”
37.16: Yosepv dau, “Yie lorz yie nyei gorx mbuo. Meih hiuv duqv ninh mbuo yiem haaix bungx yungh, tov mbuox yie oc.”

5.21: Enokv duqv luoqc ziepc hmz hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Me^tu^se^laa.
5.15: Maa^haa^laa^len duqv luoqc ziepc hmz hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Yaaletv.
5.12: Kenan duqv cietv ziepc hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Maa^haa^laa^len.
5.17: Maa^haa^laa^len nyei hnyangx-jeiv duqv betv baeqv juov ziepc hmz hnyangx ziouc guei seix mi'aqv.
5.30: Laamekv duqv liuz Noyaa, ninh aengx ziangh duqv hmz baeqv juov ziepc hmz hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
5.20: Yaaletv nyei hnyangx-jeiv duqv juov baeqv luoqc ziepc nyeic hnyangx ziouc guei seix mi'aqv.
5.4: Yiem duqv liuz Setc, Aa^ndam aengx ziangh duqv betv baeqv hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
5.28: Laamekv duqv yietc baeqv betv ziepc nyeic hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn daaih,
5.19: Yiem duqv liuz Enokv, ninh aengx ziangh duqv betv baeqv hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
5.18: Yaaletv duqv yietc baeqv luoqc ziepc nyeic hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Enokv.
5.22: Duqv liuz naaiv dauh dorn, Enokv caux Tin-Hungh horpc hnyouv jiu tong faam-baeqv hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
5.23: Enokv nyei siouc nyuonh ziangh duqv faam-baeqv luoqc ziepc hmz hnyangx.
5.13: Duqv liuz Maa^haa^laa^len, ninh aengx ziangh duqv betv baeqv feix ziepc hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
5.9: Enotv duqv juov ziepc hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Kenan.
5.26: Yiem duqv liuz Laamekv, ninh aengx ziangh duqv cietv baeqv betv ziepc nyeic hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
5.5: Aa^ndam nyei hnyangx-jeiv duqv juov baeqv faah ziepc hnyangx ziouc guei seix mi'aqv.
5.27: Me^tu^se^laa nyei hnyangx-jeiv duqv juov baeqv luoqc ziepc juov hnyangx ziouc guei seix mi'aqv.
5.14: Kenan nyei hnyangx-jeiv duqv juov baeqv lengh ziepc hnyangx ziouc guei seix mi'aqv.
5.3: Aa^ndam duqv yietc baeqv faah ziepc hnyangx, ninh aengx duqv dauh dorn daaih zuangv ninh, yaac tengx cuotv mbuox heuc Setc.
5.7: Yiem duqv liuz Enotv, ninh ziangh duqv betv baeqv lengh siec hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
5.10: Yiem duqv liuz Kenan, ninh ziangh duqv betv baeqv ziepc hmz hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
5.2: Ninh zeix benx m'jangc m'sieqv yaac ceix fuqv bun ninh mbuo, aengx tengx cuotv mbuox heuc “baamh mienh.”
5.1: Naaiv se Aa^ndam nyei zeiv-fun nyei douh zong daan. Tin-Hungh zeix mienh daaih wuov zanc, ninh zeix daaih zuangv ninh ganh.
5.31: Laamekv nyei hnyangx-jeiv duqv cietv baeqv cietv ziepc cietv hnyangx ziouc guei seix mi'aqv.
5.6: Setc duqv yietc baeqv lengh biaa hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Enotv.
5.8: Setc nyei hnyangx-jeiv duqv juov baeqv ziepc nyeic hnyangx, ninh ziouc guei seix mi'aqv.
5.24: Enokv zanc-zanc caux Tin-Hungh jiu tong, Tin-Hungh dorh ninh mingh mi'aqv. Ziang naaic maiv buatc mi'aqv.
5.25: Me^tu^se^laa duqv yietc baeqv betv ziepc cietv hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Laamekv.
5.29: tengx ninh cuotv mbuox heuc Noyaa. Ninh gorngv, “Weic zuqc Ziouv houv ndau, yie mbuo oix zuqc longc buoz zoux gong kouv. Naaiv dauh dorn haih tengx yie mbuo nyei gong-bou heng deix.”
5.11: Enotv nyei hnyangx-jeiv duqv juov baeqv lengh biaa hnyangx, ninh ziouc guei seix mi'aqv.
5.32: Noyaa ziangh duqv hmz baeqv hnyangx cingx duqv buo dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Sem, Haam caux Yaafetv.
5.16: Duqv liuz Yaaletv, ninh aengx ziangh duqv betv baeqv faah ziepc hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.

3.21: Ziouv Tin-Hungh longc saeng-kuv nyei ndopv zoux lui-houx bun Aa^ndam caux ninh nyei auv, Haawaa, zuqv.
3.15: Yie oix bun meih caux naaiv dauh m'sieqv dorn daav win, yaac bun meih nyei zeiv-fun caux ninh nyei zeiv-fun zoux win-wangv. Ninh nyei zeiv-fun oix mborqv meih nyei m'nqorngv huv, meih yaac oix nyorqv ninh nyei zaux-nqo.”
3.12: Wuov dauh m'jangc dorn dau, “Dongh meih bun daaih caux yie yiem naaiv wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn, ninh bun naaiv zungh ndiangx nyei biouv yie, yie ziouc nyanc mi'aqv.”
3.17: Tin-Hungh yaac gorngv mbuox Aa^ndam, “Laaix meih muangx meih nyei auv nyei waac, nyanc dongh yie hatc meih, ‘Maiv dungx nyanc wuov zungh biouv.’ Ndau ziouc laaix meih zoux nyei sic zuqc houv. Meih yietc seix oix zuqc bangc ndau zoux gong kouv cingx duqv nyanc.
3.20: Aa^ndam tengx ninh nyei auv cuotv mbuox heuc Haawaa, weic zuqc ninh zoux lungh ndiev mienh nyei maa.
3.4: Naang gorngv mbuox m'sieqv dorn, “Meih mbuo maiv daic lorqc.
3.19: Meih oix zuqc zoux gong kouv cuotv ziex sin hanc wuov deix ndau cingx daaih haih cuotv deix ga'naaiv. Zoux taux meih aengx nzuonx benx nie, weic zuqc meih se nie benx daaih. Meih se nie, meih oix zuqc aengx benx nzunc nie aqv.”
3.18: Ndau oix weic meih cuotv miev cuotv njimv. Meih yaac oix zuqc nyanc yiem ndau cuotv nyei lai-miev.
3.22: Ziouv Tin-Hungh aengx gorngv, “Ih zanc wuov laanh mienh se hnangv mbuo nor, hiuv duqv longx, hiuv duqv ciouv. Oix zuqc maiv dungx bun ninh sung buoz mingh gaeqv ziangh maengc nyei biouv nyanc ziouc yietc liuz duqv ziangh jienv.”
3.23: Ziouv Tin-Hungh ziouc zunc ninh cuotv E^nden Huingx yaac bun ninh zoux liangx-ndeic yiem Tin-Hungh longc nanv ninh daaih wuov deix nie.
3.13: Ziouv  Tin-Hungh naaic gaax wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn, “Meih zoux cuotv haaix nyungc sic mi'aqv?” Wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn dau, “Naang ganh nduov yie, yie ziouc nyanc.”
3.9: Mv baac Ziouv  Tin-Hungh heuc wuov dauh m'jangc dorn, “Meih yiem haaix laeh?”
3.5: Tin-Hungh hnangv naaiv gorngv weic zuqc ninh hiuv duqv meih mbuo nyanc liuz, meih mbuo haih hnamv duqv tong, meih mbuo ziouc hnangv Tin-Hungh nor, haih hiuv duqv longx hiuv duqv ciouv.”
3.14: Ziouv Tin-Hungh mbuox wuov diuh naang, “Laaix meih hnangv naaiv nor zoux, “Meih ziouc zuqc houv gauh hniev yietc zungv saeng-kuv, gauh camv yietc zungv hieh zoih. Meih oix zuqc longc ga'sie luih jienv gan ndau mingh, yietc seix oix zuqc nyanc nie-mbung.
3.3: Mv baac Tin-Hungh gorngv, ‘Yiem huingx mbu'ndongx wuov zungh ndiangx nyei biouv cin-maanc maiv dungx nyanc, liemh maiv dungx muoqv. Maiv zei aeqv, meih mbuo zungv zuqc daic aqv.’+”
3.7: Ninh mbuo nyanc liuz, ninh mbuo haih hnamv duqv tong. Ninh mbuo hiuv duqv ganh laengh gaengv nyei yiem, ziouc zorqv ngongh nyorx ndiangx-normh lunh daaih pongx jienv aqv.
3.10: Wuov dauh m'jangc dorn dau, “Yie haiz meih yiem naaiv huingx. Yie gamh nziex haic weic zuqc yie laengh gaengv nyei yiem ziouc bingx meih.”
3.2: Wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn dau naang, “Yiem huingx gu'nyuoz nyei zungh zungh biouv yie mbuo nyanc duqv nyei.
3.1: Ziouv Tin-Hungh zeix daaih nyei yietc zungv lomc zaangc ga'naaiv se naang gauh guaix jiex. Naang naaic gaax wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn, “Tin-Hungh za'gengh gorngv maiv bun meih mbuo nyanc yiem naaiv huingx gu'nyuoz nyei haaix nyungc biouv fai?”
3.6: Wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn mangc buatc wuov zungh biouv nzueic nyei, daaix nyanc kuv nyei. Ninh yaac hnamv daaih se gorngv haih bun mienh guai nor, za'gengh longx haic. Ninh ziouc gaeqv daaih nyanc aqv. Aengx bun deix ninh nyei nqox nyanc.
3.8: Wuov hnoi, lungh maanz-hmuangx nyei ziangh hoc, ninh mbuo haiz Ziouv Tin-Hungh yiem huingx gu'nyuoz yangh jauv. Wuov dauh m'jangc dorn caux ninh nyei auv ziouc bieqc huingx nyei ndiangx-lomc mingh bingx jienv Ziouv.
3.24: Ziouv zunc ninh cuotv liuz, yiem E^nden Huingx nyei dong bung maengx, Ziouv bun ke^lu^mbim zuov jienv. Aengx maaih zung maaih douz nyei nzuqc ndaauv guinh guinh biei bung nyei, dangv jienv mingh ziangh maengc biouv nyei ndiangx wuov diuh jauv.
3.11: Tin-Hungh naaic gaax, “Haaix dauh mbuox meih, meih nyei sin laengh gaengv nyei? Meih nyanc dongh yie hatc meih maiv dungx nyanc wuov zungh biouv mi'aqv saah?”
3.16: Tin-Hungh yaac gorngv mbuox wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn, “Maaih sin nyei ziangh hoc yie oix jaa tipv bun meih kouv. Ndutv sin nyei ziangh hoc meih oix zuqc mun. Mv baac meih corc oix longc meih nyei nqox. Meih nyei nqox yaac oix gunv jienv meih.”

39.21: mv baac Tin-Hungh caux ninh yiem, yaac zoux longx bun ninh, bun ninh zoux duqv horpc goux loh wuov dauh jien nyei hnyouv.
39.15: Ninh haiz yie heuc, ninh ziouc guangc jienv ninh nyei lui yiem yie naaiv aengx biaux cuotv biauv mi'aqv.”
39.12: Bo^ti^faa nyei auv nyau jienv Yosepv nyei lui gorngv, “Daaih caux yie bueix maah!” Mv baac Yosepv guangc jienv ninh nyei lui yiem wuov dauh auv nyei buoz, biaux cuotv ga'nyiec ziqc biauv mingh.
39.17: Ninh ziouc hnangv naaiv nor gorngv, “Dongh meih dorh daaih mbuo naaiv wuov dauh Hipv^lu nouh gauv bieqc daaih mangc yie maiv jiez, oix caux yie.
39.20: zorqv Yosepv wuonx jienv loh, dongh wuonx hungh diex nyei zuiz-mienh wuov norm loh. Yosepv zuqc wuonx jienv wuov
39.4: Yosepv zoux duqv horpc Bo^ti^faa nyei hnyouv yaac duqv zoux ninh nyei lengc jeiv bou. Bo^ti^faa ziouc bun ninh goux biauv zong caux jaa-dingh yietc zungv ga'naaiv.
39.19: Yosepv nyei ziouv haiz ninh nyei auv gorngv, “Meih nyei nouh hnangv naaiv nor zoux bun yie,” ninh ziouc qiex jiez! haic,
39.18: Yie qaqv heuc, ninh ziouc guangc ninh nyei lui yiem yie naaiv biaux cuotv gaengh ka'ndau mi'aqv.”
39.22: Goux loh jien ziouc bun Yosepv goux yietc zungv yiem loh nyei zuiz-mienh. Da'faanh yiem loh gu'nyuoz nyei sic, Yosepv ganh gunv nzengc.
39.23: Yosepv goux jienv nyei yietc zungv sic, goux loh jien maiv zuqc nzauh weic zuqc Ziouv caux Yosepv yiem. Ninh zoux nyei nyungc-nyungc Ziouv  tengx ninh zoux duqv longx.
39.13: Wuov dauh auv buatc Yosepv guangc jienv ninh nyei lui biaux cuotv ga'nyiec,
39.9: Yiem naaiv biauv yie maaih hatc maaz ndongc ninh hlo. Yie nyei ziouv maiv nzaeng haaix nyungc cuotv liuz meih weic zuqc meih zoux ninh nyei auv. Yie fungc haih zoux waaic sic ndongc naaic hlo, baamz zuiz dorngc Tin-Hungh?”
39.5: Yiem Bo^ti^faa paaiv Yosepv goux jienv ninh nyei biauv zong yietc zungv jaa-dingh, Ziouv weic Yosepv ceix fuqv bun wuov dauh I^yipv Mienh nyei jaa-dingh. Da'faanh yiem biauv yiem ndeic nyei yietc zungv ziouc camv jienv faaux.
39.14: ninh ziouc nauc-nauc nyei heuc yiem ninh nyei biauv wuov deix m'jangc bou daaih. Ninh gorngv, “Mangc gaax naaic! Yie nyei nqox dorh naaiv dauh Hipv^lu Mienh daaih. Ih zanc ninh mangc piex yie mbuo. Ninh bieqc daaih oix yie caux ninh bueix, mv baac yie qaqv nauc.
39.3: Wuov dauh biauv-ziouv buatc Ziouv caux Yosepv yiem. Ziouv yaac bun Yosepv yiem ninh zoux nyei nyungc-nyungc duqv longx.
39.7: Yiem gau, ninh nyei ziouv nyei auv mangc Yosepv haiz hanc haic, ziouc yuoqc ninh gorngv, “Meih daaih caux yie bueix oc.”
39.10: Maiv gunv wuov dauh auv hnoi-hnoi yuoqc Yosepv, Yosepv maiv kangv caux ninh bueix, liemh maiv caux ninh yiem yietc norm dorngx.
39.2: Ninh yiem ninh nyei I^yipv Mienh biauv-ziouv nyei biauv. Ziouv caux Yosepv yiem, bun ninh duqv longx.
39.1: I^saa^maa^en Mienh dorh Yosepv mingh I^yipv Deic-Bung maaic bun dauh I^yipv Mienh, se Faalo Hungh nyei domh jien, dongh goux hungh dinc nyei domh baeng-bieiv, Bo^ti^faa.
39.6: Bo^ti^faa nyei yietc norm jaa-dingh nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv ninh jiu bun Yosepv goux nzengc. Cuotv liuz ninh ganh nyei nyanc hopv, ninh maiv zuqc nzauh haaix nyungc. Yosepv nyei sin-pei ziangh duqv longx, hmien-mueic yaac nzueic.
39.8: Mv baac Yosepv maiv muangx. Ninh gorngv mbuox ninh nyei ziouv nyei auv, “Yie nyei ziouv maiv zuqc nzauh yiem biauv gu'nyuoz nyei haaix nyungc. Yietc zungv jaa-dingh ninh jiu bun yie goux.
39.11: Maaih hnoi nor, Yosepv bieqc biauv zoux ninh horpc zuqc zoux nyei gong, yaac maiv maaih yietc dauh biauv nyei bou yiem wuov.
39.16: Wuov dauh auv zorqv Yosepv nyei lui an jienv ninh nyei ga'hlen zuov Yosepv nyei ziouv nzuonx daaih.

6.21: Meih mbuo oix zuqc zorqv nyungc-nyungc nyanc hopv bienh bieqc nzangv, liouh jienv zoux meih mbuo nyei nyanc hopv yaac zoux uix saeng-kuv nyei ga'naaiv.”
6.15: Naaiv poux nzangv oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor zoux, ndaauv faam-baeqv ndorqc, jangv hmz ziepc ndorqc, hlang faah ziepc ndorqc.
6.12: Tin-Hungh mangc lungh ndiev, buatc baaic waaic nzengc, weic zuqc baamh mienh yietc zungv kungx zoux orqv zoux waaic nyei jauv hnangv.
6.17: Mangc maah! Yie oix bun mbiungc-suiv-imx yiemx ndau-beih, yiemx daic yietc zungv yiem lungh ndiev maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv. Da'faanh nangh nyei, maaih qiex nyei ga'naaiv oix zuqc daic nzengc.
6.20: Nyungc-nyungc norqc, nyungc-nyungc saeng-kuv, caux nyungc-nyungc nyorng ndau-beih nyei ga'naaiv, yietc nyungc yietc doix oix daaih lorz meih weic njoux ninh mbuo nyei maengc.
6.4: Wuov zanc maaih Nefin Mienh yiem lungh ndiev, nqa'haav corc maaih nyei. Se doz-mienh dorn longc baamh mienh sieqv bun njiec daaih nyei fun-faqv. Naaiv se loz-hnoi maaih banh zeic, maaih mengh dauh nyei mienh.
6.19: Meih oix zuqc dorh nyungc-nyungc maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv, liemh gouv liemh nyeiz, yietc nyungc yietc doix bieqc nzangv weic caux meih njoux cuotv maengc.
6.18: Mv baac yie oix caux meih laengz jiez ngaengc waac. Meih oix zuqc dorh meih nyei auv-jueiv dorn-mbuangz caux meih bieqc nzangv.
6.22: Tin-Hungh hnangv haaix nor paaiv Noyaa, Noyaa yaac ei jienv zoux nzengc.
6.13: Tin-Hungh ziouc gorngv mbuox Noyaa, “Yie dingc hnyouv oix mietc lungh ndiev mienh weic zuqc ninh mbuo zoux orqv sic buangv nzengc lungh ndiev. Mangc maah! Liemh ninh mbuo, liemh ndau-beih, yie oix mietc nzengc.
6.9: Yiem naaiv mingh gorngv Noyaa nyei jauv-louc. Noyaa zoux kuv mienh. Wuov jaax lungh ndiev kungx ninh ganh maiv maaih dorngx daanh hnangv. Ninh haaix zanc yaac gan longx Tin-Hungh.
6.5: Ziouv buatc yiem lungh ndiev mienh zoux waaic sic camv. Hnyouv haaix zanc kungx hnamv cuotv waaic nyei jauv hnangv.
6.14: Meih oix zuqc longc jiem haic nyei ndiangx gapv poux nzangv. Nzangv gu'nyuoz oix zuqc nqenx jienv yietc qongx yietc qongx nyei. Yaac oix zuqc longc ndau-ndiev nyouh haic nyei zung naic jienv gu'nyuoz ga'nyiec.
6.3: Ziouv ziouc gorngv, “Yie nyei Singx Lingh maiv caux baamh mienh yietc liuz yiem. Ninh mbuo benx orv sin hnangv. Yangh naaiv jiex ninh mbuo nyei hnyangx-jeiv ziangh duqv taux yietc baeqv nyic ziepc hnyangx.”
6.7: Ziouv gorngv, “Yie oix fioux nzengc, guaatv nzengc yie zeix daaih nyei mienh, maiv bun yiem ndau-beih. Liemh mienh liemh hieh zoih, nyorng ndau nyei ga'naaiv caux ndaamv-lungh nyei norqc oix mietc nzengc, weic zuqc yie hnamv-nzuonx, feix duqv maiv dungx zeix naaiv deix ga'naaiv.”
6.10: Noyaa maaih buo dauh dorn mbuox heuc Sem, Haam caux Yaafetv.
6.2: maaih deix doz-mienh dorn buatc baamh mienh nyei sieqv nzueic. Ninh mbuo yaac ginv deix longc zoux auv.
6.1: Yiem lungh ndiev mienh maanh jiez gorn hiaangx jienv faaux, aengx yungz duqv sieqv,
6.6: Ziouv haiz hnyouv mun haic, hnamv-nzuonx, feix duqv ninh maiv dungx zeix mienh maanh daaih yiem lungh ndiev. Ninh yaac nzauh haic.
6.8: Mv baac Noyaa zoux duqv horpc Ziouv  nyei hnyouv.
6.11: Tin-Hungh buatc lungh ndiev mienh waaic jienv njiec. Mienh kungx zoux doqc zoux orqv nyei sic hnangv.
6.16: Oix zuqc gomv jienv nzangv-liuh. Nzangv-liuh oix zuqc leih nzangv-sin yietc ndorqc hlang. Gaengh oix zuqc zoux yiem yietc bung nzangv-hlen hnangv. Naaiv poux nzangv oix zuqc nqenx zoux buo nzangh, gu'nguaaic, mbu'ndongx caux ga'ndiev.

8.21: Ziouv  haiz naaiv deix qiex ndaang, horpc hnyouv haic, ziouc yiem hnyouv hnamv, “Yie yietc liuz maiv aengx weic mienh zoux waaic sic houv ndau-beih, weic zuqc mienh maanh yiem faix nyei m'daaih kungx maaih hnyouv zoux waaic sic hnangv. Yangh naaiv jiex, yie maiv hnangv naaiv nzunc mietc nyungc-nyungc maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv.
8.12: Ninh aengx zuov siec hnoi liuz ziouc bungx norqc nqo cuotv nzunc. Naaiv nzunc norqc nqo maiv nzuonx aqv.
8.17: Caux meih yiem naaiv deix nyungc-nyungc maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv, norqc, saeng-kuv caux nyorng ndau nyei ga'naaiv oix zuqc dorh cuotv daaih weic bun ninh mbuo douc buonv hiaangx daaih buangv lungh ndiev.”
8.20: Noyaa ceix norm ziec-dorngh daaih weic Ziouv. Ninh aengx zorqv nyungc-nyungc maiv maaih uix nyei saeng-kuv caux nyungc-nyungc maiv maaih uix nyei norqc, an ziec-dorngh benx buov ziec nyei ga'naaiv.
8.4: Taux cietv hlaax ziepc cietv wuov hnoi, nzangv ziouc dingh jienv Aa^laa^latv Geh nyei yietc norm mbong-ningv.
8.19: Yietc zungv saeng-kuv caux nyorng ndau nyei ga'naaiv caux norqc, yietc zungv yiem ndau-beih haih dongz nyei ga'naaiv, yietc nyungc yietc nyungc nyei, cuotv nzangv nzengc.
8.18: Noyaa caux ninh nyei auv-jueiv dorn-mbuangz ziouc cuotv nzengc daaih aqv.
8.22: “Da'faanh baamh gen corc yiem jienv nyei ziangh hoc, zuangx nyei cun-ciou caux siou nyei cun-ciou, juangv nyei ziangh hoc caux yuoqv nyei ziangh hoc, dong-gen caux cun-gen, lungh hnoi zanc caux lungh muonz zanc, yietc liuz maiv haih nzengc.”
8.13: Noyaa duqv luoqc baeqv lengh yietc hnyangx, zih hlaax saeng-yietv wuov hnoi, ndau-beih nyei wuom nqaai mi'aqv. Noyaa ziouc caeqv tong nzangv-liuh mangc buatc ndau nqaai deix aqv.
8.9: Mv baac wuom corc yiemx jienv lungh ndiev. Norqc nqo lorz maiv duqv dorngx nzopc ziouc nzuonx daaih taux nzangv-hlen. Noyaa aengx sung buoz zipv bieqc nzangv.
8.5: Wuom aengx haapv jienv njiec taux ziepc hlaax saeng-yietv wuov hnoi, mbong-ningv ziouc cuotv daaih.
8.14: Taux nyeic hlaax nyic ziepc cietv wuov hnoi, ndau nqaai nzengc mi'aqv.
8.3: Wuom manc-manc haapv jienv njiec. Jiex liuz yietc baeqv hmz ziepc hnoi wuom corc haapv jienv njiec.
8.7: ziouc bungx norm norqc aa cuotv. Norqc aa kungx ndaix mingh ndaix daaih taux ga'ndiev ndau nyei wuom haapv nqaai nzengc.
8.10: Ninh zuov siec hnoi liuz aengx bungx norqc nqo yiem nzangv cuotv mingh.
8.2: Ndau-ndiev nyei wuom-zingv nyei kuotv yietc zungv ndipc mi'aqv. Gu'nguaaic lungh nyei gaengh yaac guon nzengc. Lungh yaac hlorngx mi'aqv.
8.1: Tin-Hungh zungv maiv la'kuqv Noyaa yaac caux ninh yiem nzangv wuov deix yietc zungv saeng-kuv hieh zoih. Tin-Hungh bun nziaaux buonc ndau-beih, wuom ziouc haapv jienv njiec.
8.6: Jiex liuz feix ziepc hnoi, Noyaa koi nqoi dongh ninh zoux daaih yiem nzangv nyei fong muonh
8.8: Noyaa aengx bungx norm norqc nqo cuotv mingh weic zuqc ninh oix hiuv duqv ndau-beih nyei wuom haapv fai maiv gaengh haapv.
8.11: Lungh maanz-hmuangx norqc nqo nzuonx taux Noyaa wuov, nzuih baengx ndaam jienv yietc kuaaiv ga'lanv normh maeng nyei, nyiemz nyei. Noyaa ziouc hiuv duqv wuom haapv njiec mi'aqv.
8.16: “Meih caux meih nyei auv-jueiv dorn-mbuangz cuotv nzangv aqv.

46.21: Mben^yaa^min nyei dorn se Mbelaa, Mbeke, Atc^mben, Gelaa, Naa^aa^maan, E^hai, Lo^atc, Mapv^bim, Hupc^bim caux Aatc.
46.15: Naaiv deix se Le^aa yiem Batc^ndaan Aalam yungz bun Yaakopv nyei dorn-jueiv fun-faqv. Aengx maaih dauh sieqv, mbuox heuc Ndinaa. Le^aa nyei buonc dorn-jueiv fun-faqv yietc zungv maaih faah ziepc faam dauh.
46.12: Yu^ndaa nyei dorn se E^aa, Onan, Qelaa, Beletv caux Zelaa. (Mv baac E^aa caux Onan yiem Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung wuov zanc guei seix mi'aqv.) Beletv nyei dorn se Hetv^lon caux Haamun.
46.17: Aa^se nyei dorn se Imnaa, Itc^waa, Itc^wi caux Mbe^li^yaa. Naaiv deix dorn nyei muoc heuc Se^laa^aa. Mbe^li^yaa nyei dorn se He^mbe caux Man^ki^en.
46.30: I^saa^laa^en gorngv mbuox Yosepv, “Ih zanc yie duqv buatc liuz meih, hiuv duqv meih corc ziangh jienv nyei, yie daic yaac hnyouv nqaai aqv.”
46.20: Yosepv yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung duqv Maa^natv^se caux E^faa^im, se On Zingh nyei sai mienh, Bo^ti^fe^laa, nyei sieqv, Aa^se^natv, yungz bun ninh.
46.4: Yie caux meih mingh I^yipv Deic-Bung, ndongc haaix zungv oix dorh meih nzuonx daaih. Meih guei seix nyei ziangh hoc, Yosepv ganh oix tengx meih nyei m'zing njipv.
46.28: Yaakopv heuc Yu^ndaa mingh ndaangc mbuox Yosepv ninh gan jienv jauv daaih Gosen aqv. Ninh mbuo mingh taux Gosen Deic,
46.33: Faalo Hungh heuc meih mbuo daaih lorz ninh wuov zanc, ninh oix naaic meih mbuo, ‘Meih mbuo zoux haaix nyungc gong nyanc nyei mienh?’
46.19: Yaakopv nyei auv, Laasen, nyei dorn se Yosepv caux Mben^yaa^min.
46.34: Meih mbuo oix zuqc dau, ‘Yie mbuo, meih nyei bou, faix-faix nyei m'daaih yungz saeng-kuv taux ih zanc, hnangv yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix nor.’ Meih mbuo hnangv naaiv nor gorngv nor, ninh ziouc bun meih mbuo yiem Gosen, weic zuqc I^yipv Mienh youx haic yungz yungh nyei mienh.”
46.18: Naaiv deix se Laa^mbaan bun ninh nyei sieqv, Le^aa, wuov dauh nouh beiz, Sinx^baa, yungz bun Yaakopv nyei dorn-jueiv fun-faqv. Yietc zungv maaih ziepc luoqc dauh.
46.22: Naaiv deix se Laasen yungz bun Yaakopv nyei dorn-jueiv fun-faqv. Yietc zungv maaih ziepc feix dauh.
46.13: Itc^saax^kaa nyei dorn se Tolaa, Buwaa, I^opc caux Simlon.
46.9: Lu^mben nyei dorn se Haanokv, Banlu, Hetv^lon, caux Kaanmi.
46.26: Gan Yaakopv mingh I^yipv Deic-Bung wuov zanc, ninh ganh nyei dorn-jueiv fun-faqv maaih luoqc ziepc luoqc dauh, cih cuotv ninh nyei mbuangz.
46.5: Yaakopv yiem Mbe^e^qe^mbaa Deic cuotv jauv. Ninh nyei dorn mbuo bun ninh mbuo nyei die caux ninh mbuo nyei fu'jueiv-faix caux ninh mbuo yietc zungv nyei auv faaux Faalo Hungh bun daaih zipv Yaakopv mbuo wuov deix ngongh cie mingh.
46.27: Aengx maaih Yosepv yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung duqv wuov deix i dauh dorn. Yaakopv bieqc I^yipv Deic-Bung wuov zanc, ninh nyei dorn-jueiv fun-faqv yietc zungv maaih cietv ziepc dauh.
46.14: Se^mbu^lun nyei dorn se Seletv, Elon caux Yaa^le^en.
46.3: Tin-Hungh gorngv, “Yie se Tin-Hungh, meih nyei die nyei Tin-Hungh. Maiv dungx gamh nziex. Gunv mingh I^yipv Deic-Bung aqv, weic zuqc yiem wuov yie zungv bun meih benx yietc fingx hlo nyei.
46.7: Ninh dorh jienv ninh nyei dorn, dorn-fun, sieqv, sieqv-fun, se ninh nyei yietc zungv fun-faqv mingh taux I^yipv.
46.10: Si^me^on nyei dorn se Ye^mu^en, Yaamin, O^haatc, Yaakin, So^haax caux Saa^un. Saa^un zoux Kaa^naa^an sieqv nyei dorn.
46.2: Lungh muonz zanc Tin-Hungh hinc cuotv daaih heuc ninh, “Yaakopv aac, Yaakopv!” Yaakopv dau, “Oeix! Yie yiem naaiv oc.”
46.1: I^saa^laa^en dorh jienv ninh maaih nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv cuotv jauv mingh taux Mbe^e^qe^mbaa Deic yiem wuov ziec ninh nyei die, I^sakc, nyei Tin-Hungh.
46.31: Yosepv gorngv mbuox ninh nyei muoz-doic caux ninh nyei die mbuo yietc zungv hmuangv doic, “Yie oix mbuox Faalo Hungh, ‘Yie nyei muoz-doic caux yie nyei die mbuo hmuangv doic yietc zungv yiem Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung ih zanc daaih taux yie naaiv daaih aqv.
46.6: Ninh mbuo yaac dorh jienv yiem Kaa^naa^an duqv daaih nyei saeng-kuv caux nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv mingh I^yipv Deic-Bung. Yaakopv caux ninh nyei fun-faqv yietc zungv mingh.
46.8: Yiem naaiv mingh gorngv mingh yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung nyei I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei mbuox. Se Yaakopv caux ninh nyei fun-faqv. Maaih Yaakopv nyei dorn-hlo, Lu^mben.
46.24: Napv^taa^li nyei dorn se Yaa^si^en, Guni, Yese caux Sinlem.
46.25: Naaiv deix se Laa^mbaan bun ninh nyei sieqv, Laasen, wuov dauh nouh beiz, Mbin^haa, yungz bun Yaakopv nyei dorn-jueiv fun-faqv. Yietc zungv maaih siec dauh.
46.29: Yosepv mbenc ninh nyei maaz-cie mingh Gosen zipv ninh nyei die, I^saa^laa^en. Yosepv yietv buatc, ziouc qam jienv ninh nyei die qaqv nyiemv lauh nyei.
46.11: Lewi nyei dorn se Geson, Ko^haatv caux Me^laa^li.
46.32: Yie oix mbuox ninh meih mbuo zoux yungz yungh, yungz saeng-kuv nyei mienh. Meih mbuo dorh jienv meih mbuo nyei yungh, saeng-kuv caux nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv daaih.’
46.16: Gaatc nyei dorn se Si^fi^yon, Hakv^gi, Suni, Etc^mbon, E^le^i, Aa^lo^ndi caux Aa^le^li.

7.21: Nyungc-nyungc yiem ndau-beih maaih maengc, haih dongz nyei ga'naaiv, se norqc caux saeng-kuv hieh zoih, haih nyorng ndau nyei ga'naaiv caux mienh maanh daic nzengc mi'aqv.
7.15: Yietc zungv maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv, yietc nyungc maaih yietc nyungc nyei doix, daaih caux Noyaa bieqc nzangv.
7.12: duih domh mbiungc njiec feix ziepc hnoi feix ziepc muonz.
7.17: Mbiungc-suiv-imx yiemx jienv ndau faaux feix ziepc hnoi. Wuom buangv jienv faaux, nzangv ziouc yiem ndau-beih mbiouh jienv faaux.
7.20: Corc aengx yiemx faaux ziqc mbong-ningv ziepc hmz ndorqc.
7.4: Yiem naaiv mingh siec hnoi hnangv, yie oix bun lungh duih mbiungc feix ziepc hnoi feix ziepc muonz. Yie yaac oix zorqv yie zeix daaih yiem ndau-beih maaih maengc nyei nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv mietc nzengc.”
7.19: Wuom buangv jienv faaux taux yiemx nzengc lungh ndiev hlang jiex nyei mbong-ningv.
7.18: Wuom buangv jienv faaux, nzangv mbiouh jienv wuom-minc mingh.
7.22: Da'faanh yiem ndau-beih maaih maengc, haih tauv qiex nyei ga'naaiv daic nzengc mi'aqv.
7.23: Yiem ndau-beih maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv yietc zungv zuqc guaatv zuqc mietc nzengc. Liemh mienh maanh, saeng-kuv, haih nyorng ndau nyei ga'naaiv caux yiem ndaamv-lungh nyei norqc zuqc guaatv zuqc mietc nzengc. Kungx zengc Noyaa aengx caux ninh yiem nzangv gu'nyuoz wuov deix hnangv.
7.13: Dongh wuov hnoi, Noyaa caux ninh nyei buo dauh dorn, Sem, Haam caux Yaafetv caux Noyaa nyei auv caux ninh nyei buo dauh mbuangz bieqc nzangv.
7.9: yietc doix yietc doix nyei, maaih dauh gouv maaih dauh nyeiz, daaih caux Noyaa bieqc nzangv ei Tin-Hungh paaiv nyei waac.
7.5: Noyaa ziouc ei jienv Ziouv  paaiv nyei waac zoux ziangx nzengc.
7.14: Ninh mbuo dorh nyungc-nyungc hieh zoih, nyungc-nyungc saeng-kuv caux nyungc-nyungc nyorng ndau-beih nyei ga'naaiv. Ninh mbuo yaac dorh nyungc-nyungc norqc, se yietc zungv maaih ndaatv nyei ga'naaiv, yietc nyungc ziux yietc nyungc nyei buonv.
7.3: Yiem ndaamv-lungh nyei norqc yietc nyungc oix zuqc dorh siec doix, yietc doix maaih norm gorngx maaih norm nyeiz. Oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor siex cuotv norqc caux saeng-kuv nyei maengc weic bun yiem lungh ndiev douc buonv.
7.7: Ninh caux ninh nyei auv-jueiv dorn-mbuangz bieqc nzangv mingh biaux ndutv mbiungc-suiv-imx yiemx.
7.10: Jiex liuz siec hnoi, mbiungc-suiv-imx yiemx lungh ndiev aqv.
7.2: Da'faanh maiv maaih uix nyei saeng-kuv, oix zuqc dorh yietc nyungc siec doix, siec dauh gouv siec dauh nyeiz, bieqc nzangv. Maaih uix nyei saeng-kuv oix zuqc dorh yietc nyungc yietc doix, yietc dauh gouv yietc dauh nyeiz.
7.1: Ziouv gorngv mbuox Noyaa, “Meih caux meih nyei yietc biauv hmuangv doic oix zuqc bieqc nzangv aqv. Yiem naaiv jaax lungh ndiev yie buatc kungx meih ganh hnangv zoux duqv horpc yie nyei hnyouv.
7.6: Mbiungc-suiv-imx yiemx lungh ndiev wuov zanc, Noyaa duqv luoqc baeqv hnyangx.
7.8: Maaih uix fai maiv maaih uix nyei saeng-kuv caux norqc caux nyorng ndau-beih nyei ga'naaiv
7.24: Wuom yiemx jienv lungh ndiev yietc baeqv hmz ziepc hnoi.
7.11: Noyaa buangv luoqc baeqv hnyangx wuov hnyangx, nyeic hlaax ziepc cietv wuov hnoi, ndau-ndiev nyei wuom-zingv mbeux cuotv, lungh nyei gaengh yietc zungv nqoi,
7.16: Daaih bieqc nzangv nyei nyungc-nyungc saeng-kuv, maaih dauh gouv maaih dauh nyeiz, ziux Tin-Hungh paaiv Noyaa nyei waac. Ziouv ganh ziouc guon jienv nzangv nyei gaengh.

32.21: Yaakopv fungx zingh nyeic mingh ndaangc. Ninh ganh aeqv, aengx bueix muonz wuov ndopv-liuh ciangv.
32.15: caux faah ziepc dauh lorh torh dorh jienv dorn nyei, caux feix ziepc dauh ngongh nyeiz, ziepc dauh ngongh gouv, caux nyic ziepc dauh lorh nyeiz, ziepc dauh lorh gouv.
32.12: Ziouv gorngv jiex, ‘Yie oix bun meih duqv longx yaac bun meih nyei zeiv-fun ndongc koiv-hlen nyei saa-ziou camv, zungv saauv maiv zienz.’+”
32.17: Yaakopv yaac gorngv mbuox mingh ndaangc wuov dauh, “Buangh zuqc yie nyei gorx, Esaau, wuov zanc, ninh naaic gaax meih, ‘Meih nyei ziouv dongh haaix dauh?’ caux ‘Meih mingh haaix? Mingh ndaangc naaiv deix saeng-kuv se haaix dauh nyei?’
32.30: Yaakopv gorngv, “Yie hmien doix hmien buatc liuz Tin-Hungh, yie corc maaih maengc ziangh nyei.” Ninh ziouc cuotv wuov norm dorngx nyei mbuox heuc Be^ni^en.
32.20: Meih mbuo oix zuqc gorngv, ‘Meih nyei bou, Yaakopv, gan jienv yie mbuo nqa'haav daaih.’+” Weic zuqc Yaakopv yiem hnyouv hnamv, “Yie fungx zingh nyeic mingh ndaangc nunz jienv ninh nyei hnyouv. Yie duqv buatc ninh nyei hmien nziex ninh caux yie zoux horpc mv bei.”
32.4: Ninh yaac njaaux ziangx waac ninh mbuo. Ninh gorngv, “Meih mbuo oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor mbuox yie nyei ziouv, Esaau, oc. Mbuox ninh, ‘Meih nyei bou, Yaakopv, gorngv, yie mingh caux Laa^mbaan yiem taux ih zanc.
32.28: Wuov dauh mienh gorngv, “Yiem naaiv mingh meih nyei mbuox maiv heuc Yaakopv aqv. Meih nyei mbuox heuc I^saa^laa^en, weic zuqc meih caux Tin-Hungh borngz jaax yaac borngz duqv hingh. Caux mienh borngz jaax yaac borngz duqv hingh.”
32.19: Yaakopv njaaux ziangx da'nyeic caux da'faam aengx caux dauh dauh horngh saeng-kuv nyei mienh, “Buangh Esaau nyei ziangh hoc oix zuqc dongh joux waac gorngv.
32.18: Oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor dau. ‘Dongh meih nyei bou, Yaakopv, nyei. Ninh fungx naaiv deix saeng-kuv daaih zoux zingh nyeic bun ninh nyei ziouv, Esaau. Yaakopv ganh yaac gan jienv nqa'haav daaih.’+”
32.22: Wuov muonz Yaakopv jiez sin dorh ninh nyei i dauh auv, i dauh nouh beiz, caux ninh nyei ziepc yietv dauh fu'jueiv, yangh Yapv^mborkc Ndaaih nyei jauv-bouc jiex wuov ngaanc ziqc Yapv^mborkc Ndaaih.
32.23: Ninh aengx fungx ninh nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv jiex nzengc.
32.13: Wuov muonz Yaakopv hitv wuov norm dorngx. Ninh ginv cuotv deix ninh maaih nyei ga'naaiv zoux zingh nyeic bun ninh nyei gorx, Esaau.
32.9: Yaakopv daux gaux gorngv, “Yie nyei ong, Apc^laa^ham, nyei Tin-Hungh caux yie nyei die, I^sakc, nyei Tin-Hungh aac. O Ziouv,  meih mbuox yie nzuonx yie ganh nyei buonv-deic-bung, yie nyei cien-ceqv muoz-doic nyei dorngx. Meih yaac oix bun yie duqv longx.
32.26: Wuov dauh mienh gorngv, “Bungx yie maah! Lungh njang aqv niaa.” Yaakopv dau, “Meih maiv buang waac yie nor, yie maiv bungx meih.”
32.5: Yie maaih ngongh, lorh, ba'gi yungh caux yungh, maaih nouh gauv nouh beiz. Yie paaiv mienh mingh mbuox meih, yie nyei ziouv, tov meih nqoi fim nqoi eix bun yie.’+”
32.27: Wuov dauh mienh naaic gaax, “Meih nyei mbuox heuc haaix nyungc?” Ninh dau, “Yie heuc Yaakopv.”
32.14: Ninh zorqv cuotv nyic baeqv dauh yungh nyeiz, nyic ziepc dauh yungh gouv, caux nyic baeqv dauh ba'gi yungh nyeiz, nyic ziepc dauh ba'gi yungh gouv,
32.3: Yaakopv paaiv deix douc fienx mienh mingh ndaangc taux Se^i Deic, E^ndom Deic-Bung, lorz ninh nyei gorx, Esaau.
32.7: Yaakopv gamh nziex haic yaac nzauh haic aqv, ziouc zorqv gan ninh daaih nyei mienh caux ngongh guanh, ba'gi yungh guanh, yungh guanh, caux lorh torh bun nqoi zoux i guanh.
32.10: Yie maiv puix meih ndongc naaiv korv-lienh, ziepc zuoqv nyei zoux bun yie, meih nyei bou. Jiex Jor^ndaen Ndaaih wuov zanc yie kungx maaih nduqc diuh biaav-mbiaac hnangv. Ih zanc yie aengx nzuonx maaih naaiv deix i guanh mienh caux saeng-kuv.
32.2: Yaakopv buatc fin-mienh ninh gorngv, “Naaiv se Tin-Hungh nyei baeng.” Ninh ziouc cuotv wuov norm dorngx nyei mbuox heuc Maa^haa^naa^im.
32.1: Yaakopv gan jienv jauv mingh wuov zanc, maaih deix Tin-Hungh nyei fin-mienh daaih buangh ninh.
32.31: Yaakopv jiex Be^ni^en wuov zanc, mba'hnoi cuotv daaih aqv. Ninh ziouc la'mbai-la'mbai nyei mingh aqv, laaix ninh nyei camh zuih mbungv piatv mingh.
32.6: Douc fienx mienh nzuonx taux Yaakopv wuov gorngv, “Yie mbuo taux meih nyei gorx Esaau wuov mi'aqv. Ih zanc ninh daaih buangh meih, aengx maaih feix baeqv dauh mienh caux jienv ninh daaih.”
32.8: Ninh yiem hnyouv hnamv, “Se gorngv Esaau daaih zoux waaic daauh guanh, da'nyeic guanh corc haih biaux duqv ndutv.”
32.24: Kungx zengc ninh ganh yiem wuov hnangv. Aengx maaih dauh mienh daaih caux ninh borngz jaax taux lungh aav lamh njang.
32.25: Wuov dauh mienh haiz ninh borngz maiv hingh Yaakopv, ninh ziouc muoqv Yaakopv nyei camh zuih mbungv piatv mingh.
32.29: Yaakopv gorngv, “Tov mbuox yie, meih nyei mbuox heuc haaix nyungc?” Mv baac ninh dau, “Meih weic haaix diuc naaic yie nyei mbuox?” Ninh ziouc yiem wuov buang waac Yaakopv.
32.11: Tov meih njoux yie biaux ndutv yie nyei gorx, Esaau, nyei buoz-ndiev weic zuqc yie gamh nziex ninh oix daaih daix nzengc yie mbuo, liemh m'sieqv dorn caux fu'jueiv daix nzengc.
32.32: Laaix Yaakopv zuqc wuov dauh mienh muoqv ninh nyei camh zuih mbungv piatv mingh, yiem naaic daaih taux ih zanc, I^saa^laa^en Mienh maiv nyanc camh zuih mbungv nyei jaan.
32.16: Ninh bun nqoi yietc nyungc zoux yietc guanh, yietc guanh bun yietc dauh bou goux. Ninh aengx mbuox bou, “Meih oix zuqc horngh saeng-kuv mingh ndaangc yie. Yietc guanh caux yietc guanh oix zuqc leih saa deix.”

25.21: Le^mbe^kaa maiv maaih fu'jueiv, I^sakc ziouc weic ninh nyei auv daux gaux tov Ziouv bun ninh nyei auv maaih fu'jueiv. Ziouv  ei I^sakc tov nyei waac zoux, Le^mbe^kaa ziouc maaih gu'nguaaz aqv.
25.15: Haa^ndatc, Temaa, Yetu, Naafitv, caux Ke^nde^maa.
25.12: Ih zanc gorngv Apc^laa^ham nyei dorn, I^saa^maa^en, nyei zeiv-fun, dongh Saalaa nyei nouh beiz, I^yipv Mienh, Haagaa, yungz bun Apc^laa^ham wuov dauh dorn nyei zeiv-fun.
25.17: I^saa^maa^en nyei hnyangx-jeiv ziangh duqv yietc baeqv faah ziepc cietv hnyangx, ninh dangx qiex, guei seix mi'aqv.
25.30: Ninh gorngv mbuox Yaakopv, “Yie hnyouv sie, oix daic haic aqv. Bun deix wuov nyungc ga'naaiv-siqv yie naqv gaax.” (Weic naaiv mienh cuotv mbuox heuc ninh zoux E^ndom.)
25.20: I^sakc longc Le^mbe^kaa zoux auv wuov zanc ninh duqv feix ziepc hnyangx. Le^mbe^kaa zoux Mbe^tu^en nyei sieqv. Mbe^tu^en se Aalam Mienh, yiem Batc^ndaan Aalam. Le^mbe^kaa yaac zoux Aalam Mienh, Laa^mbaan nyei muoc.
25.4: Mi^ndien nyei dorn heuc E^faa, Efe, Haanokv, Aa^mbi^ndaa caux En^ndaa^aa. Naaiv deix yietc zungv zoux Ke^tu^laa nyei zeiv-fun.
25.28: I^sakc gauh hnamv Esaau, weic zuqc ninh duqv nyanc Esaau buonv daaih nyei orv. Mv baac Le^mbe^kaa gauh hnamv Yaakopv.
25.33: Yaakopv gorngv, “Mv baac meih oix zuqc houv maaic bun yie ndaangc.” Esaau houv liuz ziouc maaic ninh zoux dorn-hlo duqv sung-gouv nyei leiz bun Yaakopv mi'aqv.
25.19: Yiem naaiv mingh gorngv Apc^laa^ham nyei dorn, I^sakc, nyei jauv-louc. Apc^laa^ham zoux I^sakc nyei die.
25.34: Yaakopv ziouc zorqv deix njuov caux dopc bun Esaau nyanc. Nyanc liuz hopv liuz, Esaau ziouc jiez sin mingh mi'aqv. Maiv korv-fiqv ninh zoux dorn-hlo duqv sung-gouv nyei leiz.
25.18: I^saa^maa^en nyei zeiv-fun mbuo yiem Haa^wi^laa caux Suwaa mbu'ndongx, yaac yiem nitv I^yipv Deic-Bung nyei gapv-jaaix, mingh Atc^si^lie Deic-Bung wuov diuh jauv. Ninh mbuo nyei zeiv-fun maiv caux Apc^laa^ham nyei ganh deix zeiv-fun yiem.
25.22: Maaih sung-gu'nguaaz. Gu'nguaaz yiem maa nyei ga'sie borngz jaax. Le^mbe^kaa gorngv, “Yie weic haaix diuc ndongc naaiv kouv?” Ninh ziouc mingh naaic Ziouv.
25.23: Ziouv  gorngv mbuox ninh, “Maaih i fingx mienh yiem meih nyei ga'sie gu'nyuoz. Meih yungz cuotv naaiv deix i fingx, yietc fingx caux yietc fingx oix bun nqoi. Naaiv fingx oix gauh henv wuov fingx. Gorx yaac oix zuqc fu-sux youz.”
25.13: Yiem naaiv mingh gorngv I^saa^maa^en nyei dorn nyei mbuox zueih hlo taux faix. Dorn-hlo heuc Ne^mbaa^yotv. Aengx maaih Ke^ndaa, Atc^mbe^en, Mipv^samx,
25.9: Ninh nyei dorn, I^sakc caux I^saa^maa^en, dorh ninh mingh zangx nitv Mamle wuov norm Makv^be^laa mbaengx-kuotv. Naaiv norm mbaengx-kuotv yiem Hitv^tai Mienh, So^haax nyei dorn, E^fo^lon, nyei ndeic.
25.26: Nqa'haav yungz wuov dauh nanv jienv ninh nyei gorx, Esaau, nyei zaux-nqo cuotv. Ninh mbuo ziouc cuotv mbuox heuc Yaakopv. Le^mbe^kaa yungz naaiv deix i dauh dorn wuov zanc, I^sakc duqv luoqc ziepc hnyangx.
25.5: Apc^laa^ham jiu ninh nyei jaa-dingh yietc zungv ga'naaiv bun ninh nyei dorn, I^sakc, nzipc nzengc.
25.27: Naaiv deix i dauh dorn hlo daaih. Esaau zoux dauh buonv orv henv haic nyei mienh. Haaix zanc yaac oix mingh gemh buonv orv. Yaakopv aeqv, waac zoqc, hnyouv ndo nyei mienh. Ninh oix yiem biauv gauh camv.
25.3: Yokv^saan nyei dorn nyei mbuox heuc Qe^mbaa caux Nde^ndaan. Nde^ndaan nyei dorn bun njiec benx Atc^su^lim, Le^tu^sim caux Le^um^mim Mienh.
25.7: Apc^laa^ham nyei hnyangx-jeiv ziangh duqv yietc baeqv cietv ziepc hmz hnyangx.
25.10: Se Apc^laa^ham tengx Hitv^tai Mienh maaiz nyei ndeic. Apc^laa^ham caux ninh nyei auv, Saalaa, ziouc zangx jienv wuov aqv.
25.2: Ke^tu^laa yungz duqv camv-dauh dorn bun ninh. Maaih Simx^laan, Yokv^saan, Me^ndaan, Mi^ndien, Itc^mbaakc caux Quwaa.
25.1: Apc^laa^ham aengx longc dauh auv, mbuox heuc Ke^tu^laa.
25.31: Yaakopv gorngv, “Maaic meih zoux dorn-hlo duqv sung-gouv nyei leiz bun yie ndaangc maah!”
25.6: Mv baac Apc^laa^ham maiv gaengh guei seix wuov zanc ninh bun zingh nyeic ninh nyei auv-dorn nyei dorn mbuo. Nqa'haav ziouc heuc ninh mbuo leih nqoi I^sakc mingh yiem dong bung maengx nyei deic-bung,
25.8: Ninh ziangh duqv siouc nyuonh ndaauv, benx mienh gox mienh ziouc dangx qiex, guei seix mi'aqv.
25.24: Taux yungz nyei ziangh hoc ninh ziouc yungz duqv sung-gu'nguaaz-dorn.
25.25: Yungz cuotv ndaangc wuov dauh, sin siqv nyei, ziangh sin cuotv biei suqv-suqv wuov, hnangv maaih biei nyei ndopv-lui nor. Ninh mbuo ziouc cuotv mbuox heuc Esaau.
25.29: Maaih hnoi nor, Yaakopv wuonh jienv dopc siqv, Esaau mingh gemh nzuonx daaih, hnyouv za'gengh! sie haic.
25.11: Apc^laa^ham guei seix liuz, Tin-Hungh ceix fuqv bun ninh nyei dorn, I^sakc. I^sakc yiem nitv Mbe^e Laa^hai Loi.
25.32: Esaau dau, “Mangc maah! Yie oix daic haic aqv. Zoux gorx duqv sung-gouv nyei leiz weic yie maaih haaix nyungc maaih lamh longc?”
25.16: Naaiv se I^saa^maa^en nyei dorn nyei mbuox. Ninh bun njiec zoux ziepc nyeic fingx nyei bieiv zeiv. Ninh mbuo liepc nyei laangz caux corng ndopv-liuh nyei dorngx gan ninh mbuo ganh nyei mbuox heuc.

17.21: Mv baac yie liepc nyei ngaengc waac, yie oix caux I^sakc liepc, dongh Saalaa taux da'nyeic hnyangx naaiv norm ziangh hoc oix yungz wuov dauh.”
17.15: Tin-Hungh aengx gorngv mbuox Apc^laa^ham, “Meih nyei auv, Saalaai, yiem naaiv mingh maiv heuc Saalaai aqv. Oix zuqc heuc Saalaa.
17.12: Meih doic jiex doic nyei m'jangc dorn, da'faanh gu'nguaaz-dorn cuotv seix daaih duqv hietc hnoi wuov hnoi oix zuqc jiex gaatv nyei leiz. Liemh yiem meih nyei biauv zong cuotv seix nyei caux longc nyaanh tengx ganh fingx maaiz daaih nyei mienh, se maiv zeiz meih mbuo ganh nyei cien zeiv-fun, oix zuqc jiex gaatv nyei leiz.
17.17: Apc^laa^ham puoqv njiec ndau jatv jienv yiem hnyouv hnamv, “Duqv yietc baeqv hnyangx nyei m'jangc dorn corc haih maaih fu'jueiv fai ni? Saalaa duqv juov ziepc hnyangx ninh corc haih maaih gu'nguaaz nyei?”
17.20: Mv baac yie haiz meih tengx I^saa^maa^en tov, yie ziouc ceix fuqv bun ninh yaac bun ninh maaih zeiv-fun hiaangx daaih camv. Ninh oix zoux ziepc nyeic dauh bieiv zeiv nyei die. Yie yaac oix bun ninh nyei zeiv-fun benx yietc guoqv hlo nyei.
17.4: “Naaiv se yie caux meih liepc nyei ngaengc waac. Meih ziouc zoux camv-fingx mienh nyei ong-taaix-ngaeqv.
17.19: Tin-Hungh dau, “Maiv zeiz. Se meih nyei auv, Saalaa ganh, oix yungz dauh dorn bun meih. Meih oix zuqc tengx ninh cuotv mbuox heuc I^sakc. Yie oix caux ninh liepc ngaengc waac, se caux ninh nyei hoz doic zeiv-fun liepc yietc liuz nyei ngaengc waac.
17.18: Ninh mbuox Tin-Hungh, “O tov meih ceix fuqv bun I^saa^maa^en.”
17.22: Tin-Hungh caux Apc^laa^ham gorngv liuz naaiv deix waac, Tin-Hungh ziouc leih nqoi ninh mi'aqv.
17.23: Dongh wuov hnoi Apc^laa^ham ei jienv Tin-Hungh nyei waac zoux. Ninh tengx ninh nyei dorn, I^saa^maa^en, caux yiem ninh nyei biauv zong dauh dauh m'jangc dorn, maiv gunv yiem ninh nyei biauv cuotv seix fai longc nyaanh tengx ganh fingx maaiz nyei, yietc zungv m'jangc dorn jiex gaatv nyei leiz nzengc aqv.
17.13: Maiv gunv yiem meih nyei biauv zong cuotv seix fai longc meih nyei nyaanh maaiz daaih, dauh dauh zungv oix zuqc jiex gaatv nyei leiz. Hnangv naaiv se yiem meih mbuo nyei sin zoux jangx-hoc bun cing yie caux meih mbuo liepc jiez yietc liuz nyei ngaengc waac.
17.9: Tin-Hungh gorngv mbuox Apc^laa^ham, “Meih ganh aengx caux meih nyei hoz doic zeiv-fun oix zuqc doic jiex doic ei jienv yie nyei ngaengc waac.
17.26: Dongh wuov hnoi Apc^laa^ham caux ninh nyei dorn, I^saa^maa^en, jiex gaatv nyei leiz.
17.5: Yangh naaiv jiex meih nyei mbuox maiv heuc Apc^laam aqv. Meih nyei mbuox oix zuqc heuc Apc^laa^ham, weic zuqc yie bun meih zoux camv-fingx mienh nyei ong-taaix-ngaeqv.
17.27: Ninh nyei biauv zong yietc zungv m'jangc dorn, se yiem ninh nyei biauv cuotv seix fai longc nyaanh tengx ganh fingx maaiz daaih nyei mienh, caux Apc^laa^ham mbuo yietc njiec jiex gaatv nyei leiz.
17.14: Haaix dauh m'jangc dorn maiv jiex gaatv nyei leiz ziouc yiem ninh nyei mienh mbu'ndongx zuqc pai guangc, laaix ninh maiv ei yie nyei ngaengc waac.”
17.3: Apc^laam ziouc puoqv njiec ndau. Tin-Hungh gorngv mbuox ninh,
17.7: Yie caux meih aengx caux meih doic jiex doic nyei zeiv-fun liepc jiez ngaengc waac, benx yietc liuz nyei ngaengc waac. Se yie laengz zoux meih nyei Tin-Hungh yaac zoux meih nyei hoz doic zeiv-fun nyei Tin-Hungh.
17.10: Naaiv se yie caux meih aengx caux meih nyei hoz doic zeiv-fun liepc nyei ngaengc waac, dongh meih mbuo oix zuqc ei jienv nyei ngaengc waac. Yiem meih mbuo gu'nyuoz nyei dauh dauh m'jangc dorn oix zuqc jiex gaatv nyei leiz.
17.2: Yie oix caux meih liepc ngaengc waac yaac oix bun meih nyei zeiv-fun hiaangx jienv faaux camv.”
17.1: Apc^laam nyei hnyangx-jeiv duqv juov ziepc juov hnyangx wuov zanc, Ziouv hinc cuotv daaih mbuox ninh, “Yie se Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh. Meih oix zuqc muangx yie nyei waac, zanc-zanc zoux horpc, maiv lamh nqemh dorngx.
17.6: Yie oix bun meih nyei zeiv-fun hiaangx camv daaih, zungv benx ziex fingx mienh, yaac maaih camv-dauh hungh yiem meih cuotv daaih.
17.8: Dongh meih ih zanc yiem jienv benx ganh fingx mienh naaiv norm deic-bung, se Kaa^naa^an nyei yietc zungv deic-bung, yie oix jiu bun meih, bun meih caux meih nyei zeiv-fun yietc liuz duqv nzipc. Yie yaac oix zoux ninh mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh.”
17.24: Jiex gaatv nyei leiz wuov zanc Apc^laa^ham duqv juov ziepc juov hnyangx.
17.25: Ninh nyei dorn, I^saa^maa^en, duqv ziepc faam hnyangx.
17.11: Meih oix zuqc jiex gaatv nyei leiz weic zoux yie caux meih liepc ngaengc waac nyei jangx-hoc.
17.16: Yie oix ceix fuqv bun ninh, zungv oix bun ninh yungz dauh dorn bun meih. Yie oix ceix fuqv ninh, bun ninh zoux camv-fingx mienh nyei m'gux taaix ngaeqv. Yaac oix maaih camv-fingx mienh nyei hungh yiem ninh cuotv.”

12.15: Faalo Hungh nyei jien buatc liuz Saalaai ziouc mingh ceng bun hungh diex muangx. Nqa'haav dorh Saalaai mingh yiem hungh diex nyei dinc.
12.18: Hungh diex heuc Apc^laam daaih ziouc gorngv, “Meih weic haaix diuc hnangv naaiv nor zoux bun yie? Meih fungc maiv gorngv zaqc ninh zoux meih nyei auv?
12.12: I^yipv Mienh buatc meih, ninh mbuo ziouc gorngv, ‘Naaiv se ninh nyei auv,’ ziouc daix yie mv baac liouh meih.
12.13: Meih oix zuqc mbuox ninh mbuo meih zoux yie nyei muoc, ninh mbuo ziouc weic meih zoux longx bun yie yaac weic meih liouh yie nyei maengc.”
12.19: Meih weic haaix diuc gorngv ninh zoux meih nyei muoc, nduov yie dorh daaih zoux yie nyei auv? Naaiv meih nyei auv. Dorh jienv ninh mingh aqv.”
12.5: Apc^laam dorh jienv ninh nyei auv, Saalaai, caux ninh nyei fun, Lotv, liemh ninh yiem Haalaan zornc daaih nyei nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv caux duqv daaih nyei dauh dauh mienh cuotv jauv mingh Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung. Ninh mbuo ziouc mingh taux Kaa^naa^an mi'aqv.
12.20: Hungh diex yaac paaiv ninh nyei mienh dorh Apc^laam caux ninh nyei auv, liemh ninh nyei nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv, cuotv deic-bung.
12.11: Aav lamh deix bieqc I^yipv Deic-Bung wuov zanc, Apc^laam gorngv mbuox ninh nyei auv, Saalaai, “Yie hiuv duqv meih se nzueic haic nyei m'sieqv dorn.
12.14: Apc^laam bieqc I^yipv Deic-Bung wuov zanc, I^yipv Mienh buatc ninh nyei auv za'gengh nzueic haic.
12.3: Haaix dauh buang waac meih, yie ziouc ceix fuqv bun wuov dauh. Haaix dauh zioux meih, yie oix zioux wuov dauh. Weic meih yie oix ceix fuqv bun lungh ndiev fingx-fingx mienh.”
12.10: Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung buangh zuqc domh huaang domh ngorc. Mienh ngorc duqv kouv haic, Apc^laam ziouc mingh yiem douc I^yipv Deic-Bung.
12.2: Yie oix ceix fuqv bun meih, bun meih zoux yietc fingx hlo nyei mienh. Yie oix bun meih maaih mengh hoc. Meih yaac haih bun mienh duqv fuqv.
12.1: Ziouv  gorngv mbuox Apc^laam, “Oix zuqc leih nqoi meih nyei buonv-deic, meih nyei cien-ceqv caux meih nyei die nyei biauv mingh taux yie oix bun meih hiuv nyei deic-bung.
12.4: Apc^laam ziouc ziux Ziouv  nyei waac cuotv jauv. Lotv yaac caux jienv mingh. Cuotv Haalaan wuov zanc Apc^laam duqv cietv ziepc hmz hnyangx.
12.6: Apc^laam gan jienv deic-bung jiex taux Sekem Zingh, taux diuh domh mba'ong zuei ndiangx, Mo^le wuov. Wuov zanc Kaa^naa^an Mienh yiem jienv wuov norm deic-bung nyei.
12.8: Nqa'haav Apc^laam aengx suiv mingh taux Mbetc^en Zingh nyei dong bung maengx, mbong-aiv nyei dorngx, corng ndopv-liuh. Mbetc^en Zingh yiem ninh mbuo nyei fai bung, Ai Zingh yiem ninh mbuo nyei dong bung. Yiem wuov ninh aengx ceix norm ziec-dorngh daaih gorngv cuotv Ziouv  nyei mbuox zaangc Ziouv.
12.9: Apc^laam aengx cuotv jauv hungx jienv Negepc mingh.
12.7: Ziouv  hinc cuotv daaih gorngv mbuox Apc^laam, “Naaiv norm deic-bung yie oix jiu bun meih nyei fun-faqv.” Apc^laam ziouc ceix norm ziec-dorngh daaih ziec dongh hinc cuotv bun ninh buatc wuov dauh Ziouv.
12.17: Mv baac laaix Apc^laam nyei auv, Saalaai, Ziouv bun hungh diex caux ninh nyei biauv zong mienh butv ciouv haic nyei baengc.
12.16: Weic Saalaai, hungh diex zoux longx bun Apc^laam. Apc^laam duqv ngongh, duqv ba'gi yungh, lorh gouv lorh nyeiz, nouh gauv nouh beiz caux lorh torh.

34.21: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Naaiv deix mienh caux mbuo zoux gorx-youz doic. Mbuo oix zuqc bun ninh mbuo caux mbuo juangc deic-bung yiem, bieqc cuotv maaiz maaic. Mbuo nyei deic-bung jangv nyei, gaux duqv bun ninh mbuo yiem nyei. Mbuo yaac haih longc ninh mbuo nyei sieqv. Ninh mbuo yaac haih longc mbuo nyei sieqv.
34.15: Yie mbuo maaih nduqc diuh leiz hnangv cingx haih laengz bun, se meih mbuo dauh dauh m'jangc dorn oix zuqc hnangv yie mbuo nor, jiex gaatv nyei leiz nzengc.
34.12: Oix longc leiz-ging caux zingh nyeic mbu'ziex gunv gorngv maah! Meih mbuo oix longc haaix nyungc mbu'ziex yie bun nzengc, da'faanh duqv meih mbuo nyei sieqv hnangv.”
34.17: Mv baac se gorngv meih mbuo maiv muangx yie mbuo, maiv jiex gaatv nyei leiz nzengc, yie mbuo dorh yie mbuo nyei muoc biaux aqv.”
34.30: Yaakopv mbuox Si^me^on caux Lewi, “Meih mbuo hnangv naaiv nor zoux oix bun yie zuqc sic, zuqc Kaa^naa^an Mienh, Be^litv^si Mienh caux yietc zungv yiem naaiv norm deic-bung nyei mienh nzorng yie aqv. Mbuo yaac maiv maaih mienh camv. Se gorngv wuov deix mienh gapv qaqv daaih mborqv yie nor, yie caux yie nyei biauv zong mienh ziouc zuqc mietc nzengc.”
34.20: Haamo caux ninh nyei dorn, Sekem, ziouc mingh zingh gaengh ndaangc caux yietc norm zingh nyei gorx-youz gorngv.
34.4: Sekem mbuox ninh nyei die, Haamo, “Tov die mingh tengx yie gorngv naaiv dauh sieqv oc.”
34.28: Ninh mbuo zorqv ba'gi yungh, yungh, ngongh, lorh, yietc zungv ga'naaiv. Maiv gunv yiem zingh fai yiem ndeic, ninh mbuo zorqv nzengc mi'aqv.
34.19: Wuov dauh dorn ziouc maiv ngaih, ei jienv Yaakopv nyei dorn mbuo nyei waac gaanv jienv zoux, weic zuqc ninh hnamv haic Yaakopv nyei sieqv. Ninh mbuo yietc zungv muoz-doic se Sekem zoux gauh hlo jiex.
34.18: Haamo caux ninh nyei dorn, Sekem, haiz naaiv deix waac horpc hnyouv nyei.
34.22: Naaiv deix mienh a'hneiv caux mbuo juangc deic-bung yiem, benx yietc fingx, mv baac maaih yietc diuc ninh mbuo cingx daaih laengz, se mbuo dauh dauh m'jangc dorn oix zuqc hnangv ninh mbuo nor, jiex gaatv nyei leiz.
34.23: Ninh mbuo nyei saeng-kuv, ninh mbuo maaih nyei nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv ziouc benx mbuo nyei maiv zeiz? Tov bun mbuo hnangv naaiv nor zoux. Ninh mbuo ziouc caux mbuo yiem naaiv aqv.”
34.13: Laaix Sekem zoux waaic ninh mbuo nyei muoc, Ndinaa, nyei mengh dauh, Yaakopv nyei dorn mbuo nduov Sekem caux ninh nyei die, Haamo.
34.9: Yiem naaiv mingh mbuo lomh nzoih jiu tong. Bungx meih mbuo nyei sieqv bun yie mbuo nyei dorn longc, yaac dorh yie mbuo nyei sieqv bun meih mbuo nyei dorn longc.
34.26: Liemh Haamo caux Sekem i dorn-diex, ninh mbuo yaac daix guangc mi'aqv. Yaac dorh Ndinaa yiem Sekem nyei biauv cuotv mingh mi'aqv.
34.5: Yaakopv hiuv duqv Sekem zoux bun ninh nyei sieqv nyei mengh dauh waaic mv baac Yaakopv maiv gaengh gorngv haaix nyungc weic zuqc ninh nyei dorn mbuo yiem wuov naah bungx saeng-kuv. Ninh zuov jienv ninh nyei dorn mbuo nzuonx.
34.27: Yaakopv nyei dorn mbuo bieqc naaiv deix zuqc daix daic nyei mienh nyei biauv, luv nzengc wuov norm zingh, laaix wuov norm zingh nyei mienh zoux bun ninh mbuo nyei muoc nyei mengh dauh waaic.
34.14: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Yie mbuo maiv haih bungx yie mbuo nyei muoc bun maiv jiex gaatv nyei leiz nyei mienh longc. Hnangv naaiv zoux, yie mbuo nyei mengh dauh waaic nzengc aqv.
34.3: Ninh haiz hnamv naaiv dauh sieqv, Ndinaa, ziouc caux Ndinaa gorngv longx, oix nduov naaiv dauh sieqv hnamv ninh.
34.7: Yaakopv nyei dorn mbuo yiem wuov naah yietv haiz naaiv deix sic ninh mbuo ziouc nzuonx daaih. Ninh mbuo haiz hnyouv waaic nzengc, qiex jiez haic Sekem hnangv naaiv nor zoux doqc caa Yaakopv nyei sieqv. Se maiv horpc zuqc zoux nyei sic yaac mangc piex haic ninh mbuo I^saa^laa^en Mienh.
34.10: Hnangv naaiv meih mbuo haih caux yie mbuo juangc deic-bung yiem. Meih mbuo oix yiem haaix norm dorngx, gunv yiem duqv nyei, aengx lorz ndau liepc ganh nyei nguaaz-gorn, bieqc cuotv zoux saeng-eix.”
34.2: Gunv wuov norm dorngx nyei Hiwai Mienh, Haamo nyei dorn, Sekem, buatc Ndinaa ziouc nyau jienv ninh caa.
34.1: Yaakopv caux Le^aa maaih dauh sieqv, mbuox heuc Ndinaa. Maaih hnoi Ndinaa cuotv mingh caux wuov norm dorngx nyei m'sieqv dorn nziaauc.
34.31: Ninh nyei dorn mbuo dau, “Yie mbuo maiv bun ninh zoux bun yie mbuo nyei muoc dorngx maaic buonv-sin nyei m'sieqv dorn.”
34.6: Sekem nyei die, Haamo, cuotv mingh caux Yaakopv caangh laangh.
34.8: Haamo gorngv mbuox Yaakopv mbuo dorn-diex doic, “Yie nyei dorn, Sekem, hnamv haic naaiv dauh sieqv. Tov meih mbuo bun naaiv dauh sieqv yie nyei dorn longc zoux auv.
34.24: Wuov norm zingh nyei yietc zuangx gorx-youz buangv hnyouv Haamo caux Sekem nyei waac. Zingh gu'nyuoz nyei yietc zungv m'jangc dorn ziouc jiex gaatv nyei leiz nzengc.
34.25: Jiex liuz gaatv nyei leiz da'faam hnoi wuov hnoi, wuov deix m'jangc dorn corc mun jienv nyei. I dauh Yaakopv nyei dorn, Ndinaa nyei gorx, Si^me^on caux Lewi, buix jienv nzuqc ndaauv bieqc zingh, liemh maiv maaih haaix dauh gouv nyeih. Ninh mbuo ziouc bieqc mingh daix nzengc wuov norm zingh nyei m'jangc dorn.
34.29: Haaix nyungc maaih jaax-zinh nyei ga'naaiv ninh mbuo yaac zorqv nzengc. Liemh m'sieqv dorn, liemh fu'jueiv yaac dorh jienv mingh. Liemh ninh mbuo nyei jaa-dingh yaac luv njang nzengc mi'aqv.
34.11: Sekem yaac gorngv mbuox Ndinaa nyei die caux ninh nyei gorx mbuo, “Tov meih mbuo nqoi fim nqoi eix yie. Meih mbuo oix longc haaix nyungc yie ziouc bun.
34.16: Hnangv naaic yie mbuo ziouc haih bungx yie mbuo nyei sieqv bun meih mbuo, yaac dorh meih mbuo nyei sieqv daaih longc zoux auv. Yie mbuo yaac haih caux meih mbuo juangc deic-bung yiem.

30.21: Nqa'haav Le^aa aengx yungz duqv dauh sieqv yaac cuotv mbuox heuc Ndinaa.
30.15: Le^aa dau, “Yie nyei nqox meih zungv nzaeng mingh aqv. Corc maiv gaengh gaux? Meih aengx oix nzaeng yie nyei dorn nyei ndu^ndaa^im jieh?” Laasen gorngv, “Meih bun deix meih nyei dorn nyei ndu^ndaa^im jieh yie nor, ih muonz yie bun Yaakopv caux meih bueix.”
30.37: Yaakopv mingh jamv borpc^laah, an^man caux pa'len ndiangx-nquaah nyiemz daaih nqenx qongx nqaeqv qongx ndiangx-ndopv guangc, bun ndiangx-orv cuotv daaih baeqc nyei, ben nyei.
30.12: Le^aa nyei nouh beiz, Sinx^baa, aengx yungz duqv da'nyeic dauh dorn bun Yaakopv.
30.17: Tin-Hungh dau Le^aa jouh ninh nyei waac. Le^aa aengx maaih jienv sin, yungz duqv da'hmz dauh dorn bun Yaakopv.
30.30: Yie maiv gaengh daaih nyei ziangh hoc, die maaih deix baav hnangv. Ih zanc maaih camv haic aqv. Yie zoux taux haaix, Ziouv  ceix fuqv bun meih. Mv baac taux haaix zanc yie cingx liepc duqv yie nyei jaa-dingh?”
30.20: Le^aa gorngv, “Tin-Hungh bun longx haic nyei zingh nyeic yie. Ih zanc yie nyei nqox ndongc haaix yaac oix taaih yie weic zuqc yie yungz duqv juqv dauh dorn bun ninh.” Ninh cuotv ninh nyei dorn nyei mbuox heuc Se^mbu^lun.
30.4: Laasen ziouc bun ninh nyei nouh beiz, Mbin^haa, ninh nyei nqox longc zoux auv. Yaakopv yaac caux ninh bueix.
30.28: Meih nyei gong-zinh oix longc mbu'ziex gunv gorngv mbuox yie maah! Yie ziouc bun.”
30.43: Yaakopv gunv zoux gunv butv zoih. Maaih yungh, maaih ba'gi yungh, maaih nouh gauv nouh beiz, maaih lorh torh, maaih lorh. Nyungc-nyungc zungv maaih camv.
30.33: Hnangv naaiv nor, nqa'haav hingv yie zoux hnyouv zaqc fai maiv zaqc, die ziouc hiuv nyei. Haaix zanc mingh mangc yie nyei gong-zinh, buatc haaix dauh yungh maiv ben yaac maiv maaih diemv, fai buatc haaix dauh ba'gi yungh dorn maiv jieqv nor, ziouc hiuv duqv yie pinx daaih aqv.”
30.35: Dongh wuov hnoi Laa^mbaan mingh dimv mangc ninh nyei yungh. Yungh gouv ben nyei, maaih diemv nyei, ninh ginv cuotv. Yungh nyeiz maaih diemv cou diemv muonc caux dauh dauh maaih baeqc zorpc jienv, caux yietc zungv ba'gi yungh dorn jieqv ninh yaac ginv cuotv. Naaiv deix yietc zungv ninh jiu bun ninh ganh nyei dorn mbuo goux,
30.42: mv baac maiv henv wuov deix daapv zuangv ninh maiv zorqv naaiv deix ndiangx-nquaah don nza'hmien maengx. Hnangv naaic, maiv henv wuov deix benx Laa^mbaan nyei. Henv wuov deix benx nzengc Yaakopv nyei.
30.19: Le^aa aengx maaih jienv sin, yungz duqv da'luoqc dauh dorn bun Yaakopv.
30.34: Laa^mbaan dau, “Longx aqv. Hnangv meih gorngv nor zoux.”
30.18: Le^aa gorngv, “Weic zuqc yie bun yie nyei nouh beiz yie nyei nqox longc, Tin-Hungh bun zingh nyeic yie.” Ninh cuotv wuov dauh dorn nyei mbuox heuc Itc^saax^kaa.
30.22: Zoux gau, Tin-Hungh jangx taux Laasen, aengx dau ninh jouh nyei waac, bun ninh haih maaih gu'nguaaz.
30.23: Ninh ziouc maaih jienv sin, yungz duqv dauh dorn. Ninh gorngv, “Tin-Hungh bun dauh dorn yie, tengx yie buang hmien, maiv zuqc diev nyaiv.
30.13: Le^aa gorngv, “Yie njien-youh haic aqv. Zuangx m'sieqv dorn yaac oix gorngv yie njien-youh haic.” Ninh ziouc tengx wuov dauh dorn cuotv mbuox heuc Aa^se.
30.9: Le^aa hiuv duqv ninh ganh maiv yungz gu'nguaaz aqv. Ninh ziouc bun ninh nyei nouh beiz, Sinx^baa, Yaakopv longc zoux auv.
30.40: Yaakopv zorqv yungh caux ba'gi yungh dorn bun nqoi ganh ca'lengc an norm dorngx. Ba'gi yungh caux yungh ninh bun hungx mingh Laa^mbaan nyei ba'gi yungh jieqv caux ben wuov bung. Ninh hnangv naaiv nor zoux bun ganh nyei ba'gi yungh hiaangx. Ninh nyei buonc yungh caux ba'gi yungh ganh ca'lengc an norm dorngx, maiv bun zorpc Laa^mbaan nyei.
30.26: Die hiuv duqv yie daaih tengx meih zoux gong bietv ndutv yie nyei auv-jueiv mi'aqv. Tov bun yie dorh jienv nzuonx aqv.”
30.41: Haaix zanc henv nyei wuov deix saeng-kuv daapv zuangv ninh zorqv wuov deix ndiangx-nquaah don jienv nza'hmien maengx, wuom-zoh gu'nyuoz. Ninh mbuo yiem naaiv deix ndiangx nyei ga'hlen daapv zuangv,
30.5: Mbin^haa ziouc maaih jienv sin, yungz duqv dauh dorn bun Yaakopv.
30.27: Mv baac Laa^mbaan gorngv, “Se gorngv meih buangv hnyouv, tov aengx caux yie yiem. Yie samx duqv cuotv, hiuv duqv se weic meih, Ziouv cingx ceix fuqv bun yie.
30.38: Ninh ziouc dorh naaiv deix zoux ben nyei ndiangx-nquaah an jienv saeng-kuv nyei nza'hmien, wuom-zoh gu'nyuoz. Saeng-kuv saeng nyei ziangh hoc daaih hopv wuom,
30.14: Gaatv mbiauh witv nyei ziangh hoc, Lu^mben mingh saau wuov ndeic, buatc zungh ndu^ndaa^im jieh. Ninh ziouc dorh daaih bun ninh nyei maa Le^aa. Laasen gorngv mbuox ninh nyei dorc, “Tov bun deix dorc nyei dorn nyei ndu^ndaa^im jieh yie maah!”
30.3: Laasen gorngv, “Naaiv yie nyei nouh beiz, Mbin^haa. Meih gunv caux ninh bueix maah! Ninh haih yungz gu'nguaaz bun yie, yie ziouc laaix ninh duqv dauh gu'nguaaz funx yie nyei buonc.”
30.7: Laasen nyei nouh beiz, Mbin^haa, aengx maaih jienv sin, yungz duqv da'nyeic dauh dorn bun Yaakopv.
30.39: ninh mbuo ziouc yiem naaiv deix ndiangx nyei nza'hmien maengx daapv zuangv. Ninh mbuo yaac njiec dorn ben nyei, maaih diemv cou fai diemv muonc nyei.
30.36: yaac horngh jienv mingh leih Yaakopv buo hnoi nyei jauv. Yaakopv aeqv, corc goux jienv Laa^mbaan zengc njiec nyei ba'gi yungh caux yungh guanh.
30.10: Sinx^baa yaac yungz duqv dauh dorn bun Yaakopv.
30.2: Yaakopv qiex jiez haic Laasen. Ninh gorngv, “Yie maiv zeiz Tin-Hungh. Tin-Hungh ganh bun meih maiv haih maaih gu'nguaaz.”
30.1: Laasen hiuv duqv ninh ganh maiv haih yungz gu'nguaaz bun Yaakopv, ninh ziouc mueic jieqv ninh nyei dorc. Ninh gorngv mbuox Yaakopv, “Meih bun yie duqv fu'jueiv maah! Maiv zei aeqv, yie daic aqv.”
30.31: Laa^mbaan naaic gaax ninh, “Wuov nyungc, yie oix zuqc bun haaix nyungc meih?” Yaakopv dau, “Die maiv zuqc bun haaix nyungc yie. Se gorngv die oix hnangv naaiv nor tengx yie, yie aengx goux jienv meih nyei ba'gi yungh caux yungh guanh mingh.
30.6: Laasen gorngv, “Tin-Hungh siemv liuz dingc bun yie, yaac haiz yie jouh nyei waac ziouc bun dauh dorn yie.” Laasen ziouc tengx wuov dauh dorn cuotv mbuox heuc Ndaan.
30.8: Laasen gorngv, “Yie caux yie nyei dorc nzaeng domh jaax yaac nzaeng duqv hingh.” Ninh tengx wuov dauh dorn cuotv mbuox heuc Napv^taa^li.
30.24: Tov Tin-Hungh aengx bun dauh dorn yie.” Ninh ziouc cuotv mbuox heuc Yosepv.
30.25: Laasen duqv liuz Yosepv, nqa'haav Yaakopv gorngv mbuox ninh nyei ong-daa, Laa^mbaan, “Tov bun yie nzuonx yie nyei buonv-deic dorngx aqv oc.
30.29: Yaakopv dau ninh nyei ong-daa, “Die hiuv duqv yie zoux nyei gong ndongc haaix longx, yaac hiuv duqv meih nyei saeng-kuv ndongc haaix camv.
30.11: Le^aa gorngv, “Yie gengh maengc longx.” Ninh ziouc tengx wuov dauh dorn cuotv mbuox heuc Gaatc.
30.32: Ih hnoi yie oix mingh dimv mangc meih nyei yietc zungv ba'gi yungh caux yungh guanh. Da'faanh ba'gi yungh maaih diemv cou, diemv muonc nyei, caux ba'gi yungh dorn jieqv, caux dauh dauh yungh maaih diemv cou fai diemv muonc nyei, yie longc zoux yie nyei gong-zinh.
30.16: Hmuangx deix, Yaakopv yiem ndeic nzuonx, Le^aa mingh zipv. Ninh gorngv, “Ih muonz meih oix zuqc caux yie bueix. Yie dorh yie nyei dorn nyei ndu^ndaa^im jieh yienc meih mi'aqv.” Wuov muonz Yaakopv ziouc caux Le^aa bueix.

11.21: Duqv liuz Selukv, ninh ziangh duqv nyic baeqv lengh siec hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
11.15: Duqv liuz E^mbe, Qelaa ziangh duqv feix baeqv lengh buo hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
11.12: Aan^faa^satv duqv faah ziepc hmz hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Qelaa.
11.17: Duqv liuz Belekv, ninh ziangh duqv feix baeqv faah ziepc hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
11.30: Saalaai maiv haih maaih saeng-yungz. Ninh maiv maaih fu'jueiv.
11.20: Le^u duqv faah ziepc nyeic hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Selukv.
11.4: Ninh mbuo aengx gorngv, “Daaih maah! Mbuo ceix norm zingh yaac ceix norm fanh taapv hlang taux gu'nguaaic lungh, bun mbuo maaih mengh dauh yaac maiv zuqc bun nzaanx buangv lungh ndiev.”
11.28: Haalaan guei seix ndaangc ninh nyei die, Telaa. Haalaan m'daaih yiem ninh cuotv seix nyei deic-bung guei seix, se Ken^ndie Mienh nyei U^aa Zingh.
11.19: Duqv liuz Le^u, ninh ziangh duqv nyic baeqv lengh nduoh hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
11.18: Belekv duqv faah ziepc hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Le^u.
11.22: Selukv duqv faah ziepc hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Naa^ho.
11.23: Duqv liuz Naa^ho, ninh ziangh duqv nyic baeqv hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
11.13: Duqv liuz Qelaa, Aan^faa^satv ziangh jienv feix baeqv lengh buo hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
11.9: Weic naaiv, wuov norm zingh maaih mbuox heuc Mbaa^mben, weic zuqc yiem wuov Ziouv bun mienh nyei waac lunc nzengc. Yiem wuov Ziouv yaac bun zuangx mienh nzaanx mingh yiem buangv lungh ndiev.
11.26: Telaa duqv cietv ziepc hnyangx, ninh duqv buo dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Apc^laam, Naa^ho caux Haalaan.
11.5: Ziouv ziouc njiec daaih mangc baamh mienh ceix nyei zingh caux fanh taapv.
11.27: Yiem naaiv mingh gorngv Telaa nyei zeiv-fun. Telaa zoux Apc^laam, Naa^ho caux Haalaan nyei die. Haalaan zoux Lotv nyei die.
11.14: Qelaa duqv faah ziepc hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc E^mbe.
11.3: Laanh gorngv mbuox laanh, “Daaih maah! Mbuo nanv nie-zun buov ngaengc daaih.” Ninh mbuo longc nie-zun div la'bieiv. Ndau-ndiev nyouh haic nyei zung ninh mbuo longc div ba'naih nie.
11.7: Daaih maah! Mbuo njiec mingh zoux lunc ninh mbuo nyei waac weic bun laanh maiv mengh baeqc laanh.”
11.10: Yiem naaiv mingh gorngv Sem nyei zeiv-fun. Mbiungc-suiv-imx yiemx liuz lungh ndiev, nqa'haav i hnyangx, Sem duqv yietc baeqv hnyangx wuov hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Aan^faa^satv.
11.2: Ninh mbuo suiv jienv mingh dong bung maengx, taux Sinaa Deic-Bung, maaih ndau-baengh nyei dorngx, ziouc dingh njiec yiem wuov aqv.
11.1: Zinh ndaangc lungh ndiev mienh yietc zungv gorngv nduqc nyungc waac hnangv. Waac-eix fih hnangv nzengc.
11.31: Telaa dorh ninh nyei dorn, Apc^laam, caux ninh nyei fun, Haalaan nyei dorn, Lotv, caux ninh nyei mbuangz, Apc^laam nyei auv, Saalaai, cuotv Ken^ndie Deic-Bung nyei U^aa Zingh oix mingh Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung. Mv baac ninh mbuo mingh taux Haalaan Zingh ziouc dingh njiec yiem wuov aqv.
11.6: Ziouv gorngv, “Mangc gaax! Naaiv deix mienh se nduqc fingx mienh yaac gorngv nduqc nyungc waac hnangv. Koqv hoqc jiez gorn zoux, ninh mbuo haih zoux duqv ndongc naaiv, ninh mbuo jiez hnyouv zoux haaix nyungc ninh mbuo ziouc haih zoux duqv cuotv nyei.
11.8: Ziouv ziouc bun ninh mbuo nzaanx nzengc buangv lungh ndiev. Ninh mbuo ziouc guangc, maiv ceix wuov norm zingh aqv.
11.24: Naa^ho duqv nyic ziepc juov hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Telaa.
11.25: Duqv liuz Telaa, ninh ziangh duqv yietc baeqv ziepc juov hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
11.29: Apc^laam caux Naa^ho i dauh dorng jaa. Apc^laam nyei auv heuc Saalaai. Naa^ho nyei auv heuc Minkaa, se Haalaan nyei sieqv. Haalaan zoux Minkaa caux Itc^kaa nyei die.
11.11: Duqv liuz Aan^faa^satv, ninh ziangh jienv hmz baeqv hnyangx, corc maaih dorn maaih sieqv nyei.
11.32: Telaa ziangh duqv nyic baeqv lengh biaa hnyangx ziouc yiem Haalaan Zingh guei seix mi'aqv.
11.16: E^mbe duqv faah ziepc feix hnyangx, ninh duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Belekv.

28.21: yaac bun yie baengh orn nyei nzuonx yie nyei die nyei biauv nor, Ziouv  ziouc benx yie nyei Tin-Hungh aqv.
28.15: Jangx jienv oc. Maiv gunv meih mingh taux haaix yie caux meih yiem, oix goux jienv meih. Yie yaac oix dorh meih aengx nzuonx taux naaiv norm deic-bung. Yie zungv maiv leih nqoi meih, taux yie zoux ziangx ei yie laengz nyei waac.”
28.12: Ninh mbeix buatc maaih zung tei yiem ga'ndiev ndau liepc faaux taux gu'nguaaic lungh. Yaac buatc Tin-Hungh nyei fin-mienh faaux-faaux njiec-njiec nyei.
28.17: Ninh za'gengh gamh nziex haic aengx gorngv, “Naaiv za'gengh yiev haic nyei dorngx. Hnangv haaix zungv zoux Tin-Hungh nyei dinc, yaac zoux tin-dorngh nyei gaengh.”
28.20: Yaakopv aengx laengz ngaengc waac. Ninh gorngv, “Se gorngv Tin-Hungh caux yie yiem dongh ih zanc yie mingh nyei jauv, yaac goux jienv yie, bun yie maaih nyanc maaih hopv, maaih lui-houx zuqv,
28.4: Tov ninh ceix fuqv bun meih caux meih nyei zeiv-fun hnangv zinh ndaangc ninh ceix fuqv bun Apc^laa^ham wuov nor. Yaac bun meih mbuo duqv meih ih zanc yiem jienv naaiv norm deic-bung benx meih mbuo nyei buonc, dongh zinh ndaangc Tin-Hungh ceix bun Apc^laa^ham nyei deic-bung.”
28.19: Wuov norm dorngx ninh cuotv mbuox heuc Mbetc^en. (Zinh ndaangc wuov norm zingh nyei mbuox heuc Lutv.)
28.18: Da'nyeic ndorm Yaakopv jiez sin daaih nziouv nyei, zorqv ninh nzomz wuov norm la'bieiv liepc jiez daaih don jienv zoux jangx-hoc. Aengx zorqv youh dox jienv la'bieiv fungx bun Tin-Hungh.
28.22: Yie liepc naaiv norm la'bieiv daaih weic zoux jangx-hoc ziouc benx Tin-Hungh nyei dinc. Da'faanh meih bun haaix nyungc yie, yie oix zorqv ziepc gouv nyei yietc gouv fongc horc meih.”
28.13: Yaac maaih Ziouv  souv jienv tei gu'nguaaic gorngv mbuox ninh, “Yie se Ziouv, meih nyei ong, Apc^laa^ham, nyei Tin-Hungh, caux I^sakc nyei Tin-Hungh. Dongh meih ih zanc bueix naaiv deix ndau yie oix jiu bun meih caux meih nyei zeiv-fun.
28.9: Ninh ziouc mingh lorz dauh Apc^laa^ham nyei dorn, I^saa^maa^en, nyei sieqv, Ne^mbaa^yotv nyei muoc, mbuox heuc Maa^haa^latv, longc zoux auv-faam.
28.5: Hnangv naaic I^sakc ziouc heuc Yaakopv mingh Batc^ndaan Aalam, mingh lorz Aalam Mienh, Mbe^tu^en nyei dorn, Laa^mbaan. Laa^mbaan yaac zoux Yaakopv caux Esaau nyei maa, Le^mbe^kaa, nyei gorx.
28.14: Meih nyei zeiv-fun oix hnangv lungh ndiev nyei nie-mbung camv. Ninh mbuo oix hiaangx jangv jienv mingh dong naamh fai baqv. Weic meih caux meih nyei zeiv-fun lungh ndiev maanc fingx oix duqv fuqv.
28.3: Tov Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh ceix fuqv bun meih hiaangx daaih maaih fu'jueiv camv, ziouc duqv zoux camv-fingx mienh nyei ong-taaix.
28.7: Aengx buatc Yaakopv muangx ninh diex maac nyei waac za'gengh mingh Batc^ndaan Aalam mi'aqv.
28.10: Yaakopv cuotv Mbe^e^qe^mbaa, hungx jienv mingh Haalaan Zingh.
28.2: Meih oix zuqc mingh Batc^ndaan Aalam, meih nyei daa ong, Mbe^tu^en, nyei biauv. Yiem wuov longc auv, longc dauh meih nyei maa nyei gorx, Laa^mbaan, nyei sieqv.
28.1: I^sakc ziouc heuc Yaakopv daaih yaac buang waac bun ninh, ziouc hatc ninh, “Meih maiv dungx longc Kaa^naa^an Mienh nyei sieqv zoux auv.
28.6: Esaau hiuv duqv ninh nyei die, I^sakc, buang waac Yaakopv, mbuox ninh mingh Batc^ndaan Aalam lorz auv longc. Ninh yaac hiuv duqv, buang waac wuov zanc I^sakc heuc ninh maiv dungx longc Kaa^naa^an Mienh nyei sieqv zoux auv.
28.8: Esaau ziouc zieqv duqv ninh nyei die, I^sakc, maiv a'hneiv Kaa^naa^an sieqv.
28.11: Mingh gau, taux norm dorngx buatc mba'hnoi muotv mi'aqv, ziouc hitv wuov. Ninh bueix wuov nzomz jienv la'bieiv m'njormh.
28.16: Yaakopv nyie daaih gorngv, “Ziouv za'gengh yiem naaiv norm dorngx mv baac yie liemh maiv hiuv.”

44.21: “Meih heuc yie mbuo, meih nyei bou, dorh ninh daaih naaiv bun meih mangc.
44.15: Yosepv gorngv mbuox ninh mbuo, “Naaiv meih mbuo zoux haaix nyungc laeh? Meih mbuo maiv hiuv duqv yie naaiv nyungc mienh haih mangc duqv cuotv zinh hoz nyei sic, haih zorqv duqv meih mbuo fai?”
44.12: Bou ziouc sou aqv, yiem domh gorx nyei sou jienv mingh taux youz-laai nyei. Taux Mben^yaa^min nyei mbuoqc ziouc sou cuotv wuov norm zaanv.
44.17: Yosepv gorngv, “Maiv zeiz hnangv naaic lorqc. Kungx zaanv yiem mbuoqc wuov dauh oix zuqc zoux yie nyei nouh hnangv. Zengc wuov deix gunv baengh orn nyei nzuonx meih mbuo nyei die wuov aqv.”
44.30: Yu^ndaa aengx gorngv, “Se gorngv yie nzuonx meih nyei bou, yie nyei die, wuov, yaac maiv maaih naaiv dauh dorn caux yie nzuonx,
44.20: Yie mbuo dau, ‘Die maaih nyei mv baac gox haic aqv. Youz yaac maaih nyei. Die zungv gox haic cingx duqv naaiv dauh dorn-laai. Naaiv dauh dorn nyei gorx daic mi'aqv. Ninh mbuo i muoz juangc maa mv baac ih zanc kungx maaih ninh ganh hnangv. Ninh nyei die yaac hnamv haic ninh.’
44.4: Cuotv ziqc zingh mingh maiv gaengh nangc go, Yosepv gorngv mbuox ninh nyei domh bou, “Gaanv mingh zunc wuov deix mienh. Zunc zaaic, oix zuqc naaic gaax ninh mbuo, ‘Yie mbuo zoux longx bun meih mbuo. Meih mbuo weic haaix diuc zoux waaic bun yie mbuo?
44.28: Maaih dauh zungv leih nqoi yie. Yie hnamv daaih ninh zuqc hieh ga'naaiv betv ninh mi'aqv. Taux ih zanc yie maiv duqv buatc wuov dauh dorn.
44.33: “Hnangv naaic, yie tov bun yie, meih nyei bou, yiem naaiv zoux meih nyei nouh div naaiv dauh dorn. Tov bun ninh gan jienv ninh nyei gorx mbuo nzuonx aqv oc.
44.19: Ziouv naaic yie mbuo, meih nyei bou, ‘Meih mbuo corc maaih die, maaih youz nyei fai?’
44.34: Se gorngv naaiv dauh dorn maiv caux yie nzuonx, yie hnangv haaix nor haih nzuonx yie nyei die wuov. Yie maiv oix buatc yie nyei die zuqc zeqc naanc hoic ninh.”
44.18: Yu^ndaa aengx mingh fatv deix doix Yosepv gorngv, “Yie nyei ziouv aac, yie tov caux meih gorngv joux waac. Meih maiv dungx gaengh qiex jiez yie, meih nyei bou, maiv gunv meih ndongc Faalo Hungh hlo.
44.22: Yie mbuo mbuox meih, yie mbuo nyei ziouv, ‘Wuov dauh dorn leih maiv duqv ninh nyei die. Leih nor, ninh nyei die haih daic nyei.’
44.23: Mv baac meih mbuox yie mbuo, meih nyei bou, ‘Yie mbuo maiv dorh naaiv dauh youz-laai caux jienv daaih nor, yie mbuo maiv duqv aengx buatc meih nyei hmien.’
44.13: Wuov deix muoz-doic nzauh haic, betv ninh mbuo nyei lui, aengx bouh mbuoqc faaux bun lorh tor jienv daaux nqaang nzuonx wuov zingh aqv.
44.9: Se gorngv meih buatc wuov norm zaanv yiem haaix dauh, bun wuov dauh zuqc daic aqv. Zengc wuov deix laengz zoux meih nyei nouh.”
44.26: Yie mbuo dau, ‘Yie mbuo maiv haih mingh. Se gorngv yie mbuo nyei youz-laai caux jienv yie mbuo mingh nor, yie mbuo mingh nyei. Weic zuqc youz-laai maiv caux yie mbuo mingh nor, yie mbuo maiv duqv buatc wuov laanh mienh nyei hmien.’
44.5: Meih mbuo weic haaix diuc nimc yie nyei ziouv nyei nyaanh zaanv mingh? Naaiv norm zaanv ninh longc hopv yaac longc naaic zinh hoz nyei jauv. Meih mbuo za'gengh zoux dorngc ndo haic aqv.’+”
44.27: “Meih nyei bou, yie mbuo nyei die, mbuox yie mbuo, ‘Meih mbuo hiuv duqv yie nyei auv, Laasen, yungz duqv i dauh dorn bun yie hnangv.
44.14: Yu^ndaa caux ninh nyei muoz-doic nzuonx taux Yosepv nyei biauv wuov zanc, Yosepv corc yiem biauv nyei. Ninh mbuo yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien mbaapv njiec ndau.
44.3: Da'nyeic ndorm nziouv nyei, lungh mbiouz-mbiouz njang, domh bou ziouc fungx ninh mbuo caux ninh mbuo nyei lorh cuotv jauv nzuonx.
44.7: Mv baac wuov deix muoz-doic gorngv, “Domh Gorx aac, meih zoux haaix nyungc hnangv naaiv nor gorngv? Yie mbuo zungv maiv hnamv taux hnangv naaiv nor zoux.
44.10: Bou gorngv, “Horpc nyei. Ei jienv meih mbuo nyei waac zoux aqv. Mv baac lorz buatc yiem haaix dauh nyei mbuoqc, wuov dauh ganh oix zuqc zoux yie nyei nouh. Zengc njiec wuov deix maiv dorngc haaix nyungc.”
44.2: Zorqv yie nyei zaanv, dongh nyaanh zaanv wuov norm, caux maaiz mbiauh nyei nyaanh dapv jienv youz-laai wuov dauh nyei mbuoqc nzuih.” Bou ziouc ei jienv Yosepv nyei waac zoux.
44.1: Yosepv paaiv goux ninh nyei biauv nyei domh bou, “Zorqv mbiauh dapv naaiv deix mienh nyei mbuoqc. Dapv gaux ninh mbuo dorh. Aengx zorqv gorqv-mienh maaiz mbiauh nyei nyaanh dapv gorqv-mienh nyei mbuoqc nzuih.
44.31: yie nyei die buatc yie nyei youz maiv caux yie nzuonx nor, ninh ziouc daic aqv, weic zuqc naaiv dauh dorn zoux yie nyei die nyei mba'nziu-gorn. Hnangv naaiv yie nyei die, meih nyei bou, ong-m'nqorngv-baeqc, nzauh taux daic.
44.6: Wuov dauh bou zunc zaaic, ninh ziouc ei Yosepv nyei waac gorngv.
44.8: Mangc gaax, maaiz daauh nzunc mbiauh nyei nyaanh yiem yie mbuo nyei mbuoqc yie mbuo zungv yiem Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung dorh daaih tuix nzuonx bun meih. Yie mbuo fungc haih nimc yiem meih nyei ziouv nyei biauv nyei jiem nyaanh?
44.24: Yie mbuo dorh meih nyei waac nzuonx mingh gorngv bun meih nyei bou, yie mbuo nyei die, muangx.
44.25: “Yie mbuo nyei die mbuox yie mbuo, ‘Aengx mingh maaiz deix mbiauh maah!’
44.29: Se gorngv meih mbuo dorh naaiv dauh mingh, ninh yaac buangh zuqc sic nor, meih mbuo ziouc bun yie, ong-m'nqorngv-baeqc, nzauh taux bieqc yiemh gen.’+”
44.11: Dauh dauh ziouc siepv-siepv nyei bouh mbuoqc njiec don jienv wuov ndau koi.
44.32: Yie ganh longc yie nyei maengc zoux ndaam-daauh mbuox yie nyei die, ‘Yie maiv dorh naaiv dauh youz nzuonx bun die nor, yie laengz yiem die nyei nza'hmien yietc seix ndaam-dorng.’
44.16: Yu^ndaa gorngv, “Yie mbuo hnangv haaix nor haih dau ziouv? Hnangv haaix nor haih gorngv? Yie mbuo hnangv haaix nor haih jaiv sin? Tin-Hungh wetv cuotv nzengc yie mbuo zoux dorngc nyei sic. Ih zanc maiv zeiz kungx zaanv yiem mbuoqc wuov dauh benx meih nyei nouh hnangv. Liemh yie mbuo yietc zungv benx meih nyei nouh aqv.”

45.21: I^saa^laa^en nyei dorn mbuo ziouc ei jienv zoux. Yosepv yaac ei jienv Faalo Hungh paaiv nyei waac bun ngongh cie ninh mbuo, yaac bun jienv ndaamv-jauv nyei bienh fuix.
45.15: Yosepv aengx zom ninh nyei dauh dauh gorx aengx nyiemv. Nqa'haav ninh nyei muoz-doic caux ninh gorngv waac.
45.12: Yosepv aengx gorngv, “Meih mbuo dauh dauh gorx aengx caux yie nyei youz, Mben^yaa^min, zieqv duqv ih zanc caux meih mbuo gorngv waac se yie, Yosepv.
45.17: Faalo Hungh gorngv mbuox Yosepv, “Mbuox meih nyei muoz-doic, ‘Oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor zoux. Zorqv ga'naaiv bun meih mbuo nyei lorh tor jienv nzuonx Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung.
45.20: Meih mbuo maiv dungx korv-fiqv meih mbuo nyei ga'naaiv weic zuqc I^yipv Deic-Bung maaih gauh longx jiex nyei ga'naaiv se benx meih mbuo nyei.’+”
45.4: Yosepv ziouc mbuox ninh mbuo, “Tov meih mbuo daaih fatv deix maah!” Ninh mbuo ziouc mingh fatv. Yosepv gorngv, “Yie se meih mbuo nyei youz, Yosepv, dongh gorx mbuo maaic mingh I^yipv Deic-Bung wuov dauh.
45.28: I^saa^laa^en gorngv, “Buangv hnyouv aqv. Yie nyei dorn, Yosepv, yiem nyei. Yie maiv gaengh daic, yie oix mingh buatc yietc mueic ninh.”
45.19: “Meih yaac oix zuqc mbuox ninh mbuo, ‘Meih mbuo oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor zoux. Dorh I^yipv Deic-Bung nyei ngongh cie mingh bienh meih mbuo nyei fu'jueiv caux meih mbuo nyei auv, yaac oix zuqc dorh meih mbuo nyei die daaih.
45.18: Bienh meih mbuo nyei die caux meih mbuo nyei hmuangv doic daaih yie naaiv. Yie oix bun I^yipv Deic-Bung gauh longx jiex nyei ga'naaiv ninh mbuo. Naaiv norm deic-bung maaih haaix nyungc longx jiex ninh mbuo duqv nyanc aqv.’
45.22: Ninh nyei gorx mbuo, ninh bun yietc dauh yietc yiemc lui-houx yienc. Mv baac Mben^yaa^min ninh bun i joih cietv lungz nyaanh caux biaa yiemc lui-houx.
45.23: Yosepv fungx ziepc dauh lorh tor jienv I^yipv Deic-Bung longx jiex nyei ga'naaiv mingh bun ninh nyei die. Aengx fungx ziepc dauh lorh nyeiz tor mbiauh caux njuov caux bun ninh nyei die yiem ndaamv-jauv nyanc nyei bienh fuix.
45.13: Gorngv mbuox die, yie yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung duqv nyei yietc zungv njang-laangc. Gorngv nzengc meih mbuo buatc nyei jauv-louc bun die muangx. Yaac oix zuqc gaanv jienv dorh yie nyei die daaih naaiv.”
45.9: Ih zanc gaanv nzuonx mingh mbuox yie nyei die, ninh nyei dorn, Yosepv, hnangv naaiv nor gorngv, ‘Tin-Hungh bun yie zoux I^yipv Deic-Bung nyei ziouv. Die oix zuqc siepv-siepv nyei daaih yie naaiv, maiv dungx ngaih.
45.26: Ninh mbuo mbuox ninh mbuo nyei die, “Aa die aah! Yosepv corc yiem nyei aex! Ih zanc ninh gunv nzengc yietc norm I^yipv Deic-Bung.” Yaakopv mouh mengh mouh baeqc nyei, maiv sienx ninh mbuo nyei waac.
45.5: Meih mbuo maiv dungx hnyouv mun, winx ganh zoux dorngc laaix maaic yie daaih naaiv. Se Tin-Hungh paaiv yie daaih ndaangc meih mbuo weic njoux mienh camv nyei maengc.
