45.27: Ninh nyei dorn mbuo gorngv nzengc Yosepv nyei waac bun ninh muangx. Yaakopv yaac buatc Yosepv bun daaih zipv ninh mingh I^yipv wuov deix ngongh cie, ninh nyei hnyouv ziouc fingv daaih aqv.
45.14: Yosepv qam jienv ninh nyei youz, Mben^yaa^min, nyiemv. Mben^yaa^min yaac qam jienv ninh nyei gorx nyiemv.
45.3: Yosepv mbuox ninh nyei muoz-doic, “Yie se Yosepv. Yie nyei die corc yiem nyei fai?” Ninh nyei muoz-doic haiz ninh hnangv naaiv nor gorngv, ninh mbuo hnyouv waaic nzengc, zungv maiv haih dau.
45.7: Tin-Hungh paaiv yie daaih ndaangc meih mbuo, weic meih mbuo liouh deix mienh yiem naaiv lungh ndiev, yaac longc naaiv nyungc domh za'eix njoux gorx mbuo cuotv.
45.10: Die haih yiem naaiv, Gosen Deic, nitv fatv deix yie, die ganh caux die nyei dorn-jueiv fun-faqv, ngongh guanh, ba'gi yungh guanh, yungh guanh, liemh yietc zungv maaih nyei ga'naaiv.
45.2: Yosepv qaqv nyiemv mbui nyei, I^yipv Mienh ziouc haiz mi'aqv, aengx sing mingh taux hungh dinc wuov.
45.1: Yosepv haiz nyienz maiv jienv, wuom-mueic oix cuotv haic aqv, ziouc beqv souv ninh nyei ga'hlen nyei mienh, “Meih mbuo yietc zungv cuotv mingh maah!” Yosepv bun ninh nyei muoz-doic hiuv duqv ninh wuov zanc, maiv maaih yietc dauh ga'hlen mienh yiem.
45.6: Deic-bung ngorc duqv i hnyangx aqv. Corc aengx maaih biaa hnyangx maiv haih zuangx, maiv haih siou.
45.8: “Hnangv naaiv se maiv zeiz gorx mbuo bun yie daaih naaiv. Se Tin-Hungh ganh paaiv yie daaih. Ninh bun yie hnangv Faalo Hungh nyei die, zoux ninh nyei biauv zong nyei ziouv, yaac gunv nzengc I^yipv Deic-Bung.
45.24: Yosepv ziouc fungx ninh nyei muoz-doic cuotv jauv nzuonx. Oix mingh wuov zanc ninh gorngv, “Ndaamv-jauv meih mbuo maiv dungx da'hauv ox!”
45.25: Wuov deix muoz-doic ziouc yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung nzuonx taux Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung, ninh mbuo nyei die wuov.
45.11: Hnangv naaiv yie haih goux die, weic zuqc aengx maaih biaa hnyangx domh ngorc. Maiv zeiz nor aeqv, die caux die nyei biauv zong mienh caux die maaih nyei yietc zungv ndortv naanc kouv.’+”
45.16: Yosepv nyei muoz-doic daaih nyei fienx sing taux hungh dinc. Faalo Hungh caux ninh nyei zuangx jien a'hneiv haic aqv.

19.21: Fin-mienh gorngv mbuox Lotv, “Meih tov nyei yie nqoi nzuih. Yie ziouc maiv mietc meih gorngv wuov norm mungv.
19.15: Da'nyeic ndorm lungh njang, fin-mienh beqv Lotv. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Gaanv siepv deix maah! Dorh jienv meih nyei auv aengx caux meih yiem naaiv nyei i dauh sieqv biaux nqoi. Maiv zei aeqv, naaiv norm zingh zuqc dingc zuiz zuqc mietc, meih mbuo yaac caux jienv zuqc daic aqv.”
19.37: Sieqv-hlo yungz duqv dauh dorn, tengx cuotv mbuox heuc Mo^apc. Mo^apc zoux ih jaax hnoi Mo^apc Mienh nyei ong-taaix-ngaeqv.
19.12: Wuov deix i dauh mienh mbuox Lotv, “Yiem naaiv corc maaih haaix dauh meih nyei mienh fai? Maiv gunv dorn fai sieqv, sieqv-laangh fai yiem naaiv zingh meih nyei haaix dauh mienh, meih oix zuqc dorh ninh mbuo biaux cuotv.
19.17: Biaux cuotv ziqc zingh mingh, maaih dauh wuov deix fin-mienh gorngv, “Gaanv biaux maah! Maiv dungx huin mangc nqa'haav, liemh maiv dungx dingh naaiv ndau-baengh nyei haaix norm dorngx. Nqongh biaux mingh wuov jiex mbong. Maiv zei aeqv, oix zuqc daic aqv.”
19.30: Weic zuqc Lotv gamh nziex, maiv gaamv yiem So^aa Zingh, ninh caux ninh nyei i dauh sieqv biaux faaux mbong, yiem norm mbaengx-kuotv gu'nyuoz.
19.20: Mangc maah! Wuov ndau maaih norm mungv faix nyei, fatv nyei, haih tiux duqv taux nyei. Tov bun yie biaux mingh wuov. Benx yietc norm fiuv-mungv hnangv maiv zeiz? Hnangv naaic ziouc duqv yie nyei maengc cuotv.”
19.4: Naaiv deix i dauh mienh maiv gaengh bueix, So^ndom Zingh nyei m'jangc dorn gox-gox lunx-lunx daaih nzoih, maiv zengc yietc dauh, weih jienv Lotv nyei biauv.
19.28: mangc njiec. Ninh buatc So^ndom caux Go^mo^laa caux wuov norm horngc cuotv douz-sioux-don cutv-cutv nyei faaux hnangv buov domh douz-nzauc nor.
19.33: Wuov muonz ninh mbuo i muoz-sieqv bun ninh mbuo nyei die hopv a'ngunc diuv, sieqv-hlo ziouc bieqc mingh caux ninh nyei die bueix. Die zungv maiv hiuv duqv ninh nyei sieqv ziangh haaix bueix, ziangh haaix jiez sin mingh.
19.35: Wuov muonz ninh mbuo ziouc bun ninh mbuo nyei die aengx hopv a'ngunc diuv. Sieqv-faix ziouc bieqc mingh caux ninh nyei die bueix. Ninh nyei die fih hnangv nyei maiv hiuv duqv ninh nyei sieqv ziangh haaix bueix ziangh haaix jiez sin.
19.19: Ziux meih buatc yie, meih nyei bou, zoux duqv horpc meih nyei hnyouv, meih yaac zoux longx bun yie, njoux cuotv yie nyei maengc. Yie maiv haih biaux maiv taux mbong. Nziex yie biaux maiv ndutv naaiv deix domh zeqc naanc, yie ziouc daic aqv.
19.34: Da'nyeic hnoi sieqv-hlo gorngv mbuox sieqv-faix, “A'hmuangx yie caux aa die bueix liuz aqv. Ih muonz mbuo oix zuqc aengx bun ninh hopv a'ngunc diuv, meih yaac mingh caux ninh bueix weic bangc mbuo nyei die maaih hoz baan.”
19.18: Mv baac Lotv dau, “Domh Gorx aah! Tov maiv dungx hnangv naaic.
19.22: Gaanv tiux jienv mingh wuov aqv. Meih mingh maiv gaengh taux wuov norm dorngx, yie maiv haih njiec buoz zoux haaix nyungc.” Weic naaiv mienh ziouc cuotv naaiv norm zingh nyei mbuox heuc “So^aa.”
19.23: Lotv mingh taux So^aa Zingh wuov zanc, mba'hnoi cuotv daaih aqv.
19.13: Yie mbuo oix mietc So^ndom Zingh weic zuqc Ziouv haiz gox naaiv norm zingh nyei waac camv haic aqv. Ninh ziouc paaiv yie mbuo daaih mietc.”
19.9: Zuangx mienh gorngv, “Simv nqoi maah!” Aengx gorngv, “Naaiv dauh lov yiem ganh norm dorngx daaih ziouc yie mbuo yiem. Ih zanc zungv oix tengx yie mbuo zoux siemv zuiz jien. Yie mbuo oix zoux bun meih gauh kouv zoux bun wuov deix i dauh.” Ninh mbuo njiec qaqv fongv Lotv laatc nzaatc mingh taux gaengh ndaangc oix mborqv gaengh tong.
19.26: Mv baac Lotv nyei auv yiem nqa'haav huin nzuonx mangc ziouc benx norm nzauv-dongc mi'aqv.
19.5: Ninh mbuo heuc Lotv, “Ih muonz daaih meih naaiv wuov deix i dauh mienh yiem haaix? Dorh cuotv daaih bun yie mbuo caa maah!”
19.27: Da'nyeic ndorm nziouv nyei, Apc^laa^ham mingh taux, dongh ninh souv jienv yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien wuov norm dorngx,
19.38: Sieqv-faix yaac yungz duqv dauh dorn, tengx cuotv mbuox heuc Mben^am^mi. Mben^am^mi se zoux ih jaax hnoi Ammon Mienh nyei ong-taaix-ngaeqv.
19.14: Lotv ziouc cuotv mingh mbuox gorngv ziangh ninh nyei sieqv wuov deix sieqv-laangh, “Gaanv siepv deix biaux. Ziouv oix mietc naaiv norm zingh haic aqv.” Mv baac ninh nyei laangh mbuo laaic ninh gorngv jatv a'nziaauc hnangv.
19.3: Mv baac Lotv qaqv! tov, ninh mbuo ziouc caux jienv Lotv nzuonx, bieqc ninh nyei biauv. Lotv liuc leiz nyanc hopv, ziqv maiv an bingv nyei njuov, ninh mbuo ziouc nyanc aqv.
19.7: mbuox wuov deix mienh, “Gorx-youz aah! Tov meih mbuo maiv dungx hnangv naaiv nor zoux. Maiv dungx zoux naaiv nyungc waaic haic nyei sic.
19.36: Hnangv naaiv nor Lotv nyei i dauh sieqv maaih jienv ninh mbuo ganh nyei die nyei gu'nguaaz.
19.10: Mv baac wuov deix i dauh kaeqv mienh hnyaa buoz cuotv daaih zorqv Lotv tor bieqc biauv mingh, zorqv gaengh guon jienv.
19.2: gorngv, “Domh Gorx aac, tov meih mbuo daaih hitv yie, meih nyei bou, nyei biauv. Haih nzaaux zaux, bueix muonz, njang ndorm jiez sin nziouv nyei m'daaih mingh.” Ninh mbuo dau, “Maiv zuqc aqv. Yie mbuo bueix naaiv zingh nyei domh zuangx zaamc yaac duqv nyei.”
19.1: Wuov deix i dauh fin-mienh mingh taux So^ndom Zingh wuov zanc, lungh maanz-hmuangx aqv. Lotv zueiz jienv wuov zingh gaengh ndaangc. Yietv buatc ninh mbuo i dauh ninh jiez sin mingh zipv, ziouc puoqv njiec ndau
19.31: Sieqv-hlo mbuox sieqv-faix, “Mbuo nyei die gox aqv. Yiem naaiv buoqv ndau maiv maaih mienh daaih longc mbuo hnangv lungh ndiev mienh longc nor.
19.6: Lotv cuotv gaengh ka'ndau, zorqv gaengh guon jienv,
19.8: Mangc gaax! Yie maaih i dauh sieqv maiv gaengh bueix jiex dorn. Yie dorh ninh mbuo cuotv daaih bun meih mbuo sueih eix zoux. Mv baac maiv dungx zoux haaix nyungc bun naaiv deix m'jangc dorn. Ninh mbuo daaih yiem yie nyei biauv, yie oix zuqc goux longx beu jienv ninh mbuo.”
19.24: Ziouv liemh zeih bun zieqc jienv douz nyei hungh yiem gu'nguaaic lungh njiec So^ndom caux Go^mo^laa Zingh,
19.25: buov mietc nzengc wuov norm horngc zaangc nyei zingh, liemh mienh, liemh ndau cuotv nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv.
19.29: Hnangv naaic, Tin-Hungh mietc wuov norm horngc zaangc nyei zingh, liemh Lotv yiem nyei zingh, wuov zanc, ninh jangx zuqc Apc^laa^ham cingx daaih dorh Lotv biaux cuotv, maiv zuqc daic.
19.11: Ninh mbuo aengx zoux bun yiem ga'nyiec ziqc gaengh nyei yietc zungv mienh gox-gox lunx-lunx nyei m'zing mbuov nzengc ziouc huaax naaiv huaax wuov yaac lorz maiv buatc gaengh.
19.32: Mbuo oix zuqc bun aa die hopv diuv nquin mingh, mbuo ziouc haih caux ninh bueix, weic bangc mbuo nyei die maaih hoz baan.”
19.16: Lotv corc samh samh soqv-soqv nyei. Wuov deix i dauh mienh ziouc zorqv Lotv mbuo i hmuangv caux ninh mbuo nyei i dauh sieqv nyei buoz ken jienv cuotv ga'nyiec ziqc zingh mingh, weic zuqc Ziouv korv-lienh ninh.

35.21: I^saa^laa^en mbuo aengx suiv mingh corng ndopv-liuh yiem E^nde Fanh Taapv nyei wuov ndaangc maengx.
35.15: Ninh aengx cuotv wuov norm dorngx nyei mbuox heuc Mbetc^en.
35.12: Yie jiu bun Apc^laa^ham caux I^sakc nyei deic-bung, yie yaac jiu bun meih caux meih nyei hoz doic zeiv-fun.”
35.17: Mun kouv jiex nyei ziangh hoc, goux ninh wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn gorngv, “Meih maiv dungx gamh nziex oc. Naaiv dauh gu'nguaaz se dorn.”
35.20: Yaakopv zorqv norm la'bieiv don jienv Laasen nyei zouv zoux jangx-hoc. Wuov norm la'bieiv yiem taux ih jaax hnoi.
35.4: Ninh mbuo yietc zungv ziouc zorqv ninh mbuo maaih nyei ganh fingx mienh nyei miuc-fangx caux dangh jienv nyei m'normh hiun, jiu bun Yaakopv. Yaakopv ziouc biopv jienv domh mba'ong zuei ndiangx-gorn ndiev, leih Sekem Zingh maiv nangc go.
35.28: I^sakc ziangh duqv yietc baeqv betv ziepc hnyangx.
35.19: Laasen daic mi'aqv, zangx jienv mingh E^faa^laa^taa nyei jauv-hlen. (E^faa^laa^taa aengx maaih norm mbuox heuc Mbetc^le^hem.)
35.18: Laasen aav lamh daic wuov zanc, ninh aengx tauv cuotv nzunc qiex, tengx ninh nyei dorn cuotv mbuox heuc Mben^o^ni. Mv baac Yaakopv cuotv mbuox heuc Mben^yaa^min.
35.22: Yiem gau wuov norm deic-bung, gb I^saa^laa^en nyei dorn, Lu^mben, caux ninh nyei maa-faix, Mbin^haa, maaih jauv. Ninh nyei die hiuv mi'aqv. Yaakopv maaih ziepc nyeic dauh dorn.
35.23: Le^aa nyei dorn maaih Lu^mben. Lu^mben se Yaakopv nyei dorn-hlo. Aengx maaih Si^me^on, Lewi, Yu^ndaa, Itc^saax^kaa, caux Se^mbu^lun.
35.13: Gorngv liuz, Tin-Hungh ziouc yiem wuov norm dorngx faaux mingh mi'aqv.
35.9: Yaakopv yiem Batc^ndaan Aalam Deic nzuonx daaih, Tin-Hungh aengx hinc cuotv nzunc, buang waac bun ninh.
35.26: Le^aa nyei nouh beiz, Sinx^baa, nyei dorn maaih Gaatc caux Aa^se. Naaiv deix yietc zungv dorn, Yaakopv yiem Batc^ndaan Aalam duqv daaih.
35.5: Yaakopv caux gan ninh nyei zuangx mienh cuotv jauv mingh wuov zanc, Tin-Hungh bun huing nzuonx wuov deix zingh nyei mienh gamh nziex haic, ziouc maiv zunc Yaakopv nyei dorn mbuo.
35.27: Yaakopv nzuonx taux ninh nyei die, I^sakc, yiem Mamle, nitv Ki^li^yaatv Aan^mbaa, (se He^mbo^lon, dongh zinh ndaangc Apc^laa^ham caux I^sakc yiem nyei dorngx).
35.14: Yaakopv zorqv norm la'bieiv don jienv Tin-Hungh caux ninh gorngv waac nyei dorngx, yaac zorqv a'ngunc diuv ciev dongc gu'nguaaic, yaac zorqv ga'lanv youh dox jienv.
35.3: Mbuo oix zuqc leih nqoi naaiv norm dorngx mingh yiem Mbetc^en. Taux wuov yie oix ceix norm ziec-dorngh weic Tin-Hungh, dongh zinh ndaangc yie buangh zuqc kouv naanc ninh tengx yie, yie mingh taux haaix ninh yaac caux yie mingh, wuov dauh Tin-Hungh.”
35.7: Taux wuov ninh ceix norm ziec-dorngh daaih aengx cuotv wuov norm dorngx nyei mbuox heuc En Mbetc^en, weic zuqc biaux ninh nyei gorx, Esaau, wuov zanc, Tin-Hungh yiem wuov hinc cuotv bun ninh buatc.
35.10: Tin-Hungh mbuox ninh, “Meih nyei mbuox heuc Yaakopv mv baac yangh naaiv jiex meih nyei mbuox oix zuqc goiv heuc I^saa^laa^en.” Hnangv naaiv ninh ziouc duqv mbuox heuc I^saa^laa^en.
35.2: Yaakopv ziouc mbuox ninh nyei hmuangv doic aengx caux ninh yiem wuov deix mienh, “Meih mbuo maaih ganh fingx nyei haaix nyungc miuc-fangx oix zuqc guangc taux nzengc. Oix zuqc saax nzengc uix, yienc lui-houx.
35.1: Tin-Hungh gorngv mbuox Yaakopv, “Ih zanc meih oix zuqc suiv mingh yiem Mbetc^en. Yiem wuov oix zuqc ceix norm ziec-dorngh weic yie, dongh zinh ndaangc meih biaux meih nyei gorx, Esaau, wuov zanc hinc cuotv daaih bun meih buatc nyei Tin-Hungh.”
35.6: Yaakopv caux yietc zungv gan ninh nyei mienh mingh taux Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung, Lutv Zingh, (se Mbetc^en Zingh).
35.8: Dongh zinh ndaangc dorh Le^mbe^kaa hlo daaih wuov dauh bou, Nde^mbo^laa, guei seix mi'aqv. Ninh mbuo ziouc zangx jienv yiem Mbetc^en nyei naamh bung, yietc diuh domh mba'ong zuei ndiangx-gorn hlen. Wuov diuh ndiangx ninh mbuo cuotv norm mbuox heuc Anlon Mbaakutv.
35.24: Laasen nyei dorn maaih Yosepv caux Mben^yaa^min.
35.25: Laasen nyei nouh beiz, Mbin^haa, nyei dorn maaih Ndaan caux Napv^taa^li.
35.29: Ninh ziangh duqv siouc nyuonh ndaauv, hnyangx-jeiv gox haic, ziouc dangx qiex, guei seix mi'aqv. Ninh nyei i dauh dorn, Esaau caux Yaakopv, dorh ninh nyei sei mingh zangx.
35.11: Tin-Hungh aengx gorngv, “Yie se Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh. Meih oix zuqc maaih fu'jueiv camv. Meih nyei zeiv-fun oix hiaangx daaih benx yietc fingx caux camv-guoqv nyei fingx. Maaih deix meih nyei zeiv-fun yaac oix duqv zoux hungh.
35.16: Yaakopv mbuo yiem Mbetc^en cuotv jauv mingh. Corc leih E^faa^laa^taa Mungv go deix nyei, Laasen taux ziangh hoc ndutv sin. Ninh mun kouv, aqc duqv yungz haic.

41.21: Nyanc liuz mv baac maiv maaih haaix dauh zieqv duqv ninh mbuo nyanc wuov deix ngongh junc. Ninh mbuo corc hnangv zinh ndaangc nor, aqc mangc. Yie ziouc nyie daaih aqv.
41.15: Hungh diex gorngv mbuox ninh, “Yie mbeix norm mbeix yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh haih porv duqv cuotv. Yie haiz mienh gorngv meih haiz liuz mbeix ziouc haih porv mbeix nyei.”
41.23: Nqa'haav aengx cuotv siec dorv mbiauh maux, nyaux nzengc, jieqv nzengc, laaix zuqc dong bung nyei nziaaux buonc.
41.47: Yiem wuov deix bungx-zuoqc longx nyei siec hnyangx gu'nyuoz, deic-bung cuotv gaeng-zuangx ga'naaiv longx haic.
41.56: Domh ngorc gunv zoux gunv kouv buangv nzengc I^yipv Deic-Bung mi'aqv. Yosepv ziouc koi nqoi ninh nyei norm-norm dorngx nyei domh lamz maaic mbiauh cuotv bun I^yipv Mienh.
41.20: Wuov deix ngongh jaic nyanc nzengc cuotv ndaangc wuov deix siec dauh ngongh junc.
41.18: Maaih siec dauh yangh ngongh nyeiz nzueic nyei, junc nyei, yiem wuov ndaaih cuotv daaih yiem wuov nyanc luoqc diqc normh.
41.33: “Hnangv naaiv, tov hungh diex ginv dauh guai nyei, maaih cong-mengh nyei mienh, orn ninh gunv I^yipv Deic-Bung.
41.43: Faalo yaac bun Yosepv zueiz ninh nyei da'nyeic norm maaz-cie. Aengx maaih mienh mingh ndaangc heuc jienv gorngv, “Gueic njiec ov!” Faalo Hungh hnangv naaiv orn ninh gunv I^yipv Deic-Bung.
41.48: Yosepv ziouc siou naaiv deix siec hnyangx gu'nyuoz nyei laangh ziqc gapv zunv yiem norm-norm zingh. Yiem haaix norm zingh nyei horngc zaangc zuangx nyei laangh ziqc yaac siou daaih gapv zunv an jienv wuov norm zingh.
41.22: “Yie aengx mbeix buatc maaih zungh mbiauh cuotv siec dorv jauh nyei, yangh nyei.
41.42: Faalo Hungh ziouc hlutv maaih yienx nyei buoz-ndoqv-nzaeng tengx Yosepv dangh jienv. Bun ninh zuqv jienv la'maah ndie-muonc nyei lui-ndaauv, aengx zorqv diuh jiem-limc kuangx jienv ninh nyei jaang.
41.50: Domh ngorc nyei hnyangx-zingh maiv gaengh taux, On Zingh nyei sai mienh, Bo^ti^fe^laa, nyei sieqv, Aa^se^natv, yungz duqv i dauh dorn bun Yosepv.
41.31: Taux ngorc nyei ziangh hoc ba'laqc ngorc duqv kouv haic, mienh ziouc la'kuqv nzengc bungx-zuoqc longx nyei ziangh hoc.
41.4: Ngongh jaic ziouc nyanc nzengc wuov deix siec dauh ngongh junc. Mbeix liuz, hungh diex ziouc nyie daaih aqv.
41.29: Yiem naaiv mingh siec hnyangx gu'nyuoz, gormx I^yipv Deic-Bung bungx-zuoqc longx.
41.9: Wuov zanc tengx Faalo Hungh bouh diuv wuov dauh domh jien gorngv mbuox hungh diex, “Ih hnoi yie jangx zuqc yie zoux dorngc nyei sic aqv.
41.37: Faalo Hungh caux ninh nyei yietc zungv jien haiz Yosepv nyei za'eix longx nyei.
41.5: Hungh diex aengx m'njormh mingh, mbeix da'nyeic norm mbeix. Mbeix buatc maaih zungh mbiauh cuotv siec dorv, yietc zungv jauh nyei, yangh nyei.
41.3: Aengx maaih siec dauh yangh ngongh nyeiz korng jaic nyei, aqc mangc nyei, yiem Nai^aa Ndaaih cuotv daaih souv jienv junc wuov deix ngongh nyeiz nyei ga'hlen.
41.39: Ninh gorngv mbuox Yosepv, “Weic zuqc Tin-Hungh bun meih hiuv duqv naaiv deix yietc zungv sic, maiv maaih haaix dauh ndongc meih guai yaac maaih cong-mengh.
41.6: Nqa'haav aengx cuotv siec dorv mbiauh maux, jieqv nyei, laaix zuqc dong bung maengx nyei nziaaux buonc.
41.8: Da'nyeic ndorm ninh haiz hnyouv maiv henh ziouc heuc I^yipv Deic-Bung nyei mangc sou porv mbeix nyei fin-saeng caux guai-gorqv fin-saeng yietc zungv daaih. Faalo ziouc gorngv ninh nyei mbeix bun ninh mbuo muangx. Mv baac maiv maaih haaix dauh haih porv duqv mbeix cuotv.
41.57: Aengx maaih lungh ndiev mienh yietc zungv mingh I^yipv Deic-Bung tengx Yosepv maaiz mbiauh, weic zuqc lungh ndiev zuqc domh huaang domh ngorc kouv haic.
41.46: Yosepv jiez gorn weic I^yipv Deic-Bung nyei Faalo Hungh zoux gong wuov zanc, ninh nyei hnyangx-jeiv duqv faah ziepc hnyangx. Ninh yiem hungh dinc cuotv mingh youh gormx I^yipv Deic-Bung.
41.7: Mbiauh maux naqv nzengc wuov deix siec dorv jauh nyei, yangh nyei mbiauh mi'aqv. Faalo Hungh ziouc nyie daaih, hiuv duqv ninh mbeix buatc.
41.32: Hungh diex mbeix naaiv deix i norm mbeix biux mengh Tin-Hungh dingc ziangx hnangv naaiv nor zoux yaac oix siepv-siepv nyei zoux.
41.25: Yosepv ziouc gorngv mbuox Faalo Hungh, “I norm mbeix nyei eix leiz zungv fih hnangv nyei. Tin-Hungh jaa-ndaangc bun meih hiuv duqv ninh oix hnangv haaix nor zoux.
41.17: Faalo Hungh ziouc gorngv mbuox Yosepv, “Yie mbeix buatc yie ganh souv jienv Nai^aa Ndaaih hlen.
41.12: Maaih dauh Hipv^lu mienh lunx mienh yaac caux yie mbuo zuqc wuonx jienv loh. Ninh zoux goux hungh dinc nyei domh baeng-bieiv nyei nouh. Yie mbuo gorngv yie mbuo nyei mbeix bun ninh muangx, ninh ziouc ziux gorqv-mienh nyei mbeix porv mbeix nyei eix leiz.
41.34: Aengx orn deix jien gunv gormx deic-bung. Naaiv deix bungx-zuoqc longx nyei siec hnyangx gu'nyuoz oix zuqc siou yietc zungv gaeng-zuangx biaa gouv nyei yietc gouv.
41.30: Nqa'haav aengx maaih siec hnyangx domh huaang domh ngorc. Laaix ngorc hnaangx, mienh zungv oix la'kuqv bungx-zuoqc longx nyei hnyangx. Deic-bung yaac oix waaic nzengc.
41.11: Maaih muonz nor, yie mbuo i dauh zungv mbeix mbeix. Yietc dauh nyei mbeix maaih yietc nyungc eix leiz.
41.28: “Naaiv za'gengh hnangv yie mbuox liuz hungh diex wuov nor. Tin-Hungh oix bun meih hiuv duqv ninh oix hnangv haaix nor zoux.
41.44: Faalo aengx gorngv mbuox Yosepv, “Yie zoux Faalo Hungh Diex. Cuotv liuz meih ganh nqoi nzuih, yiem naaiv I^yipv Deic-Bung maiv maaih haaix dauh haih zoux haaix nyungc.”
41.45: Hungh diex tengx Yosepv cuotv norm I^yipv Deic-Bung nyei mbuox heuc Saax^fe^naatv Baa^ne^aa yaac zorqv On Zingh nyei sai mienh, Bo^ti^fe^laa, nyei sieqv, Aa^se^natv, bun Yosepv longc zoux auv. Yosepv ziouc cuotv mingh zaah gormx I^yipv Deic-Bung.
41.19: Nqa'haav aengx maaih siec dauh yangh ngongh nyeiz korng jaic nyei, aqc mangc nyei, cuotv daaih. Yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung yie maiv gaengh buatc jiex yangh ngongh ndongc naaic aqc mangc.
41.54: aengx bieqc siec hnyangx nyei domh ngorc doix nzengc Yosepv gorngv nyei waac. Norm-norm guoqv ngorc nzengc aqv. Mv baac I^yipv Deic-Bung norm-norm dorngx maaih nyanc nyei.
41.35: Naaiv deix hnyangx-zingh longx nyei ziangh hoc naaiv deix jien oix zuqc zorqv laangh ziqc gapv nzoih guei Faalo Hungh nyei buoz-ndiev siou jienv yiem norm-norm zingh zoux nyanc hopv.
41.41: Faalo Hungh aengx gorngv mbuox Yosepv, “Yie ih zanc orn meih gunv nzengc I^yipv Deic-Bung.”
41.13: Nqa'haav za'gengh doix-diuc nzengc ninh porv nyei eix leiz. Yie duqv zoux gong hnangv zinh ndaangc nor, mv baac zoux njuov wuov dauh zuqc dorh mingh ndiux jienv ndiangx daix guangc.”
41.40: Yie oix bun meih goux yie nyei dinc. Yie nyei zuangx baeqc fingx yaac oix zuqc mbuoqc meih, muangx meih nyei waac. Kungx yie ganh maaih lingc gauh hlo jiex meih nyei hnangv.”
41.55: Taux I^yipv Mienh ngorc daaih, zuangx baeqc fingx mingh tengx Faalo Hungh tov nyanc. Hungh diex gorngv mbuox ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo oix zuqc mingh lorz Yosepv hnangv. Ninh hnangv haaix nor gorngv, meih mbuo oix zuqc ei jienv ninh nyei waac zoux.”
41.26: Wuov deix siec dauh yangh ngongh junc beiv siec hnyangx. Wuov deix siec dorv mbiauh jauh yaac beiv siec hnyangx. I norm mbeix nyei eix leiz se fih hnangv nyei.
41.52: Da'nyeic dauh dorn ninh cuotv mbuox heuc E^faa^im yaac gorngv, “Weic zuqc yiem naaiv deic-bung yie siouc kouv naanc mv baac Tin-Hungh bun yie duqv fu'jueiv.”
41.14: Faalo Hungh ziouc paaiv mienh mingh heuc Yosepv daaih. Ninh mbuo ziouc siepv-siepv nyei mingh dorh ninh cuotv. Yosepv teix siaam, japv mba'bieiv, yienc nqoi lui-houx, mingh taux Faalo Hungh nyei nza'hmien.
41.27: Nqa'haav cuotv wuov deix siec dauh yangh ngongh jaic nyei, aqc mangc nyei, caux wuov deix siec dorv mbiauh maux zuqc dong bung maengx nyei nziaaux buonc jieqv mingh, se beiv siec hnyangx domh huaang domh ngorc.
41.38: Hungh diex gorngv mbuox ninh nyei zuangx jien, “Mbuo haih lorz duqv ganh dauh hnangv naaiv dauh maaih Tin-Hungh nyei Singx Lingh fai?”
41.49: Yosepv siou duqv laangh ziqc ndongc koiv-hlen nyei saa-ziou camv. Camv gau, hlaau maiv hingh, saauv maiv hingh, ziang naaic maiv saauv aqv.
41.36: Naaiv deix laangh ziqc liouh jienv mbungh I^yipv Deic-Bung ngorc siec hnyangx nyei ziangh hoc ziouc maaih nyanc maaih hopv weic maiv bun deic-bung laaix ngorc hnaangx zuqc mietc nzengc.”
41.53: I^yipv Deic-Bung bungx-zuoqc longx nyei siec hnyangx jiex liuz,
41.10: Maaih nzunc hungh diex qiex jiez ninh nyei bou, ziouc zorqv yie caux zoux njuov nyei domh jien mingh wuonx jienv yiem goux hungh dinc nyei domh baeng-bieiv nyei biauv wuov norm loh.
41.2: Maaih siec dauh yangh ngongh nyeiz nzueic nyei, junc nyei, yiem ndaaih cuotv daaih yiem wuov nyanc luoqc diqc normh.
41.1: Jiex daaih buangv i hnyangx, Faalo Hungh mbeix norm mbeix, mbeix buatc ninh ganh souv jienv Nai^aa Ndaaih hlen.
41.24: Wuov deix mbiauh maux naqv nzengc wuov deix siec dorv mbiauh jauh mi'aqv. Yie gorngv yie nyei mbeix bun mangc sou porv mbeix nyei fin-saeng muangx yaac maiv maaih yietc dauh haih porv duqv cuotv.”
41.16: Yosepv dau Faalo Hungh, “Se maiv zeiz yie haih porv mbeix. Tin-Hungh ganh oix porv duqv horpc mbuox Faalo.”
41.51: Yosepv ziouc tengx ninh nyei dorn-hlo cuotv mbuox heuc Maa^natv^se. Ninh gorngv, “Tin-Hungh tengx yie la'kuqv yie nyei yietc zungv kouv naanc caux yie nyei die nyei biauv zong hmuangv doic.”

13.15: Yie bun nzengc meih caux meih nyei zeiv-fun yietc liuz yiem.
13.18: Apc^laam ziouc suiv ninh nyei ndopv-liuh mingh corng jienv yiem He^mbo^lon Horngc nitv Mamle nyei domh mba'ong zuei ndiangx-lomc. Yiem wuov ninh aengx ceix norm ziec-dorngh zaangc Ziouv.
13.12: Apc^laam corc yiem Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung. Lotv aeqv, yiem Jor^ndaen Horngc nyei ndau-baengh nyei zingh yaac corng ninh nyei ndopv-liuh nitv So^ndom.
13.13: So^ndom Mienh waaic haic, baamz zuiz dorngc Ziouv  camv.
13.5: Lotv gan jienv Apc^laam mingh. Ninh yaac maaih ba'gi yungh maaih yungh guanh, maaih ngongh guanh, maaih ninh ganh nyei hmuangv doic caux bou.
13.11: Lotv ziouc ginv Jor^ndaen Horngc nyei ndau-baengh yietc zungv benx ninh nyei buonc, ziouc cuotv jauv yangh dong bung mingh. Ninh mbuo i baeqv-fun ziouc bun nqoi doic mi'aqv.
13.14: Lotv caux Apc^laam bun nqoi doic liuz, Ziouv mbuox Apc^laam, “Cau hmien mangc gaax dong naamh fai baqv, da'faanh meih yiem naaiv mangc buatc nyei dorngx.
13.3: Ninh yiem Negepc, yietc kang suiv jiex yietc kang, mingh taux Mbetc^en Zingh, aengx nzuonx taux Mbetc^en caux Ai Zingh mbu'ndongx,
13.10: Lotv cau hmien samx mangc, buatc Jor^ndaen Horngc nyei ndau-baengh, cuotv So^aa Zingh wuov bung, maaih wuom-suiv longx hnangv Ziouv nyei huingx yaac hnangv I^yipv Deic-Bung nor. (Wuov zanc Ziouv maiv gaengh mietc So^ndom caux Go^mo^laa Zingh.)
13.2: Apc^laam butv zoih haic, maaih saeng-kuv, maaih jiem, maaih nyaanh camv haic.
13.1: Apc^laam dorh jienv ninh nyei auv caux ninh maaih nyei nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv cuotv I^yipv Deic-Bung mingh taux Negepc. Lotv yaac caux jienv ninh mingh.
13.4: dongh zinh ndaangc corng ndopv-liuh yaac ceix jiez ziec-dorngh wuov norm dorngx. Apc^laam aengx yiem wuov gorngv cuotv Ziouv nyei mbuox zaangc Ziouv.
13.6: Yiem wuov norm dorngx nyei ndau maiv jangv, maiv gaux ninh mbuo i dauh yiem. I dauh zungv maaih saeng-kuv camv haic. Juangc jienv yiem maiv njiec.
13.8: Apc^laam ziouc gorngv mbuox Lotv, “Mbuo maiv dungx da'hauv. Mbuo nyei goux saeng-kuv bou yaac maiv dungx da'hauv weic zuqc mbuo se cien nyei.
13.9: Ndau yietc zungv yiem meih wuov ndaangc maengx. Mbuo oix zuqc bun nqoi doic yiem. Se gorngv meih mingh zaaix bung, yie ziouc mingh mbiaauc bung. Se gorngv meih mingh mbiaauc bung, yie ziouc mingh zaaix bung.”
13.7: Apc^laam nyei goux saeng-kuv bou caux Lotv nyei goux saeng-kuv bou ziouc da'hauv aqv. (Wuov zanc Kaa^naa^an Mienh caux Be^litv^si Mienh corc yiem jienv wuov norm deic-bung.)
13.17: Meih mingh aqv. Mingh youh zueih ndaauv zueih jangv mangc gormx nzengc naaiv norm deic-bung weic zuqc yie oix jiu bun meih.”
13.16: Yie oix bun meih nyei zeiv-fun hiaangx daaih hnangv nie-mbung nor camv. Haaix dauh haih saauv duqv nzengc nie-mbung cingx daaih haih saauv duqv nzengc meih nyei zeiv-fun.

40.21: Bouh a'ngunc diuv wuov dauh aengx duqv zoux gong hnangv loz wuov nor, ziouc zorqv diuv-zaanv bouh mingh bun hungh diex.
40.15: Yie yiem Hipv^lu Mienh nyei deic-bung zuqc dorh taux naaiv daaih. Yiem naaiv I^yipv Deic-Bung yie yaac maiv dorngc haaix nyungc zic duqv bun yie zuqc wuonx jienv naaiv loh hmuangx.”
40.12: Yosepv gorngv, “Meih nyei mbeix nyei eix leiz se hnangv naaiv. Wuov deix buo nquaav nquaah beiv buo hnoi.
40.17: Gu'nguaaic wuov norm jei maaih nyungc-nyungc ziqv daaih nyei njuov bun Faalo Hungh nyanc. Mv baac norqc daaih nyanc wuov deix njuov.”
40.20: Aengx jiex buo hnoi taux Faalo Hungh nyei sih nyietv-hnoi, ninh ziouc mbenc nyanc hopv zoux jorm cingv ninh nyei yietc zungv zoux jien nyei mienh daaih. Ninh yaac bungx bouh a'ngunc diuv caux zoux njuov wuov deix i dauh domh jien cuotv daaih yiem zuangx jien nyei nza'hmien.
40.4: Goux hungh dinc wuov dauh domh baeng-bieiv paaiv Yosepv goux ninh mbuo. Ninh mbuo i dauh yaac zuqc wuonx jienv loh lauh nyei.
40.19: Aengx buo hnoi Faalo Hungh oix bun mienh hngaqv ndutv meih nyei m'nqorngv aengx zorqv meih nyei sei ndiux jienv ndiangx. Norqc yaac oix daaih nyanc meih nyei orv.”
40.18: Yosepv gorngv, “Meih nyei mbeix nyei eix leiz se hnangv naaiv. Wuov deix buo norm jei beiv buo hnoi.
40.22: Mv baac zoux njuov wuov dauh aeqv, Faalo Hungh heuc zorqv daaih ndiux jienv wuov ndiangx daix guangc mi'aqv. Naaiv deix sic za'gengh doix nzengc Yosepv porv nyei mbeix.
40.23: Mv baac bouh a'ngunc diuv wuov dauh jien la'kuqv Yosepv mi'aqv. Maiv jangx zuqc ninh aqv.
40.13: Aengx buo hnoi Faalo Hungh oix bungx meih cuotv, oix guangc meih nyei zuiz, yaac bun meih duqv zoux gong hnangv loz wuov nor. Meih aengx duqv bouh a'ngunc diuv bun Faalo Hungh hnangv zinh ndaangc meih zoux wuov nor.
40.9: Bouh a'ngunc diuv wuov dauh domh jien ziouc gorngv ninh nyei mbeix bun Yosepv muangx. Ninh gorngv, “Yie buatc diuh a'ngunc hmei yiem yie nyei nza'hmien.
40.5: Maaih muonz nor, bouh diuv caux zoux njuov wuov deix i dauh domh jien yiem wuov loh mbeix mbeix. Yietc dauh mbeix buatc yietc nyungc. Yietc dauh nyei mbeix yaac maaih yietc nyungc eix leiz.
40.14: Meih duqv longx nyei ziangh hoc tov jangx deix yie, zoux longx bun yie. Gorngv deix yie nyei jauv bun Faalo Hungh muangx, njoux yie cuotv naaiv norm loh.
40.3: ziouc zorqv ninh mbuo wuonx jienv goux hungh dinc wuov dauh domh baeng-bieiv nyei biauv nyei loh, dongh Yosepv zuqc wuonx wuov norm loh.
40.7: Ninh naaic gaax Faalo nyei domh jien, dongh caux ninh zuqc wuonx jienv ninh nyei ziouv nyei biauv nyei loh wuov deix i dauh, “Meih mbuo ih hnoi zoux haaix nyungc? Buatc nzauh nzauh wuov!”
40.10: Wuov diuh hmei yaac maaih buo caax nquaah. Yietv cuotv cunx daaih yaac nqoi biangh, biouv-joih yaac zuoqc.
40.2: Hungh diex qiex jiez haic naaiv deix i dauh jien,
40.1: Jiex liuz yietc caamx, tengx I^yipv Deic-Bung nyei Faalo Hungh bouh a'ngunc diuv wuov dauh domh jien caux zoux njuov bun Faalo Hungh nyanc wuov dauh domh jien dorngc hungh diex.
40.6: Da'nyeic ndorm Yosepv bieqc mingh mangc, buatc ninh mbuo i dauh zungv nzauh nzauh wuov.
40.8: Ninh mbuo dau, “A'hmuangx yie mbuo i dauh zungv mbeix mbeix. Yiem naaiv yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh haih tengx yie mbuo porv mbeix.” Yosepv dau, “Kungx Tin-Hungh hnangv haih porv mbeix maiv zeiz? Meih mbuo gorngv meih mbuo nyei mbeix bun yie muangx maah!”
40.11: Wuov zanc Faalo Hungh nyei zaanv yiem yie nyei buoz. Yie ziouc gaeqv wuov deix a'ngunc biouv nanv biouv-wuom dapv jienv zaanv bouh bun Faalo.”
40.16: Zoux njuov nyei domh jien buatc Yosepv porv mbeix nyei eix leiz longx, ninh ziouc gorngv mbuox Yosepv, “Yie yaac mbeix norm mbeix. Yie buatc yie ganh nyei m'nqorngv ndongx jienv buo norm jei, dapv jienv njuov nyei.

26.21: I^sakc nyei bou aengx wetv duqv norm wuom-kuotv. Mienh aengx daaih nzaeng. I^sakc ziouc cuotv mbuox heuc Sitc^naa.
26.15: Ninh mbuo ziouc wetv nie dinh ndipc dongh zinh ndaangc yiem I^sakc nyei die, Apc^laa^ham, nyei seix zeiv wuov zanc ninh nyei bou wetv daaih nyei wuom-kuotv.
26.12: I^sakc yiem wuov norm deic-bung zuangx ga'naaiv. Wuov hnyangx ninh zuangx yietc gouv siou duqv yietc baeqv gouv weic zuqc Ziouv ceix fuqv bun ninh.
26.17: I^sakc ziouc suiv mingh corng ndopv-liuh yiem Ge^laa^aa Horngz.
26.30: I^sakc weic ninh mbuo mbenc donx hnaangx longx nyei. Ninh mbuo ziouc yiem wuov nyanc, yiem wuov hopv.
26.20: Ge^laa^aa Zingh nyei yungz saeng-kuv nyei bou daaih caux I^sakc nyei yungz saeng-kuv nyei bou nzaeng. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Naaiv norm wuom-kuotv se yie mbuo nyei.” I^sakc ziouc cuotv wuov norm wuom-kuotv nyei mbuox heuc E^sekc, weic zuqc ninh mbuo daaih caux ninh nzaeng.
26.4: Yie oix bun meih nyei zeiv-fun hiaangx daaih ndongc gu'nguaaic lungh nyei hleix camv, yaac zorqv naaiv deix yietc zungv deic-bung bun ninh mbuo. Lungh ndiev maanc guoqv mienh yaac oix weic meih nyei zeiv-fun duqv fuqv,
26.28: Ninh mbuo dau, “Yie mbuo buatc duqv mengh nyei, Ziouv caux meih yiem. Yie mbuo daaih tov caux meih lomh nzoih laengz waac, bun meih caux yie mbuo liepc jiez ngaengc waac.
26.33: I^sakc ziouc cuotv wuov norm wuom-kuotv nyei mbuox heuc Qi^mbaa. Weic naaiv, wuov norm dorngx nyei zingh nyei mbuox heuc Mbe^e^qe^mbaa taux ih jaax hnoi.
26.35: Weic naaiv deix i dauh m'sieqv dorn, I^sakc caux Le^mbe^kaa zuqc nzauh camv.
26.19: I^sakc nyei bou aengx wetv norm wuom-kuotv yiem wuov horngz. Wetv cuotv zingv wuom daaih aqv.
26.34: Esaau duqv feix ziepc hnyangx wuov zanc ninh dorng jaa. Ninh longc Hitv^tai Mienh, Mbe^e^li, nyei sieqv, Yu^nditc. Aengx longc Hitv^tai Mienh, Elon, nyei sieqv, Mbaa^se^matv.
26.18: Ninh aengx wetv nzunc dongh yiem ninh nyei die, Apc^laa^ham, nyei seix zeiv wetv daaih nyei wuom-kuotv, weic zuqc Apc^laa^ham guei seix liuz, nqa'haav Fi^li^saa^die Mienh dinh ndipc nzengc mi'aqv. I^sakc yaac cuotv wuov deix wuom-kuotv nyei mbuox ziux zinh ndaangc ninh nyei die cuotv nyei mbuox.
26.22: I^sakc ziouc leih nqoi wuov norm dorngx aengx ganh wetv norm wuom-kuotv. Naaiv nzunc maiv maaih haaix dauh nzaeng aqv. Ninh ziouc cuotv wuov norm wuom-kuotv nyei mbuox heuc Le^hox^mbotc. Ninh gorngv, “Ih zanc Ziouv bun mbuo maaih dorngx yiem. Mbuo yiem naaiv norm deic-bung haih jaa duqv longx jienv mingh aqv.”
26.23: I^sakc aengx suiv mingh yiem Mbe^e^qe^mbaa Zingh.
26.13: Ninh gunv zoux gunv benx jienv faaux taux za'gengh zoux domh butv-zoih mienh.
26.9: Aa^mbi^me^lekv heuc I^sakc daaih ziouc gorngv, “Ninh za'gengh meih nyei auv niaa. Meih weic haaix diuc gorngv ninh zoux meih nyei muoc?” I^sakc dau, “Weic zuqc yie nzauh heix laaix ninh mienh oix daix yie mv bei.”
26.26: Aa^mbi^me^lekv Hungh caux tengx ninh caangh laangh nyei mienh, Aa^hutc^satv, aengx caux ninh nyei domh baeng-bieiv, Fiko, yiem Ge^laa^aa Zingh mingh lorz I^sakc.
26.5: weic zuqc Apc^laa^ham muangx yie nyei waac yaac ei jienv yie paaiv nyei jauv, caux yie nyei leiz-latc, yie nyei lingc caux leiz.”
26.27: Taux wuov I^sakc ziouc naaic gaax, “Zinh ndaangc meih mbuo nzorng yie, zunc yie cuotv meih mbuo nyei deic-bung. Ih zanc meih mbuo aengx daaih lorz yie zoux haaix nyungc?”
26.14: Ninh maaih ngongh, maaih ba'gi yungh, maaih yungh camv. Bou yaac maaih camv. Fi^li^saa^die Mienh ziouc mueic jieqv haic.
26.3: Oix zuqc yiem naaiv norm deic-bung, yie ziouc caux meih yiem yaac ceix fuqv bun meih, weic zuqc yie oix zorqv naaiv deix yietc zungv deic-bung bun meih caux meih nyei zeiv-fun yietc liuz yiem. Yie oix ei jienv yie caux meih nyei die, Apc^laa^ham, houv jiex ngaengc waac zoux ziangx.
26.7: Wuov norm dorngx nyei mienh naaic taux ninh nyei auv. I^sakc gorngv Le^mbe^kaa zoux ninh nyei muoc, gamh nziex maiv gorngv Le^mbe^kaa zoux ninh nyei auv. Ninh yiem hnyouv hnamv, “Nziex yiem naaiv nyei mienh haih laaix Le^mbe^kaa daix yie mv bei, weic zuqc Le^mbe^kaa ziangh duqv nzueic haic.”
26.10: Aa^mbi^me^lekv gorngv, “Meih fungc hnangv naaiv nor zoux bun yie mbuo? Se gorngv maaih dauh yie nyei baeqc fingx caux meih nyei auv bueix nor, se meih ganh dorh zuiz daaih hoic yie mbuo.”
26.2: Ziouv  hinc cuotv gorngv mbuox I^sakc, “Maiv dungx mingh yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung. Oix zuqc yiem dongh yie oix mbuox meih yiem nyei deic-bung.
26.1: Yiem Apc^laa^ham nyei seix zeiv, naaiv norm deic-bung buangh zuqc yietc nzunc domh huaang domh ngorc. Taux I^sakc nyei seix zeiv aengx buangh nzunc. I^sakc ziouc mingh taux Ge^laa^aa Zingh, Fi^li^saa^die Mienh nyei hungh, Aa^mbi^me^lekv wuov.
26.31: Da'nyeic ndorm ninh mbuo jiez sin nziouv nyei, laanh caux laanh liepc jiez ngaengc waac. Liepc liuz, I^sakc fungx ninh mbuo cuotv jauv, baengh orn nyei leih nqoi doic.
26.6: I^sakc ziouc yiem jienv Ge^laa^aa Zingh.
26.8: I^sakc yiem wuov lauh aqv. Maaih hnoi nor, Aa^mbi^me^lekv Hungh yiem hungh dinc mangc cuotv fong muonh, buatc I^sakc caux Le^mbe^kaa qam jienv jaax.
26.24: Wuov muonz Ziouv hinc cuotv mbuox ninh, “Yie se meih nyei die, Apc^laa^ham, nyei Tin-Hungh. Maiv dungx gamh nziex oc. Yie caux meih yiem yaac weic yie nyei bou, Apc^laa^ham, oix ceix fuqv bun meih yaac bun meih nyei zeiv-fun hiaangx jienv faaux.”
26.25: I^sakc ziouc yiem wuov ceix norm ziec-dorngh yaac gorngv cuotv Ziouv nyei mbuox daaih zaangc. Ninh yaac corng ndopv-liuh yiem wuov norm dorngx. Ninh nyei bou aengx wetv norm wuom-kuotv.
26.29: Tov laengz meih maiv zoux haaix nyungc hoic yie mbuo, hnangv zinh ndaangc yie mbuo maiv zoux haaix nyungc hoic meih nor. Yie mbuo kungx zoux longx bun meih hnangv. Meih yaac duqv baengh orn nyei cuotv deic-bung. Ih zanc meih se Ziouv ceix fuqv nyei mienh.”
26.11: Aa^mbi^me^lekv ziouc hatc ninh nyei baeqc fingx, “Haaix dauh zoux haaix nyungc bun naaiv dauh mienh fai ninh nyei auv, wuov dauh oix zuqc daix daic.”
26.32: Dongh wuov hnoi I^sakc nyei bou daaih gorngv taux ninh mbuo wetv wuom-kuotv nyei jauv. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Yie mbuo wetv taux wuom mi'aqv.”
26.16: Aa^mbi^me^lekv gorngv mbuox I^sakc, “Meih oix zuqc suiv nqoi yie mbuo aqv, weic zuqc meih ih zanc gauh henv yie mbuo.”

14.21: So^ndom Zingh nyei hungh gorngv mbuox Apc^laam, “Tuix mienh nzuonx bun yie. Ga'naaiv meih ganh longc aqv.”
14.15: Taux wuov Apc^laam zorqv ninh ganh nyei mienh bun nqoi zoux yietc guanh yietc guanh nyei, lungh muonz zanc mborqv wuov deix mienh aengx zunc jienv mingh taux Ho^mbaa Zingh yiem Ndaa^matv^gatc Zingh nyei baqv bung maengx.
14.12: Ninh mbuo yaac caangv Apc^laam nyei fun, Lotv, caux ninh nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv dorh mingh nzengc, weic zuqc ninh yiem So^ndom Zingh.
14.17: Apc^laam mborqv hingh Ke^ndo^laa^o^me Hungh aengx caux ninh dongh hnyouv mborqv jaax wuov deix hungh, ninh ziouc nzuonx. Taux Saawe Horngc, (aengx maaih mbuox heuc “Hungh Horngc”), So^ndom Zingh nyei hungh cuotv daaih zipv.
14.20: Ceng Yiem Hlang Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh, weic zuqc ninh bun meih nyei win-wangv zuqc yiem meih nyei buoz-ndiev.” Apc^laam ziouc zorqv ninh duqv nzuonx daaih nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv, ziepc gouv nyei yietc gouv bun Men^ki^se^ndekc.
14.4: Ninh mbuo zuqc Ke^ndo^laa^o^me Hungh gunv ninh mbuo ziepc nyeic hnyangx mv baac taux ziepc faam hnyangx wuov hnyangx ninh mbuo ngaengc jienv.
14.19: Ninh yaac buang waac bun Apc^laam, “Tov Yiem Hlang Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh, Zeix Lungh Zeix Ndau Wuov Dauh, ceix fuqv bun Apc^laam.
14.18: Aengx maaih Saalem Zingh nyei hungh, Men^ki^se^ndekc, dorh deix njuov caux a'ngunc diuv bun Apc^laam. Men^ki^se^ndekc zoux Yiem Hlang Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh nyei sai mienh.
14.22: Apc^laam dau So^ndom Zingh nyei hungh, “Yie sung jienv buoz dorng jienv Ziouv, dongh Yiem Hlang Jiex, Zeix Lungh Zeix Ndau nyei Tin-Hungh, laengz jiex ngaengc waac.
14.23: Yie laengz da'faanh meih nyei haaix nyungc ga'naaiv yie maiv longc yietc deix. Liemh yietc diuh suix fai yietc diuh heh hlaang yie zungv maiv longc weic bun meih nqa'haav hingv maiv duqv gorngv, ‘Yie ceix Apc^laam butv zoih.’
14.13: Maaih dauh mienh biaux ndutv ziouc dorh naaiv deix sic mingh mbuox Hipv^lu Mienh, Apc^laam. Apc^laam yiem Aa^mo^lai Mienh, Mamle, nyei domh mba'ong zuei ndiangx-lomc. Mamle caux ninh nyei i dauh youz, Etc^ko caux Aa^ne, zoux Apc^laam nyei loz-gaeng doic.
14.9: caux wuov deix biei dauh hungh mborqv jaax. Maaih Elaam Zingh nyei hungh, Ke^ndo^laa^o^me, maaih Goyim Zingh nyei hungh, Ti^ndaan, maaih Sinaa Deic-Bung nyei hungh, Am^laa^fen, yaac maaih En^laa^saax Zingh nyei hungh, Aa^le^okc. Biei dauh hungh caux biaa dauh hungh mborqv jaax.
14.5: Ziepc feix hnyangx wuov hnyangx, Ke^ndo^laa^o^me Hungh aengx caux ninh gapv qaqv mborqv jaax wuov deix hungh mingh mborqv hingh yiem Atc^taa^lotv Kaan^naa^im nyei Le^faa^im Mienh, yiem Haam Zingh nyei Sux^sim Mienh, yiem Saawe Ki^li^yaa^taa^im nyei ndau-baengh nyei Emim Mienh,
14.14: Apc^laam haiz gorngv ninh nyei cien fun zuqc caangv mingh, ninh ziouc diuc nzoih yiem ninh nyei biauv zong cuotv seix, haih mborqv jaax nyei m'jangc dorn, faam-baeqv ziepc betv dauh, zunc jienv mingh taux Ndaan Zingh.
14.3: Naaiv deix biaa dauh hungh gapv jienv qaqv yiem Sitc^ndim Horngc (se Koiv-Nzauv nyei dorngx) mborqv jaax.
14.7: Ninh mbuo aengx nzuonx taux En Mitv^fatv, (naaiv se Kaa^ndetc) mborqv hingh nzengc yiem Haa^saa^son Taamaa nyei Aa^maa^lekv Mienh, liemh Aa^mo^lai Mienh.
14.10: Sitc^ndim Horngc maaih nyouh haic nyei zung nyei kuotv buangv nzengc. So^ndom caux Go^mo^laa Zingh nyei hungh tiux biaux, ninh mbuo maaih deix mienh ndortv naaiv deix zung nyei kuotv mi'aqv. Zengc njiec nyei mienh biaux faaux mbong.
14.2: Naaiv deix hungh diex mingh caux So^ndom Zingh nyei hungh, Mbei^laa, Go^mo^laa Zingh nyei hungh, Mbinsaa, Atc^maa Zingh nyei hungh, Sinaapv, Se^mbo^yim Zingh nyei hungh, Se^me^mbe, caux Mbelaa Zingh (naaiv se So^aa Zingh) nyei hungh mborqv jaax.
14.1: Doix wuov zanc nyei lungh ndiev maaih Sinaa Deic-Bung nyei hungh, Am^laa^fen, maaih En^laa^saax Zingh nyei hungh, Aa^li^okc, maaih Elaam Zingh nyei hungh, Ke^ndo^laa^o^me, aengx maaih Goyim Zingh nyei hungh, Ti^ndaan.
14.6: aengx caux Se^i Deic-Bung mbong zaangc dorngx nyei Holi Mienh, aengx mborqv hingh taux En^baa^laan Zingh nitv deic-bung-huaang wuov.
14.8: Nqa'haav So^ndom Zingh nyei hungh, Go^mo^laa Zingh nyei hungh, Atc^maa Zingh nyei hungh, Se^mbo^yim Zingh nyei hungh, caux Mbelaa Zingh (naaiv se So^aa) nyei hungh cuotv mingh Sitc^ndim Horngc ndau-baengh nyei dorngx
14.24: Yie ganh maiv longc yietc nyungc cuotv liuz yie nyei mienh nyanc liuz hopv liuz nyei. Maaih gan yie mingh nyei mienh, Aa^ne, Etc^ko caux Mamle, oix zuqc bun ninh mbuo duqv ninh mbuo nyei buonc hnangv.”
14.11: Wuov deix biei dauh hungh caangv nzengc So^ndom caux Go^mo^laa Zingh nyei nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv caux yietc zungv nyanc hopv ziouc mingh mi'aqv.
14.16: Ninh mbuo zorqv yietc zungv caangv mingh nyei ga'naaiv nzuonx. Liemh ninh nyei fun, Lotv, caux Lotv nyei nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv, aengx caux m'sieqv dorn caux baeqc fingx yietc zungv dorh nzuonx nzengc daaih aqv.

27.21: I^sakc aengx gorngv mbuox Yaakopv, “Dorn aac, daaih fatv deix bun yie hluo gaax, meih za'gengh yie nyei dorn, Esaau, zeiz fai maiv zeiz.”
27.15: Le^mbe^kaa aengx mingh zorqv ninh nyei dorn-hlo, Esaau, nyei lui-houx, dongh siou jienv wuov biauv gauh longx jiex wuov yiemc, bun ninh nyei dorn-faix, Yaakopv, zuqv jienv.
27.23: Ninh zieqv maiv duqv naaiv se Yaakopv weic zuqc buoz maaih biei suqv-suqv hnangv ninh nyei gorx, Esaau, nyei buoz nor. I^sakc ziouc buang waac bun ninh.
27.20: I^sakc naaic ninh nyei dorn, “Dorn aah! Meih fungc buonv duqv orv ndongc naaic siepv?” Yaakopv dau, “Ziouv,  meih nyei Tin-Hungh, bun yie haih buangh orv siepv nyei.”
27.18: Yaakopv mingh taux ninh nyei die wuov gorngv, “Aa die aac.” Ninh nyei die dau, “Dorn aac, meih dongh haaix dauh dorn?”
27.33: I^sakc liemh zeih sin zinx njuonv-njuonv nyei. Ninh gorngv, “Wuov nyungc, haaix dauh buonv orv dorh daaih bun yie? Yie koqv hoqc nyanc liuz, meih ziouc taux. Die zungv buang waac bun ninh mi'aqv. Ziux die buang nyei waac ninh yaac za'gengh duqv.”
27.43: Dorn aah! Muangx maa nyei waac oc. Meih oix zuqc biaux mingh Haalaan Zingh, maa nyei gorx, Laa^mbaan wuov.
27.22: Yaakopv mingh fatv nyei. Ninh nyei die, I^sakc, ziouc hluo ninh. I^sakc gorngv, “Meih nyei qiex se hnangv Yaakopv nyei qiex, mv baac meih nyei buoz haiz hnangv Esaau nyei buoz nor.”
27.42: Le^mbe^kaa haiz gorngv ninh nyei dorn-hlo, Esaau, daav za'eix daix dorn-faix, Yaakopv, ninh ziouc heuc Yaakopv daaih gorngv mbuox ninh, “Muangx gaax, meih nyei gorx, Esaau, daav za'eix oix jaauv win daix meih.
27.31: Esaau ziouc zoux deix orv kuv nyei dorh mingh bun ninh nyei die nyanc. Ninh gorngv, “Aa die aah! Jiez sin zueiz jienv nyanc yie buonv daaih nyei orv aqv. Nyanc liuz, aa die duqv buang waac bun yie.”
27.4: Zoux kuv nyei hnangv yietc gau yie oix nyanc wuov nor, mbenc daaih bun yie, weic yiem yie maiv gaengh daic yie duqv buang nqa'haav laai wuov nzunc waac bun meih.”
27.29: Tov bun camv-fingx mienh fu-sux meih, yaac bun camv-norm guoqv nyei mienh gueic njiec baaix meih. Tov bun meih haih zoux meih nyei muoz-doic nyei ziouv, yaac bun meih nyei maa nyei zeiv-fun gueic njiec baaix meih. Haaix dauh zioux meih, tov bun wuov dauh zuqc zioux. Haaix dauh buang waac meih, tov bun wuov dauh duqv Ziouv  ceix fuqv.”
27.9: Meih mingh yungh guanh wuov ginv i dauh yungh dorn nzueic nyei junc nyei dorh daaih bun maa. Maa ziouc ei jienv yietc gau meih nyei die oix nyanc kuv nyei mbenc daaih bun ninh nyanc.
27.37: I^sakc dau, “Die bun ninh zoux meih nyei ziouv yaac bun yietc zungv muoz-doic cien-ceqv zoux ninh nyei bou. Liemh mbiauh hmeiv caux siang-a'ngunc diuv yie bun weic yungz ninh nyei maengc. Dorn aah! Yie maaih haaix nyungc haih tengx meih?”
27.5: I^sakc caux ninh nyei dorn, Esaau, i dorn-diex gorngv waac wuov zanc, Le^mbe^kaa muangx jienv nyei. Esaau mingh gemh buonv orv wuov zanc,
27.3: Dorn aac, zorqv meih nyei juang-zinx caux forng mingh gemh buonv dauh orv daaih bun yie nyanc.
27.39: I^sakc ziouc gorngv mbuox ninh, “Meih zuqc yiem leih ndau-touv longx nyei dorngx go. Lungh nyei mbiungc-suiv meih yaac maiv duqv.
27.6: Le^mbe^kaa mbuox ninh nyei dorn, Yaakopv, “A'jang yie haiz meih nyei die gorngv mbuox Esaau,
27.8: Dorn aac, hnangv naaic, meih muangx yie, ei jienv yie nyei waac zoux.
27.46: Le^mbe^kaa gorngv mbuox I^sakc, “Laaix Esaau nyei i dauh Hitv^tai Mienh auv, yie maiv noic faanh ziangh aqv. Se gorngv Yaakopv aengx longc dauh naaiv norm deic-bung nyei Hitv^tai Mienh nyei sieqv zoux auv nor, yie daic gauh longx.”
27.7: ‘Buonv dauh orv mbenc daaih kuv nyei bun yie nyanc weic yiem yie maiv gaengh daic duqv yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien buang waac bun meih.’
27.32: Ninh nyei die, I^sakc, naaic gaax, “Meih haaix dauh?” Esaau dau, “Yie meih nyei dorn-hlo, Esaau.”
27.25: I^sakc gorngv, “Dorn aac, dorh meih buonv daaih nyei orv bun die nyanc. Nyanc liuz ziouc buang waac bun meih.” Yaakopv ziouc dorh orv daaih bun ninh nyanc, aengx dorh a'ngunc diuv daaih bun ninh hopv.
27.17: Le^mbe^kaa zorqv ninh liuc leiz ziangx nyei orv caux njuov bun Yaakopv bouh mingh.
27.12: Buangh zuqc die hluo yie, ninh ziouc hiuv duqv yie nduov ninh. Ninh maiv zeiz buang waac bun yie, zungv zioux yie mv bei!”
27.34: Esaau haiz ninh nyei die nyei waac ninh hnyouv mun haic, bungx-sing bungx-qiex nyei nyiemv jienv gorngv, “Aa die aah! Tov buang waac yie. Tov die yaac buang waac bun yie maah!”
27.30: I^sakc buang liuz waac, Yaakopv jang-jang cuotv mingh hnangv, ninh nyei gorx, Esaau, buonv duqv orv nzuonx daaih.
27.11: Yaakopv gorngv mbuox ninh nyei maa, “Maa ganh hiuv duqv nyei, Esaau cuotv biei suqv-suqv wuov. Yie maiv maaih biei, hliouv njang nyei.
27.28: Tov Tin-Hungh bun mbiungc-suiv yiem wuov lungh njiec, yaac bun meih nyei ndau longx. Tov ninh yaac bun meih duqv mbiauh hmeiv caux siang-a'ngunc diuv camv.
27.44: Oix zuqc caux ninh mbuo yiem douc zuov meih nyei gorx nyei ga'qiex fiu mingh,
27.45: la'kuqv meih zoux bun ninh nyei sic, yie m'daaih bun mienh mingh dorh meih nzuonx. Maa fungc haih bun duqv yietc hnoi daic i dauh dorn?”
27.19: Yaakopv dau, “Yie meih nyei dorn-hlo, Esaau. Yie ei die nyei waac mbenc ziangx. Die jiez sin zueiz jienv nyanc yie buonv daaih nyei orv aqv. Nyanc liuz, die duqv buang waac bun yie.”
27.35: I^sakc dau, “Dongh yie oix buang meih nyei waac meih nyei youz daaih nduov yie buang bun ninh nzengc mi'aqv.”
27.41: Esaau nzorng haic Yaakopv laaix ninh nyei die buang waac bun Yaakopv. Ninh yiem hnyouv hnamv, “Hnamv daaih maiv lauh yie nyei die guei seix. Zuov yie mbuo nzauh nyiemv nyei ziangh hoc jiex liuz, yie oix daix Yaakopv guangc aqv.”
27.13: Ninh nyei maa gorngv, “Yie nyei dorn aac, se gorngv zuqc houv nor, se ndortv zuqc maa ganh. Kungx oix zuqc muangx maa nyei waac hnangv. Mingh zorqv yungh daaih bun maa oc.”
27.40: Meih oix zuqc kaux nzuqc ndaauv yungz maengc, yaac oix zuqc fu-sux meih nyei youz. Mv baac meih haaix zanc haih simv duqv ndutv ninh, meih ziouc maiv zuqc ninh gunv.”
27.26: Nyanc liuz, hopv liuz I^sakc gorngv, “Dorn aac, daaih fatv deix zom dangh die nyei hmien.”
27.14: Yaakopv ziouc mingh zorqv daaih bun ninh nyei maa. Ninh nyei maa ei jienv Yaakopv nyei die yietc gau oix nyanc nyei mbenc ziangx.
27.27: Yaakopv mingh zom ninh nyei die wuov zanc, ninh nyei die hnomv zuqc Yaakopv nyei lui nyei nziaau ziouc buang waac ninh nyei dorn aqv. Ninh gorngv, “Yie nyei dorn ndaang nyei, hnangv Ziouv ceix fuqv nyei liangx-ndeic ndaang nor.
27.38: Esaau qaqv tov ninh nyei die, “Aa die aah! Meih kungx maaih nduqc nyungc buang nyei waac hnangv? Tov meih yaac buang deix bun yie maah!” Ninh aengx nyiemv nzunc aqv.
27.36: Esaau gorngv, “Ninh nyei mbuox heuc Yaakopv gengh! puix haic aqv, weic zuqc ninh nduov yie i nzunc mi'aqv. Yie zoux dorn-hlo duqv sung-gouv nyei leiz ninh nduov duqv mi'aqv. Ih zanc dongh die oix buang bun yie nyei waac ninh yaac nduov die buang bun ninh nzengc mi'aqv. Aa die aah! Meih maiv liouh yietc deix buang bun yie aqv?”
27.10: Mbenc ziangx meih dorh mingh bun meih nyei die nyanc weic yiem ninh maiv gaengh daic haih buang nqa'haav laai wuov nzunc waac bun meih.”
27.2: I^sakc gorngv, “Die gox haic aqv. Maiv hiuv duqv haaix hnoi daic.
27.1: I^sakc gox haic aqv. M'zing yaac mbuov, mangc maiv buatc. Ninh heuc ninh nyei dorn-hlo, Esaau, daaih gorngv mbuox ninh, “Dorn aac.” Esaau dau, “Aa die aac, yie yiem naaiv oc.”
27.24: Mv baac ninh aengx naaic nzunc, “Meih za'gengh yie nyei dorn, Esaau, fai?” Yaakopv dau, “Zeiz nyei.”
27.16: Ninh aengx zorqv yungh dorn nyei ndopv naetv jienv Yaakopv nyei buoz caux jaang, dongh maiv maaih biei nyei dorngx. Zorng ziangx,

38.21: Ninh ziouc naaic gaax wuov norm dorngx nyei mienh, “Yiem E^naa^im Mungv nyei jauv-hlen wuov dauh maaic buonv-sin nyei m'sieqv dorn jiex haaix mi'aqv.” Ninh mbuo dau, “Yiem naaiv maiv maaih maaic buonv-sin nyei m'sieqv dorn.”
38.15: Yu^ndaa buatc Taamaa, laaic ninh zoux maaic buonv-sin nyei m'sieqv dorn, weic zuqc ninh maaih ndie mbiorngz jienv hmien.
38.12: Jiex daaih, Yu^ndaa nyei auv, Qu^aa nyei sieqv, guei seix mi'aqv. Zuov nzauh nyei ziangh hoc jiex liuz, Yu^ndaa caux ninh nyei loz-gaeng doic, Aa^ndun^lam Mienh, Hilaa, mingh Tim^naa^haa, maaih mienh tengx japv ninh nyei ba'gi yungh biei wuov norm dorngx.
38.17: Yu^ndaa dau, “Yie oix zorqv dauh yie nyei yungh guanh nyei yungh dorn bun meih.” Taamaa dau, “Meih oix longc haaix nyungc dingc jienv ndaangc taux meih fungx yungh dorn daaih?”
38.30: Ndoh jienv fei-siqv wuov dauh dorn nqa'haav yungz yaac cuotv mbuox heuc Zelaa.
38.20: Yu^ndaa mbuox ninh nyei loz-gaeng doic, wuov dauh Aa^ndun^lam Mienh, Hilaa, dorh yungh dorn mingh zuoqc ninh dingc wuov deix ga'naaiv nzuonx. Hilaa mingh gau, lorz maiv buatc wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn.
38.4: Ninh nyei auv aengx maaih da'nyeic nzunc sin, yungz duqv dauh dorn, cuotv mbuox heuc Onan.
38.28: Mun jienv wuov zanc, maaih dauh nyei buoz cuotv ndaangc. Goux Taamaa wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn zorqv diuh fei-siqv ndoh jienv gu'nguaaz nyei buoz-sei-jaang aengx gorngv, “Naaiv dauh cuotv seix ndaangc.”
38.19: Taamaa nzuonx mingh zorqv nqoi mbiorngz hmien nyei ndie aengx zuqv jienv ninh nyei auv-guaav nyei lui-houx hnangv loz wuov nor.
38.18: Yu^ndaa naaic gaax, “Meih oix yie dingc haaix nyungc ndaangc gauh longx?” Taamaa gorngv, “Oix zuqc bun meih nyei yienx caux ndiux yienx nyei hlaang aengx caux meih ih zanc nanv jienv naaiv diuh biaav-mbiaac.” Yu^ndaa ziouc zorqv daaih bun ninh mi'aqv. Bun jienv ziouc caux ninh bueix. Nqa'haav Taamaa maaih jienv Yu^ndaa nyei gu'nguaaz aqv.
38.22: Hilaa ziouc nzuonx mingh mbuox Yu^ndaa, “Yie lorz maiv buatc wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn. Yiem wuov nyei mienh yaac gorngv yiem naaic maiv maaih jiex maaic buonv-sin nyei m'sieqv dorn.”
38.23: Yu^ndaa gorngv, “Wuov deix ga'naaiv cinh ninh longc aqv. Nziex mienh oix jatv mbuo mv bei. Dorh yungh dorn mingh oix bun yaac lorz maiv buatc ninh bun.”
38.13: Maaih mienh mbuox Taamaa, “Meih nyei ong-buoc oix mingh Tim^naa^haa japv ba'gi yungh biei.”
38.9: Onan hiuv duqv yungz duqv fu'jueiv mv baac maiv funx ninh nyei buonc. Hnangv naaic, haaix zanc caux ninh nyei nyaam bueix, ninh duqv-eix bungx ninh nyei nyim ndortv ga'ndiev ndau weic maiv bun gorx maaih hoz doic zeiv-fun.
38.26: Yu^ndaa zieqv duqv naaiv deix ga'naaiv se ninh nyei. Ninh gorngv, “Naaiv dauh m'sieqv dorn zoux nyei se gauh horpc yie zoux nyei, weic zuqc yie maiv bun ninh longc yie nyei dorn, Qelaa.” Nqa'haav Yu^ndaa yietc liuz maiv caux ninh bueix.
38.5: Nqa'haav aengx yungz dauh dorn, cuotv mbuox heuc Qelaa. Qelaa cuotv seix wuov zanc Yu^ndaa yiem Kesipv.
38.27: Taux yungz nyei ziangh hoc buatc Taamaa maaih sung-gu'nguaaz.
38.14: Taamaa ziouc yienc nqoi ninh nyei auv-guaav lui-houx, zorqv kuaaiv ndie buix jienv, mbiorngz jienv hmien. Zorng ziangx, ninh zueiz jienv mingh Tim^naa^haa nyei jauv-hlen, bieqc E^naa^im Mungv nyei zingh gaengh ndaangc. Ninh hiuv duqv Yu^ndaa nyei dorn-laai, Qelaa, hlo aqv, mv baac Yu^ndaa maiv bun ninh longc.
38.3: ninh nyei auv ziouc maaih jienv sin aqv, yungz duqv dauh dorn, cuotv mbuox heuc E^aa.
38.7: Mv baac ziux Ziouv  mangc, E^aa waaic haic. Ziouv ziouc bun ninh daic mi'aqv.
38.10: Ziux Ziouv  mangc, Onan zoux nyei sic se waaic haic. Ziouv  yaac bun ninh daic mi'aqv.
38.2: Yiem wuov Yu^ndaa buangh dauh Kaa^naa^an Mienh, Qu^aa, nyei sieqv, ziouc longc zoux auv. Longc jienv,
38.1: Dongh wuov zanc, Yu^ndaa leih nqoi ninh nyei muoz-doic, biaux mingh gan dauh Aa^ndun^lam Mienh, mbuox heuc Hilaa.
38.6: Yu^ndaa tengx ninh nyei dorn-hlo, E^aa, lorz duqv dauh auv, mbuox heuc Taamaa.
38.8: Yu^ndaa aengx gorngv mbuox Onan, “Meih oix zuqc mingh caux meih nyei nyaam bueix weic zoux youz nyei leiz-nyeic, duqv fu'jueiv tengx meih nyei gorx maaih hoz doic zeiv-fun.”
38.24: Nqa'haav aav lamh deix buo hlaax nyieqc nyei dorngx, maaih mienh mbuox Yu^ndaa, “Meih nyei mbuangz, Taamaa, hienx nqox. Ih zanc toi gu'nguaaz aqv.” Yu^ndaa gorngv, “Dorh ninh cuotv daaih buov guangc maah!”
38.25: Dorh Taamaa cuotv daaih wuov zanc, Taamaa juix waac mingh mbuox ninh nyei ong-buoc, “Hienx yie toi gu'nguaaz se dongh naaiv deix ga'naaiv nyei ziouv. Longx-longx nyei mangc gaax. Naaiv norm yienx, hlaang caux biaav-mbiaac se haaix dauh nyei?”
38.29: Mv baac gu'nguaaz aengx hluotv ninh nyei buoz bieqc, da'nyeic dauh ziouc yungz cuotv ndaangc. Goux Taamaa wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn gorngv, “Zoux haaix nyungc meih mbengx cuotv ndaangc laeh?” Wuov dauh dorn ninh mbuo ziouc cuotv mbuox heuc Beletv.
38.11: Yu^ndaa gorngv mbuox ninh nyei mbuangz, Taamaa, “Nzuonx mingh caux meih nyei die yiem aqv. Meih oix zuqc zoux auv-guaav zuov yie nyei dorn, Qelaa, hlo daaih.” Yu^ndaa hnangv naaiv nor gorngv weic zuqc ninh yiem hnyouv hnamv nzauh heix Qelaa daic hnangv ninh nyei gorx mbuo nor. Taamaa ziouc nzuonx ninh nyei die nyei biauv mi'aqv.
38.16: Yu^ndaa mingh wuov jauv-hlen caux ninh gorngv waac. Ninh gorngv, “Daaih maah! Bun yie caux meih bueix oc.” Yu^ndaa maiv hiuv duqv se ninh nyei mbuangz. Taamaa naaic, “Yie caux meih bueix, meih bun haaix nyungc yie?”

49.21: “Napv^taa^li benx dauh njaih nyeiz bungx wuov lomc, ninh njiec duqv dorn nzueic nyei.
49.15: Ninh buatc ninh hitv nyei dorngx longx, wuov norm deic-bung kuh yiem, ninh ziouc nyiex jienv ga'naaiv jutv-jutv nyei mingh, laengz zoux nouh bun mienh aapv zoux gong kouv.
49.12: Weic hopv a'ngunc diuv, ninh nyei m'zing siqv, weic ninh hopv ngongh nyorx, ninh nyei nyaah yaac baeqc.
49.17: Ndaan oix benx diuh naang yiem wuov jauv, benx diuh naang-doqc yiem wuov jauv-hlen, nyorqv maaz nyei zaux, hoic geh maaz nyei mienh da'nziaaux faan, ndortv ga'ndiev ndau mingh.
49.30: Makv^be^laa, nyei mbaengx-kuotv. Naaiv deix ndau yiem Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung, Mamle nyei dong bung maengx. Se Apc^laa^ham tengx wuov dauh Hitv^tai Mienh, E^fo^lon, maaiz wuov nzong ndau caux wuov norm mbaengx-kuotv zoux zouv-gemh.
49.20: “Aa^se nyei deic-bung bungx-zuoqc, ga'naaiv-zuangx longx, haih zoux duqv puix hungh diex nyanc.
49.4: Meih beiv hnangv wuom-seix nor, ziouc maiv duqv zoux hlo, weic zuqc meih bueix meih nyei die nyei auv-dorn, bun die nyei coux maaih uix.
49.28: Naaiv se I^saa^laa^en nyei ziepc nyeic fingx. Yaac ziux ninh mbuo nyei die buang nyei waac puix duqv ninh mbuo dauh dauh.
49.33: Yaakopv paaiv waac mbuox liuz ninh nyei dorn mbuo, ninh bueix njiec coux  ziouc dangx qiex, guei seix mi'aqv.
49.19: “Gaatc oix zuqc guanh janx-zaqc caangv, mv baac ninh daaux sin zunc jienv nitv jienv zaux-nqo mingh.
49.18: “ Ziouv aac, yie zuov jienv meih njoux yie.
49.22: “Yosepv se ziangh biouv camv nyei ndiangx-nquaah, se yiem wuom-zingv hlen ziangh biouv gitv nyei nquaah. Ninh nyei nquaah yaac yormc cuotv ga'nyiec ziqc laatc.
49.23: Buonv juang-zinx nyei mienh daaih caux ninh mborqv jaax zoux doqc, buonv ninh, zoux hoic ninh.
49.13: “Se^mbu^lun duqv yiem wuov koiv-hlen, benx norm nzangv-bouc bun nzangv dingh. Ninh nyei gapv-jaaix mingh daaux jienv Sai^ndorn Zingh.
49.9: Yu^ndaa aac, meih se hnangv dauh sienh dorn nor.  Yie nyei dorn aac, meih cuotv mingh ngaatc orv aengx nzuonx meih nyei dorngx. Meih mbaapv njiec aengx bueix njiec hnangv sienh gouv. Hnangv sienh nyeiz nor, haaix dauh haih gaamv haeqv ninh nyie?
49.26: Meih nyei die bun meih duqv nyei fuqv se gauh hlo jiex yietc liuz yiem nyei mbong duqv daaih nyei fuqv. Se gauh hlo jiex yie nyei ong-taaix bun daaih nyei fuqv.  Tov naaiv deix fuqv yiem Yosepv nyei m'nqorngv, yaac yiem zinh ndaangc leih ninh nyei muoz-doic wuov dauh nyei biorngh.
49.5: “Si^me^on caux Lewi zoux i muoz. Ninh mbuo nyei nzuqc ndaauv se zoux doqc nyei wuoqc ginc.
49.27: “Mben^yaa^min hnangv dauh hieh juv cei orv, lungh ndorm nyanc ninh ngaatc daaih nyei orv, lungh hmuangx bun nqoi ninh caangv daaih nyei ga'naaiv.”
49.14: “Itc^saax^kaa hnangv lorh nor henv, mbaapv njiec ninh nyei ba'gi yungh laanh  mbu'ndongx.
49.3: “Lu^mben aac, meih zoux yie nyei dorn-hlo. Meih se yie nyei qaqv. Yie benx domh mienh duqv daaih nyei daauh dauh dorn. Meih zoux domh gorx, yietc buoqv dorn meih gauh maaih mengh jiex, meih yaac gauh henv.
49.7: Laaix ninh mbuo qiex jiez, ciouv, ninh mbuo zuqc houv. Laaix qiex beqv, hnyouv doqc, ninh mbuo zuqc zioux. Yie oix bun ninh mbuo nzaanx mingh gormx I^saa^laa^en Deic-Bung, yaac oix bun ninh mbuo zorpc jienv I^saa^laa^en Mienh yiem.
49.10: Yu^ndaa oix yietc liuz nanv jienv hungh diex nyei biaav. Ninh gunv mienh nyei biaav-mbiaac zungv maiv leih ninh nyei i jieqv zaux mbu'ndongx, zuov taux wuov diuh biaav-mbiaac nyei ziouv  daaih taux. Maanc fingx mienh yaac muangx ninh nyei waac.
49.2: “Yaakopv nyei dorn aac, meih mbuo daaih zunv muangx. Daaih muangx meih nyei die, I^saa^laa^en, gorngv.
49.1: Yaakopv heuc ninh nyei dorn mbuo daaih nzoih. Ninh gorngv, “Meih mbuo daaih gapv zunv yie naaiv. Yie oix gorngv nqa'haav hingv meih mbuo oix buangh nyei sic.
49.31: Apc^laa^ham caux ninh nyei auv, Saalaa, zangx wuov.  I^sakc caux ninh nyei auv, Le^mbe^kaa, yaac zangx wuov.  Yie yaac zangx Le^aa yiem wuov norm dorngx.
49.6: Ninh mbuo daav za'eix, yie maiv caux ninh mbuo caangh laangh. Ninh mbuo gapv zunv nyei ziangh hoc, yie maiv caux ninh mbuo zoux doic, weic zuqc ninh mbuo qiex jiez daix mienh. Ninh mbuo sueih eix hngaqv ngongh gouv nyei domh luangc jaan dangx.
49.8: “Yu^ndaa aac, meih nyei muoz-doic oix ceng meih. Meih longc meih nyei buoz nanv jienv meih nyei win-wangv nyei jaang. Meih nyei muoz-doic oix gueic njiec ndau baaix meih.
49.24: Mv baac ninh zaangv dingc ninh nyei juang-zinx. Ninh nyei buoz yaac maaih qaqv henv weic Yaakopv nyei Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh, weic Goux Ba'gi Yungh nyei Mienh, se I^saa^laa^en nyei La'bieiv.
49.25: Weic meih nyei die nyei Tin-Hungh, dongh tengx meih wuov dauh, yaac weic Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh ceix fuqv bun meih. Ninh bun gu'nguaaic nyei fuqv, ga'ndiev ndau nyei fuqv, caux maaih saeng-kuv caux duqv fu'jueiv nyei fuqv.
49.29: Yaakopv paaiv waac bun ninh nyei dorn mbuo, “Yie aav lamh guei seix aqv.  Oix zuqc dorh yie mingh caux yie nyei ong-taaix mbuo zangx jienv Hitv^tai Mienh, E^fo^lon, nyei ndau,
49.11: Ninh nyei lorh gouv ninh ndoh jienv a'ngunc hmei, lorh dorn ndoh jienv gauh longx jiex nyei a'ngunc hmei nquaah. Ninh oix longc a'ngunc diuv nzox ninh nyei lui-houx, longc a'ngunc wuom siqv nyei hnangv nziaamv nor, nzox ninh nyei lui-ndaauv.
49.32: Wuov nzong ndau caux mbaengx-kuotv tengx Hitv^tai Mienh maaiz daaih.”
49.16: “Ndaan oix baengh fim nyei siemv ninh nyei baeqc fingx. Ninh nyei fingx se yietc fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh.

36.21: Ndison, E^se caux Ndisaan. Naaiv deix mienh se yiem E^ndom Deic, Se^i nyei zeiv-fun, Holi Mienh nyei bieiv zeiv.
36.15: Naaiv se Esaau nyei zeiv-fun zoux bieiv zeiv nyei mienh. Maaih Esaau nyei dorn-hlo, E^li^fatv nyei dorn, Temaan, Omaa, Sefo, Kenatv,
36.37: Samx^laa guei seix, aengx maaih yiem Yu^fe^ditc Ndaaih hlen nyei Le^hox^mbotc Zingh daaih wuov dauh Saa^un duqv nzipc zoux hungh.
36.12: Esaau nyei dorn, E^li^fatv, aengx maaih dauh auv-dorn, mbuox heuc Timnaa. Timnaa yungz duqv dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Aa^maa^lekv, bun E^li^fatv. Naaiv deix dorn yietc zungv zoux Esaau nyei auv, Aa^ndaa, nyei fun.
36.17: Maaih Esaau nyei dorn, Le^u^en, nyei dorn Naa^hatc, Zelaa, Sammaa caux Mitv^saa. Naaiv se yiem E^ndom Deic-Bung gan Le^u^en cuotv nyei bieiv zeiv, se Esaau nyei auv, Mbaa^se^matv, nyei fun.
36.30: Ndison, E^se caux Ndisaan. Naaiv deix yietc zungv se yiem Se^i Deic-Bung, Holi Mienh, ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc bieiv zeiv.
36.20: Naaiv se yiem wuov norm deic-bung nyei Holi Mienh, Se^i nyei dorn. Maaih Lotaan, So^mbaan, Si^mbe^on, Aanaa,
36.4: Aa^ndaa yungz duqv E^li^fatv bun Esaau. Mbaa^se^matv yungz duqv Le^u^en.
36.28: Ndisaan nyei dorn maaih Utc caux Aalan.
36.43: Makv^ndi^en, I^laam. Naaiv se E^ndom nyei bieiv zeiv ziux ninh mbuo yiem nyei deic liepc ninh mbuo nyei nguaaz-gorn nyei dorngx. Naaiv se E^ndom Mienh nyei ong-taaix, Esaau, nyei zeiv-fun.
36.33: Mbelaa guei seix, aengx maaih yiem Mbo^saa^laa Zingh daaih wuov dauh Zelaa nyei dorn, Yo^mbapc, duqv nzipc zoux hungh.
36.35: Husaam guei seix, aengx maaih Mbe^ndatc nyei dorn, Haa^ndatc, duqv nzipc zoux hungh. Haa^ndatc dongh yiem Mo^apc Deic mborqv hingh Mi^ndien Mienh wuov dauh. Ninh nyei domh zingh heuc Aawitv.
36.19: Naaiv deix yietc zungv se Esaau (dongh E^ndom) nyei dorn caux yiem Esaau cuotv daaih nyei bieiv zeiv.
36.34: Yo^mbapc guei seix, aengx maaih yiem Temaan Deic-Bung daaih wuov dauh Husaam duqv nzipc zoux hungh.
36.18: Maaih Esaau nyei auv, O^ho^li^mbaa^maa, nyei dorn, Ye^utc, Yaalaam caux Kolaa. Naaiv se yiem Esaau nyei auv, Aanaa nyei sieqv, O^ho^li^mbaa^maa, cuotv nyei bieiv zeiv.
36.22: Lotaan nyei dorn maaih Holi caux Homam. Lotaan nyei muoc heuc Timnaa.
36.23: So^mbaan nyei dorn maaih Anwaan, Maa^naa^haatv, E^mbaan, Qefo caux Onam.
36.13: Le^u^en nyei dorn maaih Naa^hatc, Zelaa, Sammaa caux Mitv^saa. Naaiv se Esaau nyei auv, Mbaa^se^matv, nyei fun.
36.9: Yiem naaiv mingh gorngv yiem Se^i Deic nyei mbong-aiv dorngx, E^ndom Mienh nyei ong-taaix, Esaau, nyei zeiv-fun.
36.40: Yiem naaiv mingh se yiem Esaau bun njiec nyei bieiv zeiv ziux ninh mbuo nyei mbuox, ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc caux ninh mbuo yiem nyei dorngx. Maaih Timnaa, Anwaa, Yetetv,
36.26: Ndison nyei dorn maaih Hem^ndaan, Etc^mbaan, Itc^laan caux Kelaan.
36.5: O^ho^li^mbaa^maa yungz duqv Ye^utc, Yaalaam caux Kolaa. Naaiv deix se Esaau nyei dorn, yiem Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung yungz daaih.
36.27: E^se nyei dorn maaih Mbin^haan, Saax^waan caux Aakaanx.
36.38: Saa^un guei seix, Akc^mbo nyei dorn, Mbaa^an Haanan, duqv nzipc zoux hungh.
36.14: Esaau nyei auv, Si^mbe^on nyei dorn, Aanaa, nyei sieqv, O^ho^li^mbaa^maa, yungz duqv buo dauh dorn bun Esaau. Maaih Ye^utc, Yaalaam caux Kolaa.
36.3: Esaau aengx longc I^saa^maa^en nyei sieqv, Ne^mbaa^yotv nyei muoc, Mbaa^se^matv.
36.7: Ninh mbuo i muoz maaih jaa-dingh camv haic, juangc dorngx yiem maiv duqv. Dorngx-daauh hepc, maiv gaux yungz ninh mbuo nyei saeng-kuv.
36.39: Akc^mbo nyei dorn, Mbaa^an Haanan, guei seix, Haa^ndaa duqv nzipc zoux hungh. Ninh nyei domh zingh heuc Baa^u. Ninh nyei auv heuc Me^he^taa^mben. Me^he^taa^mben zoux Matv^letv nyei sieqv, Me^saa^hapc nyei fun.
36.36: Haa^ndatc guei seix, aengx maaih yiem Matv^le^kaa Zingh daaih wuov dauh Samx^laa duqv nzipc zoux hungh.
36.10: Naaiv se Esaau nyei dorn nyei mbuox. Maaih Esaau nyei auv, Aa^ndaa, nyei dorn, E^li^fatv, caux Esaau nyei auv, Mbaa^se^matv, nyei dorn, Le^u^en.
36.2: Esaau nyei auv se Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung nyei sieqv. Maaih dauh se Hitv^tai Mienh, Elon nyei sieqv, Aa^ndaa. Maaih dauh Hiwai Mienh, Si^mbe^on, nyei fun, se Aanaa nyei sieqv, O^ho^li^mbaa^maa.
36.1: Yiem naaiv mingh gorngv Esaau nyei zeiv-fun. Esaau aengx maaih norm mbuox heuc E^ndom.
36.31: Zinh ndaangc I^saa^laa^en Mienh maiv gaengh maaih hungh diex gunv, E^ndom Deic-Bung maaih hungh diex gunv nyei.
36.6: Esaau dorh jienv ninh nyei auv, ninh nyei dorn, ninh nyei sieqv, ninh nyei yietc zungv biauv zong mienh, ngongh, yungh, saeng-kuv caux yiem Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung zornc daaih nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv ziouc caux ninh nyei youz, Yaakopv, bun nqoi doic mingh yiem ganh norm deic-bung.
36.8: Esaau (se E^ndom) ziouc biaux mingh yiem Se^i Deic nyei mbong-aiv dorngx.
36.24: Si^mbe^on nyei dorn maaih Aiyaa caux Aanaa. Dongh naaiv dauh Aanaa yiem deic-bung-huaang tengx ninh nyei die, Si^mbe^on, bungx lorh wuov zanc buatc zingv wuom-jorm.
36.25: Aanaa nyei dorn heuc Ndison. Aanaa yaac maaih dauh sieqv heuc O^ho^li^mbaa^maa.
36.29: Naaiv se Holi Mienh nyei bieiv zeiv. Maaih Lotaan, So^mbaan, Si^mbe^on, Aanaa,
36.11: E^li^fatv nyei dorn maaih Temaan, Omaa, Sefo, Gaataam caux Kenatv.
36.32: Mbe^o nyei dorn, Mbelaa, duqv zoux E^ndom nyei hungh. Ninh nyei domh zingh heuc Ndin^haa^mbaa.
36.16: Kolaa, Gaataam, caux Aa^maa^lekv. Naaiv se yiem E^ndom Deic-Bung gan E^li^fatv cuotv nyei bieiv zeiv, se Esaau nyei auv, Aa^ndaa, nyei fun.

10.21: Sem se Yaafetv nyei domh gorx, yaac maaih dorn-jueiv camv nyei. Ninh zoux E^mbe nyei zeiv-fun nyei ong-taaix-ngaeqv.
10.15: Kaa^naa^an maaih i dauh dorn. Dorn-hlo heuc Sai^ndorn. Dorn-faix heuc Hetv.
10.12: caux Lesenx wuov deix biei norm zingh. Lesenx Zingh yiem Ni^naa^we caux Kaalaa Zingh mbu'ndongx. Kaalaa zoux domh zingh.
10.17: Hiwai Mienh, Aankaa Mienh, Sini Mienh,
10.30: Ninh mbuo yiem nyei deic-bung se yiem Mesaa mingh Sefaa wuov bung, dong bung maengx mbong-aiv dorngx.
10.20: Naaiv deix yietc zungv se Haam nyei zeiv-fun, ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc, ziux ninh mbuo nyei waac, ziux ninh mbuo nyei deic caux ninh mbuo nyei guoqv.
10.4: Yaawaan nyei dorn se E^li^se^aa, Taansitv, Kitv^tim caux Lo^ndaa^nim.
10.19: Ninh mbuo nyei gapv-jaaix yiem Sai^ndorn yangh naamh bung taux Ge^laa^aa, nitv Gaasaa wuov. Aengx mingh dong bung maengx taux So^ndom, Go^mo^laa, Atc^maa caux Se^mbo^yim taux Laasaa wuov.
10.18: Aanwatv Mienh, Seme Mienh caux Haamatv Mienh. Nqa'haav Kaa^naa^an nyei camv-fingx mienh nzaanx mingh yiem.
10.22: Sem nyei dorn se Elaam, Atc^su, Aan^faa^satv, Lu^nde caux Aalam.
10.23: Aalam nyei dorn se Utc, Hun, Ge^te caux Matv.
10.13: I^yipv nyei dorn se Lu^ndim, Aa^naa^mim, Le^haa^mbim, Napv^tu^him,
10.9: Ziux Ziouv  mangc, Nimlotv zoux dauh buonv orv henv haic nyei mienh. Weic naaiv maaih waac gorngv, “Hnangv Nimlotv, ziux Ziouv mangc, ninh benx dauh buonv orv henv haic nyei mienh.”
10.26: Yokv^taan nyei dorn se An^mo^ndatc, Qelepv, Haa^saan^maa^wetv, Yelaa,
10.5: (Se naaiv deix mienh nyei hoz doic nzaanx mingh yiem koiv-hlen, gorqv-mienh ziux ninh mbuo nyei guoqv, ziux ninh mbuo nyei fingx, ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc, ziux ninh mbuo nyei waac.)
10.14: Batc^lu^simx, Katv^lu^him, (dongh zoux Fi^li^saa^die Mienh nyei ong-taaix-ngaeqv wuov dauh), caux Kapv^to^lim Mienh.
10.3: Go^me nyei dorn se Atc^ke^natv, Lifaatv, caux To^gaan^maa.
10.7: Kutv nyei dorn se Se^mbaa, Haa^wi^laa, Sapc^taa, Laa^aa^maa caux Sapc^te^kaa. Laa^aa^maa nyei dorn se Qe^mbaa caux Nde^ndaan.
10.10: Nimlotv nyei guoqv daauh dangh maaih Mbaa^mben, Elekv caux Akc^katv. Naaiv deix yietc zungv yiem Sinaa Deic-Bung.
10.2: Yaafetv nyei dorn se Go^me, Maagokc, Maa^ndai, Yaawaan, Tu^mban, Mesekv, caux Tilaatv.
10.1: Yiem naaiv mingh gorngv Noyaa nyei dorn, Sem, Haam caux Yaafetv nyei zeiv-fun. Se mbiungc-suiv-imx yiemx liuz lungh ndiev, nqa'haav ninh mbuo buo dauh duqv nyei dorn.
10.31: Naaiv deix yietc zungv se Sem nyei zeiv-fun, ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc, ziux ninh mbuo nyei waac, ziux ninh mbuo nyei deic, caux ninh mbuo nyei guoqv.
10.6: Haam nyei dorn se Kutv, I^yipv, Putv caux Kaa^naa^an.
10.8: Kutv maaih dauh dorn, mbuox heuc Nimlotv, se yiem lungh ndiev benx dauh daamv hlo, maaih banh zeic nyei mienh.
10.24: Aan^faa^satv zoux Qelaa nyei die. Qelaa yaac zoux E^mbe nyei die.
10.25: E^mbe maaih i dauh dorn. Maaih dauh, mbuox heuc Belekv, weic zuqc yiem ninh nyei seix zeiv mienh bun nqoi ndau-beih yiem. Ninh nyei youz heuc Yokv^taan.
10.29: Ofi, Haa^wi^laa caux Yo^mbapc. Naaiv deix yietc zungv zoux Yokv^taan nyei dorn.
10.11: Ninh yiem naaiv cuotv mingh taux Atc^si^lie Deic-Bung ceix jiez Ni^naa^we, Le^hox^mbotc^i, Kaalaa
10.32: Naaiv deix mienh yiem Noyaa bun njiec nyei zeiv-fun ziux ninh mbuo nyei douh zong, yiem ninh mbuo nyei guoqv. Yiem mbiungc-suiv-imx yiemx liuz lungh ndiev, nqa'haav naaiv deix mienh yietc zungv nzaanx mingh yiem gormx lungh ndiev.
10.16: Kaa^naa^an yaac zoux camv-fingx mienh nyei ong-taaix-ngaeqv. Maaih Ye^mbutc Mienh, Aa^mo^lai Mienh, Ge^gaa^si Mienh,

2.21: Ziouv Tin-Hungh ziouc bun wuov dauh mienh bueix m'njormh ndo nyei. M'njormh mingh wuov zanc, ninh zorqv diuh wuov laanh mienh nyei la'saengx mbungv aengx bun orv ziangh ndipc mi'aqv.
2.15: Ziouv Tin-Hungh ziouc bun ninh zeix daaih wuov laanh mienh yiem E^nden Huingx, bun ninh fioux yaac goux jienv.
2.12: (Wuov norm deic-bung nyei jiem zien haic. Aengx maaih nyungc ndiangx-zung ndaang haic caux nyungc jaaix haic nyei la'bieiv-siqv nzueic nyei.)
2.17: Mv baac bun mienh hiuv duqv longx hiuv duqv ciouv wuov zungh, cin-maanc maiv dungx nyanc. Se gorngv meih nyanc nor, dongh wuov hnoi meih za'gengh oix zuqc daic aqv.”
2.20: Naaiv laanh mienh tengx cuotv nzoih nyungc-nyungc saeng-kuv nyei mbuox caux yiem ndaamv-lungh nyei norqc caux yietc zungv yiem lomc nyei hieh zoih nyei mbuox, corc buatc maiv maaih yietc dauh puix ninh, caux ninh zoux doic tengx ninh.
2.4: Zeix lungh zeix ndau nyei jauv-louc se hnangv naaiv.   Ziouv Tin-Hungh zeix lungh zeix ndau wuov zanc,
2.19: Ziouv  Tin-Hungh ziouc zorqv deix nie daaih nanv nyungc-nyungc yiem ndau nyei saeng-kuv hieh zoih caux nyungc-nyungc yiem ndaamv-lungh nyei norqc, ziouc dorh daaih bun wuov laanh mienh mangc gaax, haaix nyungc horpc zuqc cuotv haaix nyungc mbuox. Wuov laanh mienh tengx naaiv deix maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv cuotv mbuox heuc haaix nyungc, wuov nyungc ga'naaiv ziouc duqv mbuox heuc wuov nyungc aqv.
2.18: Ziouv Tin-Hungh aengx gorngv, “Nduqc laanh mienh ganh yiem hnangv se maiv horpc. Yie aengx oix zeix dauh daaih puix ninh, caux ninh zoux doic tengx ninh.”
2.22: Ziouv Tin-Hungh longc yiem m'jangc dorn zorqv cuotv wuov diuh la'saengx mbungv zoux benx dauh m'sieqv dorn, aengx dorh daaih taux m'jangc dorn wuov.
2.23: Wuov dauh m'jangc dorn ziouc gorngv, “Dongh naaiv aqv. Mbungv yaac yie nyei mbungv benx daaih. Orv yaac yie nyei orv benx daaih. Oix zuqc tengx ninh cuotv mbuox heuc m'sieqv dorn, weic zuqc ninh yiem m'jangc dorn cuotv daaih.”
2.13: Da'nyeic caax heuc Gi^hon Ndaaih, liouc gormx nzengc Kutv Deic-Bung.
2.9: Ziouv Tin-Hungh yaac bun nyungc-nyungc ndiangx yiem ndau cuotv daaih nzueic nyei, kuh mangc haic, maaih biouv kuv nyei weic zoux nyanc hopv. Huingx mbu'ndongx maaih i zungh ndiangx. Maaih zungh ziangh maengc biouv. Maaih zungh aeqv, bun mienh hiuv duqv longx hiuv duqv ciouv nyei biouv.
2.5: ndau maiv gaengh maaih haaix nyungc miev ndiangx. Maiv gaengh maaih haaix nyungc ga'naaiv-nyim guqc nyaah cuotv, weic zuqc Ziouv Tin-Hungh maiv gaengh bun mbiungc njiec ndau-beih. Yaac maiv gaengh maaih mienh ziouc maiv gaengh maaih haaix dauh zoux lingh zoux ndeic.
2.14: Da'faam caax heuc Taigitc Ndaaih, liouc gan Atc^si^lie Deic-Bung nyei dong bung maengx mingh. Da'feix caax heuc Yu^fe^ditc Ndaaih.
2.3: Tin-Hungh ceix fuqv da'cietv hnoi, bun wuov norm hnoi benx cing-nzengc hnoi, weic zuqc ninh zeix lungh zeix ndau nyei gong ziangx. Ninh yaac dingh gong hitv kuonx.
2.7: Ziouv Tin-Hungh aengx zorqv deix nie-mbung nanv cuotv dauh mienh daaih yaac biomv maaih maengc nyei qiex bieqc ninh nyei mba'zorng. Ninh ziouc benx maaih maengc nyei mienh aqv.
2.10: E^nden Deic-Bung maaih diuh ndaaih liouc bieqc mingh yungz wuov norm huingx. Cuotv ziqc E^nden wuov diuh ndaaih ziouc bun zoux biei caax mi'aqv.
2.2: Taux da'cietv hnoi Tin-Hungh zoux ziangx ninh zoux nyei gong. Da'cietv hnoi ninh ziouc dingh gong hitv kuonx.
2.1: Lungh ndau caux maanc muotc hnangv naaiv nor zeix ziangx nzengc aqv.
2.6: Kungx maaih wuom yiem ndau-ndiev saamx cuotv daaih bun ndau ndorn gormx nzengc hnangv.
2.8: Ziouv Tin-Hungh ziouc yiem dong bung, E^nden wuov, zoux norm huingx yaac bun ninh zeix daaih wuov dauh mienh yiem huingx gu'nyuoz.
2.24: Weic naaiv m'jangc dorn dorng jaa, leih ninh nyei diex maac, caux jienv ninh nyei auv gapv daaih. Ninh mbuo ziouc benx yietc dauh mi'aqv.
2.25: Naaiv dauh m'jangc dorn caux ninh nyei auv laengh gaengv nyei yiem mv baac laanh maiv nyaiv laanh.
2.11: Da'yietv caax heuc Bison Ndaaih, liouc gormx Haa^wi^laa Deic-Bung. Yiem naaic maaih jiem.
2.16: Ziouv hatc ninh, “Yiem naaiv huingx gu'nyuoz, haaix zungh biouv yaac nyanc duqv nyei.

24.21: Wuov dauh bou souv jienv wuov maiv ko lo, samx mangc gaax, Ziouv tengx ninh zoux ziangx ziux ninh cuotv daaih zoux nyei gong fai ni?
24.15: Daux gaux zungv maiv gaengh setv, maaih dauh sieqv, mbuox heuc Le^mbe^kaa, ndaam jienv nie-ha'louh cuotv daaih. Le^mbe^kaa se Mbe^tu^en nyei sieqv. Le^mbe^kaa nyei gux heuc Minkaa. Minkaa zoux Naa^ho nyei auv. Naa^ho zoux Apc^laa^ham nyei youz.
24.23: Wuov dauh bou naaic, “Tov mbuox yie, meih haaix dauh nyei sieqv? Meih nyei die nyei biauv maaih dorngx bun yie mbuo bueix muonz fai?”
24.47: “Yie aengx naaic ninh, ‘Meih haaix dauh nyei sieqv?’ “Ninh dau, ‘Yie Mbe^tu^en nyei sieqv. Yie nyei ong heuc Naa^ho. Gux heuc Minkaa.’ “Yie ziouc zorqv mba'zorng-hiun dangh jienv ninh nyei mba'zorng, aengx zorqv jiemh dangh jienv ninh nyei buoz.
24.56: Wuov dauh bou gorngv, “Tov meih mbuo maiv dungx zorv yie weic zuqc Ziouv tengx yie zoux sung yie nyei jauv mi'aqv. Tov bun yie nzuonx yie nyei ziouv wuov aqv.”
24.20: Ninh ziouc gaanv jienv dox nie-ha'louh nyei wuom an wuov zoh bun lorh torh hopv. Aengx tiux mingh wuom-kuotv wuov zaangh wuom bun ninh nyei dauh dauh lorh torh hopv.
24.18: Wuov dauh sieqv gorngv, “Domh Gorx aac, gunv hopv maah!” Sieqv ziouc bungx nie-ha'louh njiec mba'dauh, bouh jienv bun ninh hopv.
24.33: Mbenc ziangx hnaangx, heuc Apc^laa^ham nyei bou nyanc mv baac ninh gorngv, “Yie maiv gaengh nyanc oc. Zuov yie gorngv nzengc yie daaih nyei jauv-louc cingx nyanc.” Laa^mbaan gorngv, “Maaih haaix nyungc, gunv gorngv maah!”
24.43: Ih zanc yie souv jienv naaiv wuom-zingv hlen. Maaih dauh sieqv cuotv daaih zaangh wuom yie oix gorngv, “Tov deix meih nyei nie-ha'louh nyei wuom hopv oc.”
24.48: Yie yaac gueic njiec baaix Ziouv.  Yie ceng Ziouv, yie nyei ziouv, Apc^laa^ham, nyei Tin-Hungh. Ninh dorh yie mingh duqv zuqc jauv, bun yie lorz duqv yie nyei ziouv nyei youz nyei sieqv-fun zoux yie nyei ziouv nyei mbuangz.
24.22: Lorh torh hopv liuz wuom, wuov dauh bou zorqv norm jiem-mba'zorng-hiun, hniev-daauh yietc zinh faam-buon, aengx zorqv doix jiem nyei jiemh, hniev-daauh faam-lungz, bun wuov dauh sieqv.
24.42: “Ih hnoi yie taux wuov wuom-kuotv hlen, yie daux gaux gorngv, ‘Ziouv,  yie nyei ziouv, Apc^laa^ham, nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Tov tengx yie zoux ziangx yie cuotv jauv daaih zoux nyei gong.
24.50: Laa^mbaan caux Mbe^tu^en dau, “Naaiv deix jauv se yiem Ziouv daaih. Yie mbuo maiv haih caux meih gorngv longx fai ciouv.
24.31: Laa^mbaan gorngv, “Daaih oc. Meih se Ziouv ceix fuqv nyei mienh. Meih fungc souv jienv ga'nyiec hnangv? Yie zungv liuc leiz biauv yaac liuc leiz ziangx lorh torh yiem nyei dorngx.”
24.4: Oix zuqc nzuonx yie nyei loz-deic-bung, yie nyei cien-ceqv wuov, tengx yie nyei dorn, I^sakc, gorngv auv.”
24.63: Maaih hnoi lungh maanz-hmuangx, I^sakc cuotv mingh saau wuov ndeic. Ninh cau hmien buatc guanh lorh torh hungx jienv daaih.
24.29: Le^mbe^kaa maaih dauh gorx, mbuox heuc Laa^mbaan. Laa^mbaan gaanv jienv mingh wuov wuom-zingv lorz wuov dauh mienh.
24.9: Wuov dauh bou ziouc dorh ninh nyei buoz an jienv ninh nyei ziouv, Apc^laa^ham, nyei camh zuih ga'ndiev maengx houv jienv laengz ei naaiv deix waac zoux.
24.37: Yie nyei ziouv heuc yie caux ninh laengz jiex ngaengc waac gorngv, ‘Maiv dungx lorz dongh ih zanc yiem jienv naaiv norm Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung nyei sieqv bun yie nyei dorn longc zoux auv.
24.58: Ninh mbuo ziouc heuc Le^mbe^kaa daaih naaic, “Meih za'gengh oix gan naaiv dauh m'jangc dorn mingh nyei fai?” Sieqv dau, “Mingh nyei.”
24.5: Bou naaic gaax, “Se gorngv sieqv maiv kangv gan yie daaih naaiv norm deic-bung ni? Yie oix zuqc fungx meih nyei dorn nzuonx meih cuotv daaih wuov norm deic-bung saah?”
24.62: I^sakc yiem Mbe^e Laa^hai Loi Deic-Bung-Huaang nzuonx weic zuqc wuov zanc ninh yiem Negepc.
24.3: Yie oix meih ziangv jienv Ziouv, dongh lungh caux ndau nyei Tin-Hungh, laengz waac meih maiv lorz ih zanc yie yiem jienv nyei Kaa^naa^an Mienh mbu'ndongx nyei sieqv zoux yie nyei dorn nyei auv.
24.64: Le^mbe^kaa yaac cau hmien buatc I^sakc ziouc njiec lorh torh daaih
24.39: “Yie aengx naaic gaax yie nyei ziouv, ‘Se gorngv wuov dauh sieqv maiv kangv gan yie daaih ni?’+”
24.6: Apc^laa^ham gorngv, “Cin-maanc maiv dungx fungx yie nyei dorn nzuonx wuov norm deic-bung.
24.8: Se gorngv wuov dauh sieqv maiv laengz caux meih daaih naaiv, yie bun meih laengz liuz nyei ngaengc waac jiex mi'aqv. Mv baac meih cin-maanc maiv dungx dorh yie nyei dorn nzuonx wuov norm deic-bung oc.”
24.57: Ninh mbuo dau, “Wuov nyungc, heuc sieqv daaih naaic gaax ninh hnangv haaix nor gorngv.”
24.46: “Ninh ziouc siepv-siepv nyei bungx nie-ha'louh njiec mba'dauh yaac gorngv, ‘Gunv hopv maah! Yie aengx zaangh wuom bun meih nyei lorh torh hopv.’ Yie ziouc hopv. Ninh aengx zaangh wuom bun lorh torh hopv.
24.67: I^sakc ziouc dorh jienv Le^mbe^kaa bieqc I^sakc nyei maa, Saalaa, nyei ndopv-liuh. Le^mbe^kaa ziouc benx I^sakc nyei auv mi'aqv. I^sakc yaac hnamv haic ninh. I^sakc ziouc duqv auv daaih tengx jaiv ninh nyei maa daic mingh nyei you-nzauh.
24.7: Lungh zaangc nyei Tin-Hungh wuov dauh Ziouv,  dorh yie leih nqoi yie nyei die nyei biauv, guangc jienv yie cuotv seix nyei deic-bung. Ninh yaac caux yie laengz ngaengc waac. Ninh gorngv, ‘Yie oix zorqv naaiv norm deic-bung bun meih nyei zeiv-fun.’ Ziouv  oix paaiv ninh nyei fin-mienh mingh ndaangc, meih ziouc haih duqv dauh wuov norm deic-bung nyei sieqv zoux yie nyei mbuangz.
24.32: Wuov dauh bou ziouc bieqc biauv mi'aqv. Laa^mbaan bouh lorh torh nyei dorx njiec, aengx zorqv mbiauh nqaauv zorqv miev bun lorh torh nyanc. Ninh lorz wuom bun Apc^laa^ham nyei bou caux gan Apc^laa^ham nyei bou daaih nyei mienh nzaaux zaux.
24.25: Ninh aengx gorngv, “Yie mbuo nyei biauv maaih miev maaih mbiauh nqaauv camv nyei uix saeng-kuv. Yaac maaih dorngx bun meih bueix.”
24.17: Apc^laa^ham nyei bou ziouc tiux jienv mingh taux sieqv nyei ga'hlen gorngv, “Tov bun deix meih naaic nie-ha'louh nyei wuom yie hopv oc.”
24.61: Le^mbe^kaa caux ninh nyei m'sieqv bou mbuo mbenc nzoih ga'naaiv, geh jienv lorh torh gan jienv Apc^laa^ham nyei bou nzuonx. Wuov dauh bou ziouc cuotv jauv dorh jienv Le^mbe^kaa mingh aqv.
24.12: Wuov dauh bou daux gaux gorngv, “O Ziouv, yie nyei ziouv, Apc^laa^ham, nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Tov tengx yie ih hnoi zoux duqv ziangx yie laengz nyei waac. Tov meih yaac zoux longx bun yie nyei ziouv, Apc^laa^ham.
24.65: naaic gaax Apc^laa^ham nyei bou, “Yiem wuov ndeic hungx jienv mbuo daaih wuov dauh mienh se haaix dauh?” Wuov dauh bou gorngv, “Ninh zoux yie nyei ziouv.” Le^mbe^kaa ziouc zorqv kuaaiv ndie buang jienv ganh nyei hmien.
24.34: Wuov dauh bou gorngv, “Yie se Apc^laa^ham nyei bou.
24.30: Laa^mbaan buatc liuz ninh nyei muoc dangh jienv nyei mba'zorng-hiun caux buoz-jiemh, yaac haiz ninh gorngv nzengc wuov dauh mienh gorngv nyei waac, ninh ziouc cuotv mingh lorz wuov dauh mienh. Buatc ninh souv jienv lorh torh ga'hlen nitv wuom-zingv.
24.11: Taux zingh ga'nyiec maengx, ninh bun lorh torh gueic njiec wuom-kuotv hlen. Wuov zanc lungh maanz-hmuangx aqv, doix zuqc m'sieqv dorn cuotv daaih zaangh wuom nyei ziangh hoc.
24.28: Sieqv tiux jienv nzuonx mingh, zorqv naaiv deix jauv-louc mbuox ninh nyei maa caux biauv zong mienh.
24.44: Se gorngv ninh gorngv, “Gunv hopv maah! Yie yaac oix zaangh wuom bun meih nyei lorh torh hopv” nor, yie ziouc hiuv duqv dongh wuov dauh sieqv Ziouv dingc daaih zoux yie nyei ziouv nyei dorn nyei auv.’
24.45: “Yie yiem hnyouv daux gaux zungv maiv gaengh setv, Le^mbe^kaa ziouc ndaam jienv nie-ha'louh cuotv daaih. Ninh njiec taux wuom-zingv zaangh wuom, yie ziouc mbuox ninh, ‘Tov deix wuom hopv oc.’
24.19: Ninh hopv liuz wuom, sieqv aengx gorngv, “Yie corc oix mingh zaangh wuom bun meih nyei lorh torh hopv beuv.”
24.54: Apc^laa^ham nyei bou bun liuz, ninh caux gan ninh daaih nyei mienh ziouc nyanc hnaangx aqv. Nyanc liuz hopv liuz, ninh mbuo bueix muonz wuov. Da'nyeic ndorm jiez sin daaih, wuov dauh bou gorngv, “Tov bun yie nzuonx yie nyei ziouv wuov oc.”
24.35: Ziouv za'gengh ceix fuqv yie nyei ziouv, Apc^laa^ham, camv haic, bun ninh butv zoih haic, maaih ngongh, maaih ba'gi yungh, maaih yungh camv, yaac maaih jiem maaih nyaanh, maaih nouh gauv nouh beiz, maaih lorh torh caux lorh.
24.41: Meih mingh taux yie nyei cien-ceqv wuov, meih caux yie laengz nyei ngaengc waac ziouc jiex mi'aqv. Maiv gunv ninh mbuo maiv bun sieqv meih, meih caux yie laengz nyei ngaengc waac jiex mi'aqv.’+”
24.13: Yie souv jienv naaiv wuom-zingv hlen. Yiem naaiv norm zingh nyei sieqv ih zanc cuotv daaih zaangh wuom.
24.60: Ninh mbuo buang waac Le^mbe^kaa, gorngv mbuox ninh, “Yie mbuo nyei muoc aac, tov bun meih zoux ziex cin ziex waanc mienh nyei maa. Tov bun meih nyei zeiv-fun haih duqv nzipc ninh mbuo nyei win-wangv nyei zingh.”
24.59: Ninh mbuo ziouc bun Le^mbe^kaa caux dorh Le^mbe^kaa hlo daaih wuov dauh bou gan Apc^laa^ham nyei bou mbuo mingh.
